3a1('bum): ba dgod 'dzings pa la/ dge slong lnga sngo tsam mi dge slong
3a2('bum): 'dun chen po dang / thabs gcig s+ho/ thams cad kyang dag bcom pa
3b1('bum): zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba
3b2('bum): shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur
3b3('bum): bor ba rang gi do ni rab tu thob pa srid pa kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ bka' yang dag
3b4('bum): pas/ sems shin du rnam par gol ba/ sems kau dbang thams cad la pha rol du phyin pa'i mchog
4a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o// dge spong ma grags 'dzin ma dang / skye dgu'i bdag mcho
4a2('bum): gsas ldam rgya tsha ma dang / la rgyas dge bsnyen dang / nag bstan me shin du mangs sum
4a3('bum): ches mthong ba gsug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen ma tshad med grangs med kyi
4b1('bum): cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par dpyod pa/ mtshan
4b2('bum): nyid kyi ye shes bzod pa rab tu pa/ chags pa med pa'i gzug rab tu thob pa/ thogs pa med
4b3('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ bstan pa zad mi shes pa la so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa/ mngon par
4b4('bum): shes pa chen pos brtse ba/ mngon par shes pa shin du ma nyams pa/ mnyan par 'os pa'i tshige dang ldan pa/ le lo/ 
5a1('bum): med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ lus dang sreg la mi lbu ba/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ kha gsog med
5a2('bum): pa/ grags pa dang / khye dang bkrur ba sti'i sems med / zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa/ chos zab mo'i mazod pa dam pa
5a3('bum): rtogs pa/ khong du chud pa/ mi 'jig pa chen po thob pa/ yid yongs su zhum tsha pa med pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad
5a4('bum): las yang dag par 'das pa las gyi sgrib pa thams cad rgyur rang las dang nyon mongs pa dang / phyir
5a5('bum): rgol ba rab tu bcom pa/ pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyi zil gyis mi non pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
5b1('bum): thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba/ chos rab tu rtogs pa/ rnam par dbye zhing bsta pa la mkhas pa/ bskal pa grangs med
5b2('bum): pa nas smon lam shin du brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ sngon du smrig khro gnyer med pa/ snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig
5b3('bum): dang ldan pa/ pha rol la tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa zhum pa'i sems dang bral ba/ spobs
5b4('bum): pa mi chod pa/ 'khor mtha' yis pa/ zil gyis gnon pa/ mi 'jigs pa'i dang ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha'
5b5('bum): yas pa dang / bsnun pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba lnga mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam
5b6('bum): sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / nam mkha' dang / dri za'i grong dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa/ sems
6a1('bum): yongs su zhum pa med pa/ sems can thams cad kyi rgyud dang / shes pa phra ba dang / spyod pa dang mos pa khong du chud
6a2('bum): par bya ba la mkhas tshe/ sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa brlabs po che dang ljon pa
6a3('bum): rlos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bye ba'i ye shes la mkhas chen po/ chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas
6a4('bum): rdzing dpag dka' ga rang gi sems ral dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la dbang shin du thob pa las drang
6a5('bum): na mongs pa dang / lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ brten par rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa/ rjen ci
6a6('bum): 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la zhugs pa/ lta ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba
6b1('bum): kun+da nas sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i
6b2('bum): ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi 'tshong par mos pa/ chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa la
6b3('bum): 'jigs pa med pa bdag nyid ji lta ba bya zhin khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sbyangasu rgyas kyi ning mtha' yas rnam par bkod
6b4('bum): smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nu ban gso pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting
6b5('bum): nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu ma
6b6('bum): la gsol ba gdab par bya ba la mkhas go sems can gyi lci ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa ni ba la mkhos pa ting nge'adza
7a1('bum): brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par martse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa/ yon tan brjod pa bskal pa grangs
7a2('bum): mtha' yas par ma zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / 
7a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che ni rin chen 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po dang / rin
7a4('bum): chen byin dang / dad dpon dam pa dang / skyesabus byin dang / skyob byed dang / chu bdag lha dang / dbang pos byin dang / bzang po'i stobs
7a5('bum): dang / blo gros dam pa dang / 'phags pa'i blo gros dang / blo gros 'phel dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / don yod mthong ba dang / sgrib med mo thos dang / ra
7a6('bum): tu bzhugs pa da mthu dmaHsa rnam par gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus mthA yA dang / rtag tu brtson dang / rtag tu sbyor ba dang / mi gtong ba brtso bya
7a7('bum): dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / blo gros dpe med dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / mthu chen po thob pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon
7b1('bum): nur gyur pa dang / bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rtag tu lag brkyang dang / snying rje cher sems dang / rgyan
7b2('bum): chen po dang / rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / ri bo'i zom dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gzhan yang byang chub
7b3('bum): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'ongs nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas skye
7b4('bum): drang por bsrang ste/ dgongs pa mngon du bzhig nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te bzhugs so// der bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba
7b5('bum): dang / khongs su chud pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba dang // 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par gzhag go// 
7b6('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag pAr mekhyen pas/ ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te 'phrul gyi sbyin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnams
7b7('bum): gzigs so// de nas de ltar bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar gzigs nas sku thams cad nas 'od rab tu bkye ste/ de'i zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo stobs stong dang
7b8('bum): ldan pa gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // zhabs kyi ser mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug
8a1('bum): bcu byung ngo // zhabs kyi long bu gnyis dang / zhabs byin pa gnyis dang / zhabs pus mo gnyis dang / zhabs brla gnyis dang / sku sta zur dang / sku lte ba'i dkyil
8a2('bum): 'khor dang / sku rtsibs logs gnyis dang / thugs ka'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyi dpal gyi be'u las kyang / 'od zer bye khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // phyag gi
8a3('bum): sor mo bcu las kyang / 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // de bzhin du phyog lag rngar gaunyis dang / sku phrag pa gnyis dang / mgur gnyis dang
8a4('bum): tshems mtsho ba bzhi dang / tshems bzhi bcu dang / spyan gnyis dang / snyan gonyis dang / shangs kyi sbubs ga/ gnyis dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang / steng gi
8a5('bum): spyi gtsug dang / zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ste/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu po de dag thams
8a6('bum): cod kyis spong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad snang po chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rjen gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
8a7('bum): bye ma snyed snang ba che na pos byeb par byas so// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su
8a8('bum): phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyam par byas so// sems can gang gis 'od zer de mthong ba dang / 'od zer nges gang ma rig
8b1('bum): gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis baspu'i bu ka'i sgo thams cad nas 'ong
8b2('bum): zer rab tu bkye ba mdzad do// 'od zer des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi
8b3('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma skyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho dang nA ba dang / byang dang byang shar dang / shar lnga dang / lce nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
8b4('bum): dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten dgyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// sems can gang gis 'od de mtsho
8b5('bum): ba dang / 'od des gang la rig par gyur pa de dag smra cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan
8b6('bum): 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs
8b7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// lho dang nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub
8b8('bum): byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang po chen pos khyab par mdzad do// sems can
9a1('bum): gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / da 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas
9a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad
9a3('bum): nas ca le 'dzum po mdzad de// ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du 'thon te/ 'od zer de dag thams cad la pad+mo mang po rin po
9a4('bum): che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi khadag tu sna / mdab ma stong dang ldan pa sna tshogs su 'dug ma/ rdzun bltan bstug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog bzang brje
9a5('bum): zhim pa/ 'dzom pa/ ka tsa min+da da ka ltar rig na bde ba 'gyur ba sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur te/ pad+ma de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs/ 
9a6('bum): shi 'di lnga ste pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos ldan pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad de/ de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / 
9a7('bum): de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ dri rom du phyed pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos snyan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar gyi dge lho nub dang nug/ 
9a8('bum): byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / theg dang snying gi phyogs su phyogs re me ning 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi khyim srid dugashegs shing di dag tu byon nas kyang 'di sa ste/ pa ma / 
9b1('bum): phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// sems can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
9b2('bum): chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin song ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam
9b3('bum): pe re ga zhag ste/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu
9b4('bum): g.yos te/ g.yas so// rab tu g.yos so// kun du g.yos so// 'gul to rab tu 'gul to// kun du 'gu to// ldeg go/ rab tu ldog go// kun du ldeg go// cham
9b5('bum): che ma/ rab tu chem chem/ kun du tshim chem mo// 'ur/ rab tu 'u re'ur/ kun du'ur 'ur ro// shig shig rab tu shig shig/ kun du shr-ig shig go// mtha'
9b6('bum): mtho na ni dbus dma'/ dbus dma' na ni mtha' mtho ste/ dal bus bregs kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams cad l-i phan pa dang / bde ba bskyed par gyur to// de
9b7('bum): nas skad cig yud tsam thang gcig la/ stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
9b8('bum): rten dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba grang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad cing stongs par gyur to// sems can de dag thos
10a1('bum): cad kyang mi dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang 'phrul
10a2('bum): dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// de nas lha de dag dang / mi de dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis
10a3('bum): sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran pad gyur te/ rjes su dran nas dga' bo dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing phyin
10a4('bum): nanas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gash+ye pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mi sbyar zhing 'dud par gyur to// 
10a5('bum): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams rnams dpa'on
10a6('bum): dang stong gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad
10a7('bum): dang gre shin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag kyang mi dang / lhor skal ba mnyam par skyes so// / 
10a8('bum): nas mi de dag dang / lnga de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe ribs rjes su dran par gyur to// sems can de dag kyang mya ma rjes su dran nas rgya
10b1('bum): dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde bar thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
10b2('bum): sangs rgyas gang 'di nas bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
10b3('bum): rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyare zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmus longs ji snyed yod pa
10b4('bum): de dag thams cad kyang mig gis gzugs da mthong bar gyur to// 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to// smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par
10b5('bum): gyur to// sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang 'khrug pa med pa'i sems thob par gyur to// gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to// dbul po
10b6('bum): rnams kyang nor thob par gyur to// bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to// skom pa rnams btung ba thob par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad med par gyur
10b7('bum): two/ lus nyams pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to// ngal ba rnams kyang ngal sos par gyur to// lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las
10b8('bum): kyi mtha' dang / 'tshe ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las mtha' dang / 'tshob mi dge ba spangs par gyur to// sems can thams cad la dper na/ 
11a1('bum): padang ma dang / pu nu dang / snying mo dang / 'dza' bo dang / gnyen po dang / grogs po dang / mtshungs pa'i sems kyis phan tshun sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to// sems/ 
11a2('bum): can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ba dang / nyes pa'i dring ba med de/ mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to// 
11a3('bum): de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang / ldan par gyur te/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba/ 
11a4('bum): thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang / ldan par gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o// dul ba ni dge ba'o// 
11a5('bum): zhi ba ni dge ba'o// sdom pa ni dge ba'o// dben pa ni dge ba'o// bag byed pa ni dge ba'o// byams pa ni dge ba'o// tshangs par spyod pa ni dge ba'o// snying rje ni dge ba'o// 
11a6('bum): srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la 'tshe ba 'di ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'o khri de nyid la bzhugs pas/ 'di lta
11a7('bum): ste dper na/ nyi mo bsgribs pa med pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa 'am/ zla ba nya ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
11a8('bum): khams ri rab dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ dbang byed dang bcas pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa tshang / 
11b1('bum): pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mAnan te bzhugs na/ 'od dang / sku 'dog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / l+h+wam me/ lhan ne/ 
11b2('bum): lhang nge'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing
11b3('bum): lham me/ ldan ne/ lhung der bzhugs pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid
11b4('bum): dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / ldum me/ lhan ne// ltung der bzhugs so// lho dang / nub dang / byang shar dong / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
11b5('bum): dbu 'og drung steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjod dang / dpal gyi
11b6('bum): mdzes shing / lAm mo/ ldan mr-i ljang der bzhugs so// 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal por rab ri nag po gzhan thams cad zil gyis mnon par gnas pa ni mdzes shi
11b7('bum): lham me ldan ne/ ltung ngo'o// 'di lta ste/ dper ni/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing / lham me/ wAn ne/ ltung nge'o// 'ang
11b8('bum): lnga ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing / lham mo// lhan ni/ lhang ngo'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'dzig
12a1('bum): rten lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa zil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang 'od dang / sku mdog dpagaH
12a2('bum): brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das
12a3('bum): kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to// de nas stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang / kun snang dang ba dag tshangs ris
12a4('bum): dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / mtshe ma dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / rgyal cheni bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de dag thams
12a5('bum): cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhug pa mthong nas/ dga' zhing spro ba dang / yid bde zhing rab tu
12a6('bum): dga' la nyams bde ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye mo dang / lha rdzas kyi byug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / 
12a7('bum): ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang / na li na dang / so'u gan d+hi dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ke sa ra dang / ta ma le'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 
12a8('bum): lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / bdag spos dang / ut+pa la dang / 
12b1('bum): pad+mo dang / ku mu ta dang / pun da ri ka dang / na li na dang / su 'u gan dI dang / me tog ke sa ra dang / ta ma lu'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / rgyun dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtsham
12b2('bum): lha rdzas kyi ba dran dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor te// mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyin khams 'di na 'dul ba dang
12b3('bum): snod du gyur pa'i mi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang me tog chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa mang po khyer nas/ gang na ba der dong sde/ phyin cing / bcom ldan 'das la mchod/ 
12b4('bum): pa byed par gyur to// me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma la sogs pa dang / na bza' dong / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba da na de dag
12b5('bum): thams cad kyang de ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng / gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang pa
12b6('bum): brtsegs pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'dzi garten gyi khams tsam du red de gnas par gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag las kyang lnga rdzas kyi me tog dang / 
12b7('bum): dar gyi lda ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur to// mngon par 'chang bar gyur to// rab tu 'chang bar gyur to// me tog dang / dar gyi lnga ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten/ 
12b8('bum): gyi khams 'di shin du mdzes par gyur to// lha dang ma bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu dos kyang shin du mdzes shing / lha ma me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur to// stong
13a1('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi
13a2('bum): 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshoms dang / 'og dang / snying gi phyogs
13a3('bum): kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams
13a4('bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs
13a5('bum): shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'dzam bu'i gi maM rnams dza~M ltar sems pa de bzhin du/ nub kyi bang lang spyod dang / shar gyi lus 'phags po dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang
13a6('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar dang / de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / 
13a7('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis se bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems/ 
13a8('bum): par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to// snyam mo// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs
13b1('bum): bzhin du 'od rab tu dkye ba mdzad de/ yang 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to// shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / byang dang / byang
13b2('bum): shar dang / shar l-I dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khamos gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab tu snang bar
13b3('bum): 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klu
13b4('bum): gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'a dun dang bcaso pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang badz+ri/ 
13b5('bum): pa/ mang po mthong bar gyur to// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis kyang
13b6('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
13b7('bum): shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bca thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 
13b8('bum): byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag
14a1('bum): na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
14a2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// de nas
14a3('bum): shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gabye
14a4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhag/ na shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
14a5('bum): rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od
14a6('bum): zer kun nas byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po dri dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan
14a7('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri/ 
14a8('bum): chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di// 
14b1('bum): lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
14b2('bum): 'od gzer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
14b3('bum): gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang
14b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od/ 
14b5('bum): zor kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'ad/ de bzhin gshegs po rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di// skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'jig
14b6('bum): rten gyi khams ma mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la
14b7('bum): phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa de gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub
14b8('bum): po rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung
15a1('bum): ga gnas kyis bka' bsngal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'/ 
15a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa steng bskur to// rigs kyi bu bcom ldan
15a3('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sa ma
15a4('bum): mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dgyes kho na par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdo kha can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das
15a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro zhes kyigyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs
15a6('bum): rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod mar spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po de dag ni mgu zar dka' ba yin gyis
15a7('bum): der nyams mar gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
15a8('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung go nas de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / 
15b1('bum): bu mo'i gzugs sa 'dag pa bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji skad cig
15b2('bum): bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dog thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / ni bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
15b3('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / ste stang du bya bri dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phral chen po dang / byang
15b4('bum): chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong sgo phyin nas
15b5('bum): becom ldan 'das kyi ne bas gnyis la spyi bos phyaga'atshal te/ phyogs gcig du 'khod do// phyog gcig du 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
15b6('bum): chen po 'di zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
15b7('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mo dag bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang / 
15b8('bum): dges par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gi 'odog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis
16a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs mo shakya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang+ga'i
16a2('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang po der rtor to// de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gi khams de dag thams
16a3('bum): cad rgyas par khyab par gyur to// pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid la rtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can
16a4('bum): gang dgis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur te// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u
16a5('bum): dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes/ pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya sangs rgyas
16a6('bum): kyu zla ba pa la ris smrar byis so bkur gyur byas sa// sti stang dubyas so// mchod par byas nas/ byigs gcig tu 'khod de// denas sna phyogs legs su 'jig rte gi khams gaung+gA glang
16a7('bum): marjed padas bkun gyi na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba med de/ dedod bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myong de med pa
16a8('bum): zhes bya ba btsugs shing ras myong ste// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pa/ shes rab kyi kho rom du phyin pa cad da mang dag par ston pa ma'ad // nganas 'dzin
16b1('bum): rten gyi khams deran byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / se char g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
16b2('bum): sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin na
16b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa
16b4('bum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa'
16b5('bum): se mas dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa 'di skad ces nye bka' bstsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang phyogs logs su/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig
16b6('bum): rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // byang / 
16b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan
16b8('bum): med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol / bcom ldan 'das bdag kying 'jig rten gi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan/ 
17a1('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ 
17a2('bum): chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug po thams cad la dbang rab tu thob/ 
17a3('bum): ba de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de
17a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa'i dpal pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdos
17a5('bum): can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bkur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das sun
17a6('bum): mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo ga ser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / kha
17a7('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skar re nas kyang gyis la/ bud 'di dag gyis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi ning / 
17a8('bum): der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur ta re/ 
17b1('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i
17b2('bum): dpal de las/ pad+mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag
17b3('bum): khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'che skyong bar dag thams cad la me tog da
17b4('bum): spos dang / gdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir
17b5('bum): bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phral chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
17b6('bum): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcis
17b7('bum): du 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
17b8('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la sun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdoge bde ba 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgos par
18a1('bum): spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis// 
18a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag
18a3('bum): gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gangon pa der gtor to// de nas pa d+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cang rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sumang po
18a4('bum): bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyidad brtsams te chos sten to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag
18a5('bum): pa rdzogs pa'i byung chu du nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab du byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu gzugs su 'dug pa byed dag gis kyang rang bang gi dge ba'i rtsabs
18a6('bum): cos ldang ngas de bzhi nag shegs pa dgra kyi cim yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgri pa pa'is gro byas so// klu m+b+hi / byas so// chod pa byas nas/ thugs gci/ 
18a7('bum): lakhed de/ des cu byin pa logs su gan kyi 'dus pang+gA 'i gi khyim kyang das kyi leman/ log na kya ma ba na zhes byang yod de/ den nonag/ shegs
18a8('bum): bayang dag par rdzogs pa'i mangs rgyam rin ma 'odong bre zhes bya ba ba cug so shing byung bye bying na ba sems dang 'asams dpa' dzin pa rnams pa/ shes rab kyi rol du byid pa 'di cing meng dan
18b1('bum): par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// spyod pa'i glo gros shes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos
18b2('bum): pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro gang
18b3('bum): na ba dar song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra rin chen 'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher
18b4('bum): g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta ba gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyod
18b5('bum): ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gi khams gAng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams mi mjed ces bya
18b6('bum): bla yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'ami stong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnams la/ shes ra
18b7('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'ad ni de'i mthu yin nyi 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyed po'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'ong 'grol 'di ska ces gsol to// bcom
18b8('bum): ldan das yod kyang 'di rte gi la mam da pa ma ldan das pazhinag shegs pa ma btsam pa yang dag pa gas pa'i sedes rgyas ga zub pa bcwa ba da das phyag kyi
19a1('bum): bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang ngal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa// 
19a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dge blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bka'i bstsal pa/ rigs kyi
19a3('bum): bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ 
19a4('bum): gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma steng dang ldan pa stong bskurate/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhinag sh+ye/ pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ btso/ 
19a5('bum): ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang / dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog cen 'dab ma stong / 
19a6('bum): dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur re nes kyang gyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag gis kyang gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs
19a7('bum): rgyas kyi ning der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe'i chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur ta re
19a8('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'bri las/ 
19b1('bum): pad+mogs kyi mdog can 'dabum stong dang lda da pa 'di dag rlungs te/ byang chub sams dpa'akhyim pa dang / rab tudrung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu me'i gzugs su 'jug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya mying dam
19b2('bum): 'grogs te// sangs rgyas kyi ning de nas mo snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji srid cig bzhugs shing 'tsho snying ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / smos dang 'an
19b3('bum): spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim grer bye ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed ce/ 
19b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na bder
19b5('bum): dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig du 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
19b6('bum): pe spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa / bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro/ bcom ldan
19b7('bum): 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sem/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam nes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang
19b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+ma de dag bzhes nas/ nub phyogs
20a1('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bani na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba de gtor to// de nas pa d+mo de dag gis 'jig
20a2('bum): rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mod de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa
20a3('bum): de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzug
20a4('bum): su 'dug pa de dag gis rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// 
20a5('bum): bkur bstir byas so// sti stang du byas so// mchod pa byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyo de nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun
20a6('bum): gyiphyi rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ste/ de byang
20a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas
20a8('bum): byin zhes zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bltan chog mi shes pa de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
20b1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
20b2('bum): 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
20b3('bum): gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
20b4('bum): bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tshe skyeng ngo // de byang chub
20b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pa rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ 
20b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das
20b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
20b8('bum): kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i sra
21a1('bum): du mi 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pargyal pa'i dbang pos bka' bstsal pa/ rigs kyi dudaltar de'i dus la bab par shes nasang shig/ de nas debazhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang
21a2('bum): pos// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshen
21a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par
21a4('bum): spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/ pa nga rgyal ba'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur
21a5('bum): ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag kyis kyang gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi ning der bge yod par spyod cig/ phyir ne na/ 'jig rten gi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' so/ 
21a6('bum): dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis de nyams par gyur tere/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
21a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i mang sa d+ham rgyal pa'i bang bad pag padrig pa kyi mdag ba sa sto nga ldan pa dag tha ma te bya chu sa dpa pa blang dpa na pa bu ga zugs su / 
21a8('bum): dbyen drug khrig du dang grogs / sas rgyas kyi lde ba gyur dag byang phyog kyis khyim ma ldan dang gang kyi ga zugs shi mi rgya da
21b1('bum): tog dang snres dag / gdug zlos dang / gleng ba ga zug pa dang / byes dpan pa dang / gdugus dang rgya ma nga bdun dag gis ma gror byub dang bshAr sting bya ba dang / sang dbyu ba dang / mtsha
21b2('bum): byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na
21b3('bum): der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khong do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis
21b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das bkyu thub pa la 'di sa cis gsalabacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po// 
21b5('bum): ldan 'das la snyan ma mnga'a'am// gnang ba ma mchisas/ zo ma dog pade'am// sgranyams dang ldan na / bde ba dang shes pa spyod ngas zhes 'driste/ pad+mog ser gi mdog can 'dabam stong dang ldan
21b6('bum): de da kyang sa de pa'i gshegs pa rtsal ba dang sog com nanasal med pa'i nga cu po nas ma ma ma dpa nig shegs pa ba dag brji da
21b7('bum): kyi tan gyi ga gyung sa sarnam pa dugag yang ga/ des du gags
22a1('bum): chos stod do// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba dungs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpas
22a2('bum): khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
22a3('bum): sangs rgyas shAkya thub paM la rim gror byas so// bkur bster byas so// sti sdang du byas so// mchod par byas so// phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang
22a4('bum): 'ga'i klung gi bye mo snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol no// 'jig rte na gyi khams ding nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod/ rnyed/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
22a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems das sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di
22a6('bum): nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de
22a7('bum): dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ti
22a8('bum): 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
22b1('bum): 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
22b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dang ma pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa'i dpal 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// 
22b3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa drug bcwo
22b4('bum): pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ston te/ 'di ni de'i
22b5('bum): mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
22b6('bum): gyi gling po dam pa'i dpal lo 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rte dge 'a mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
22b7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi rtsa zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang / phal
22b8('bum): cher gno nur gyur pa dang / gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i spang
23a1('bum): du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' bstsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ song shig/ 
23a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ dum bu dang po// // bam po gnyis pa// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam
23a3('bum): pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems sem sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan
23a4('bum): pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhi dan gshegs pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das
23a5('bum): snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sgyu nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong
23a6('bum): dedang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad+mo/ 
23a7('bum): 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
23a8('bum): de dag mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur pa ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'dadra
23b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad+mo gser gi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag
23b2('bum): blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyis zhing de nas
23b3('bum): mi snang bar gyur to// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugaso shing mtsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / smos dang / bdug spos
23b4('bum): dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan drang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis/ rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bsti rabya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / 
23b5('bum): mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen/ po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgra bcom pa
23b6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong sde phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs
23b7('bum): gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gonon pas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
23b8('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sangs rgyas tingange 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun mi mnga' 'am/ 
24a1('bum): gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang / dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di
24a2('bum): dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
24a3('bum): gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams gi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gyid bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
24a4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mo de dag gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur pa te/ pad+me de dag la
24a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po de zhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can grang gis thos par
24a6('bum): gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug
24a7('bum): pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur
24a8('bum): stir byas so// sna stang du byas so// mchod par byas so// phyogs gcig du 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khode nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
24b1('bum): 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i byang chub kyi rgyan shin du yid la du 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
24b2('bum): sangs rgyas pod+mongam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'chi skying ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpya' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa
24b3('bum): mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi kham so na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mo zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sna cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin
24b4('bum): gshegs pa'i sku bltan chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal
24b5('bum): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcoM ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung
24b6('bum): ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gdi' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mod mo pa'i
24b7('bum): dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mo la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams legs su 'di yan chad 'jig rten gi la
24b8('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhug
25a1('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub
25a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mo sa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khas
25a3('bum): mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ 
25a4('bum): gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pra/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu tshar thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan
25a5('bum): 'das pad+mo dam pa'i dpal kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i tshe dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang
25a6('bum): chub sems dpa' lag na pad+mo la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu los byung ba gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag
25a7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'amasku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde
25a8('bum): ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gse rig mdog can 'dab ma steng dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'dra
25b1('bum): la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i
25b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' bar yin no// der nyams par 'gyur ba te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos/ bcom ldan 'dra
25b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad+mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa'
25b4('bum): khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs nga su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar lho'i phyogs
25b5('bum): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / gdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa
25b6('bum): dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba den dag gis/ rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / sti steng du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i
25b7('bum): rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu' chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der/ 
25b8('bum): deng ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
26a1('bum): chen po lag na pad+mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i/ 
26a2('bum): dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la sun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdage bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can
26a3('bum): 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo ngam pa'i dongal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slang
26a4('bum): du skur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dpa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag pa zhes nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams
26a5('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mo de dag
26a6('bum): gis 'jig rten gi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams
26a7('bum): te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim
26a8('bum): pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu ma'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
26b1('bum): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// ste stang du byas so// mchod pa byas nas/ phyogs gcig du 'khod do// de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi lam
26b2('bum): gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang / bral ba zhes bya ba yod de de na byang chub de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
26b3('bum): sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'itshe skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par
26b4('bum): ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub kyi sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yas
26b5('bum): de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po kha lta na tshi gi mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
26b6('bum): rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba drim pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcoM
26b7('bum): ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / btsa
26b8('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba de
27a1('bum): kal 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rton gyi khams mi mjed ces
27a2('bum): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'chi stong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnas
27a3('bum): la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
27a4('bum): snang ba dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// / robacom ldan 'das bdag kyi nge 'jig rten gi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa da gra bcom
27a5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta po dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kying pal
27a6('bum): cher gzhon nur gyu ro pa dang / gzungs dang / seM sau yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag po lta bri'i
27a7('bum): slang du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' bstsal pa/ rigs kyi bu do ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na so
27a8('bum): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpol gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim
27b1('bum): rab tu snang ba'i la pad+morin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab me stong dang ldan pa skyong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
27b2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das sun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sem/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ ba pa dang / dbyis par spyod dam/ 
27b3('bum): zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das
27b4('bum): mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad+mo 'di drag gis kyang gton cig/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag dru yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gi kham
27b5('bum): der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' le chen po de dge ni mgu bar dga' ba yin gyi/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
27b6('bum): chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas// bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de las pad+mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te khyod chub
27b7('bum): dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho nub kyi
27b8('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong / ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / gdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na ba
29a1('bum): dang rgyun dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / kha dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i
29a2('bum): rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste/ 
29a3('bum): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma
29a4('bum): rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol dado// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yangadag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
29a5('bum): snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam
29a6('bum): zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mog ser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang
29a7('bum): ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag
29a8('bum): bzhes nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor
29b1('bum): to// de nas pad+mo de dag gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid la
29b2('bum): brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag gis thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de banan gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shib kyang bla na med
29b3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag thaM gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan
29b4('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs dpa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// skr-i stang du byas so// mchod pa byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu
29b5('bum): 'khod do// de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa/ kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba yod de/ 
29b6('bum): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes
29b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog ces bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de/ 
29b8('bum): dang / sa cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bltan chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdugs dam pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
30a1('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di
30a2('bum): ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas/ byang
30a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po chen mchog la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal te// rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
30a4('bum): bye ma snyed 'dus pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'chi skyong / 
30a5('bum): de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de te 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
30a6('bum): chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom
30a7('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyog bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
30a8('bum): chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhonar gyur pa gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/ 
30b1('bum): de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas dka' bstsal ga rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag
30b2('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la/ pad+ma rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gi mdog can 'dab ma
30b3('bum): stong dang ldan pa/ stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ blo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang
30b4('bum): ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dra ste/ pad+mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam
30b5('bum): pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du sbyar ro/ zhes kyang gyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag gyis kyang gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ ngo tsal
30b6('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyi/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 
30b7('bum): chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag
30b8('bum): blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ nub
31a1('bum): byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / gdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye
31a2('bum): ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phral chen po
31a3('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
31a4('bum): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig du 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dza rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
31a5('bum): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis
31a6('bum): sam/ zo mdag bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba deng dgyes par spyod dam/ zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
31a7('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
31a8('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi gi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
31b1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mod dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur teg/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa
31b2('bum): sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos bstan pa to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag
31b3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan
31b4('bum): 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgad par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur ba sIr byas so// sti stang du byas so// mchod pa byas nas/ 
31b5('bum): phyogs gcig du 'khod do// de nas 'og gi phyogs mtsham su 'jig rten gyi khams gaung+ka'i klung gi bye mi snyed 'das pa na/ kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi
31b6('bum): khams pad+mo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo 'dipal zhes bya ba ba ni gas shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems
31b7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug
31b8('bum): 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
32a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i di dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal de la 'di skad
32a2('bum): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces
32a3('bum): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pa la 'di skad ces
32a4('bum): bka' bstsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshes
32a5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya te/ thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
32a6('bum): byin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin dade 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo ma pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// \u0f7f
32a7('bum): ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btso pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyon
32a8('bum): bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug
32b1('bum): pa thams cad la dbang du rab tu thob pa/ de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i dpal gyis bka' bstsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ 
32b2('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pas/ pad+mo rin po che
