85b8('bum): dag pa zhes bya ngas bshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin
86a1('bum): ba la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du byin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi
86a2('bum): duphyin pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod de// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ byang chub ses
86a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ni ma lus la dmigs pa med pa dang / ngag dang yid la dmigs pa med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa
86a4('bum): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
86a5('bum): pal dmigs pa med pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / yang dag
86a6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med par gyur pa de ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad
86a7('bum): la dmigs pa med cing / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba de med pa'o// sha ra di ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam de lta bus pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod cing / nan tan du byed pa de dag
86a8('bum): ni sus kyang thub par med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul ji lta bur spyod pa rnams/ thub pa ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
86b1('bum): bka' bstsal pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la rlom sems med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
86b2('bum): byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rlom sems med pa dang / mig dang gzugs la rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / ro dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / yid dang / 
86b3('bum): chos la rlom sems med pa dang / sa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i las
86b4('bum): la rlom sems med pa dang / mig gi khams la rlom/ sems med pa dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba'i khas
86b5('bum): dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i dzA/ nye par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khas
86b6('bum): dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khas dang / yid kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / chos kyi
86b7('bum): khams la rlom sems med pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rlom sems med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la
86b8('bum): rlom sems med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes ra
87a1('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la rlom sems med pa dang / dran
87a2('bum): banye bar bzhag pa bani dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / spobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
87a3('bum): brgyad pa la rlom sems med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i smos
87a4('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par thar pa nga brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgul rlom sems med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
87a5('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rlom sems med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom
87a6('bum): sems med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 
87a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rlom sems med pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
87a8('bum): dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems med par dang / rang byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyil rlom sems med pa dang / bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzog
87b1('bum): pa'i byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'dras pa la rlom sems med par gyur pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni pha rol du phyin
87b2('bum): ba drug gis rnam par 'phel ba yin te/ sus kyang thub pa med do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas te/ thams cad
87b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / ye shes de dang ldan pas nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye/ mi dbul zhing phongs par nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur te/ lus gang
87b4('bum): dang ldan pas/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nang na/ smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do// de
87b5('bum): nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
87b6('bum): chen po nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mi dbul zhing phongs par nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi nang na
87b7('bum): smad par gyur pa de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul pa/ sha ra da ti'i bu/ byang chub
87b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge
88a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi byem snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan // byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ning yon tan rnam par bye
88a2('bum): dag kyang mthong ngo // lho dang / nub byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub bang drang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye
88a3('bum): ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyi nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sang
88a4('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yangs sa gi yon tan rnam par bye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dadapa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes ma
88a5('bum): bskyed do// chos kyi 'du shes dang / dge 'dun gi'adu shes mi bskyed do// nyan thos kyi 'du shes dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'dun
88a6('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do// bdag gi 'du shes mi bsnyed do// gzhan gi 'du shes mi skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi bskyed do// ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang
88a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin po spyod de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
88a8('bum): du phyin pa mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du
88b1('bum): byin pa mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ shes rab kyi
88b2('bum): rol du phyin po mi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid sgo ste/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi dmig
88b3('bum): nyid mi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar ba nag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
88b4('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgo ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gta ni
88b5('bum): rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugasamed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems
88b6('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sgoms ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmyigs so// ting nge
88b7('bum): 'dzin dang / rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgo ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
88b8('bum): rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so// rgyunang zhugs
89a1('bum): ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la sgom ste/ rnam pa thams cad
89a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid mi dmyigs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/ ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sa
89a3('bum): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
89a4('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ da mig lnga rab tu thob pa/ yongs su sbyong ba yid do// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes ra
89a5('bum): kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mig go/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa
89a6('bum): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang
89a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad nyis brgya dang / sum brgya dang / bzhi brgya dang / lnga brgya dang / stong gi cha dang / mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
89a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis 'dzam bu'i gling mthong ba yod do// sha'i mig gis gling gnyis dang gling gsum dang / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// 
89b1('bum): sha'i mig gis snong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ sha'i mig gis stong gsu
89b2('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams mthong ba yod do// sha ra da ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ sha'i mig gis yongs su dog pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
89b3('bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po// lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal ba/ shwa ra dwa ti'i bu/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi
89b4('bum): lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rang tu shes so// sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mche ma dang / dga'/ ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
89b5('bum): dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / 
89b6('bum): chung dag dang / tshad med dge ba dang / rkye rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 
89b7('bum): 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i mig gi de ni/ rgyal ba chen
89b8('bum): bo bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ba ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / 
90a1('bum): tshangs lta nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang sdang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med
90a2('bum): dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin du shing ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis
90a3('bum): mi shes te/ lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi/ 
90a4('bum): 'pho ba dang / skye ba rab tu shes so// lho dang / nub deng / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lci nub dang / nub bya da dang / 'og dang / steng ge phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig
90a5('bum): chen gi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba rab tu shes so// shar de ni bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
90a6('bum): lha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin mig yongs su dge pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
90a7('bum): kyis bka' bstsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa sa// 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ dge ba'am/ 
90a8('bum): dge ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang med pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das
90b1('bum): ba'i zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ reg pa med pa'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas/ chos gang yang ma mthong ba 'am/ mtho ba'am ma bsams pa
90b2('bum): 'am/ khong du chud pa med pa ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
90b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa la gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i buta'adi la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
90b4('bum): chos kyi mig gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba gang zag 'di ni stong pa/ nyid la gnas te/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam
90b5('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
90b6('bum): mthong ba'i skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tsom med pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs snyems pa'i kun du sbyor ba gsuM
90b7('bum): rab tu spong bar gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyu nang zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des sgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gi no de sems rab tu srabs par byed de/ 
90b8('bum): gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// de la ma de nyid de bas kyang shin du bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong bar thob par byed de/ gang zag 'di na
91a1('bum): phyir mi nga // de las de nyid de bas kyang shin du bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dag ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / 
91a2('bum): rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni dag bcom pa'o// gang zag 'di mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro// 
91a3('bum): dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ba nas/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'i ba
91a4('bum): zhes bya'o// gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pas/ 'di'i dbang po ljin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa skye bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i
91a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam pa'i grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ba nas/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o zhes
91a6('bum): bya ba rab tu shes te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
91a7('bum): chen pos gang ci yang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos can de dag thams cad ni 'gag pa'i chos can no// zhes bya bar shes pas/ dbang po lnga thob par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sha radadwa ti 'bu/ 
91a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig dang / gis byang chub
91b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson
91b2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang ba dang ldan te/ 
91b3('bum): thabs mkhas paso/ ched du bsams te/ lus yongs su 'dzin to// dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rig
91b4('bum): su skye'o// bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang / khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o// rgyal chen bzhi da ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha'i
91b5('bum): nang du skye'o// mtshe'i lha'i nang du skye'o// dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye'o// 'phrul dga'i lho'i nang du skye'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lho'i nang du skye'o// de dag na gnas sha
91b6('bum): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de dag la rim gror byed par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi ning yang yongs su dag par byed do// de bzhin
91b7('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / sti stang dang / mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// nyan
91b8('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon por sangs rgyas kyi bar
92a1('bum): du phyir ldeg par mi 'gyur re zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o// shA
92a2('bum): da ti'i bu gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o// 'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o// 'di ni nges pa'o// 
92a3('bum): 'di ni mnges pa'o// 'di ni lung bstan par 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni lung bstan par mi 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ste/ dbang po thob pa'o// 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ma yin pa ste/ 
92a4('bum): dbang po ma thob pa'o// 'di ni mngon par shes pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa'o// 'di ni mngon par shes pa ma yongs su ma rdzog dpa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
92a5('bum): 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song shing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
92a6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / sti steng dang / mchod pa byed do// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho
92a7('bum): dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
92a8('bum): bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / sti stang dang / mchod pa byed do// 'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'dis ni mngon par
92b1('bum): shes pa thob par mi 'gyur ro// 'dis ni bzod pa thob pa'o// 'dis ni bzod pa thob pa ma yin no// 'di ni dbang thob pa'o// 'di ni dbang po thob pa ma yin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' dus
92b2('bum): dpa' chen po/ 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smom
92b3('bum): chen po dang ldan pa'o// 'di ni smon lam chen po dang mi ldan pa'o// 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par byas so// 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par ma byas so// byang chub sems dpa'
92b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig/ rten gi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas btso/ ldan 'das rnams logs pa brjod pa mdzad do// 'di
92b5('bum): la ni legs pa brjod pa mi mdzad do// byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas pa 'gyur ro// 'di dag ni nye bar
92b6('bum): gnas par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byang chub thob nas/ che dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// 'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro// 'di'i 'od dang dbyang
92b7('bum): dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun ni tshad med par 'gyur ro// 'di ni tshad yod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
92b8('bum): chub du mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'di ni ldan lnga par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni dka' ba spyod par 'gyur ro// 'dzin
93a1('bum): dka' ba spyod par mi 'gyur ro// 'di srid pa tham pa'o// 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no// 'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'dug par mi 'gyur ro// 
93a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par 'gyur ro// 'di dag la ni bdud yod par mi 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de ltar na sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang
93a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su
93a4('bum): dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes su la rdo rje
93a5('bum): lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid thob par byed de/ de ni de bzhin ga gye pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi
93a6('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs
93a7('bum): pa med pa dang ldan par yin/ de ni de'i mig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig de dang ldan pas/ rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba 'am/ ma thos pa 'am/ ma shes pa 'am/ 
93a8('bum): khong du ma chud pa gang yang med de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas
93b1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o// gar dra tI'i bu de ltar byang chub sems depa' sems dpa' chen pa mig lnga yongs su sbyong bar 'dod dadang / thob par 'ad pas
93b2('bum): phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug du dge ba'i chos thams cad me lus pa med de/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos srin
93b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu la la zhig yang dag par smra bas/ dge ba'i rtsa chos thams cad 'dus par brjod pa nig
93b4('bum): dgos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dge bar smra bas brjod de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes ra kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang
93b5('bum): mig lnga skyed pa'o// mig lnga po de dag la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
93b6('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ mngon par shes pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rab tu 'thob ste/ rdzu
93b7('bum): 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do// de ni sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yo bar byed de/ gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro// mang por gyur cing / gcig du 'gyur ro// snang ba
93b8('bum): dang / mi snang ba yang nyams su myong bar byed do// rtsig pa las thal ba dang / ra ba las thal ba dang / ri bo las thal bar thogs pa med pa'i lus kyis 'gro ste/ dper na na mkha' la bya ba bzhin
94a1('bum): nod nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no// sal yang gyen du 'byung ba dang / 'og tu 'dzul po byed de/ dper na chu las bya ba
94a2('bum): bzhin no// tshu la yang 'bring ba med par 'gro ste/ dper na sa las bya ba bzhin no// du bar 'thul ning myer 'bar te/ dper ne me'i phung po chen po bzhin no// nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'di dag 'di lta
94a3('bum): rdzu 'phrul che la 'di ltar mthu che zhing / 'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang lag pas byugs shing / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur te/ rdzu 'phrul des rlom sems su 'gyur ba
94a4('bum): med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis steng ba dang / rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang / rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir ro// des rdzu 'phrul gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur/ 
94a5('bum): ba'i rdzu 'phral de lta bu mi dmyigs te/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul lam/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam
94a6('bum): yang mi skyed de// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gi rnam pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes
94a7('bum): pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas lha dang mi gnyis ka'i sgra thos te/ lha'i rno ba'i khams des bdag ni sgra nyan ces bya bar
94a8('bum): rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de ni 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/ rna ba dang / sgra dmigs pa med do// de thams cad
94b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par/ lha'i na pa'i khams la bsams pa yang mi skyed do// shA ra de'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 
94b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i rna ba'i khams mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no// // dum bu dang po/ 
94b3('bum): bam po drug pa// de nas sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
94b4('bum): 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la/ 'dod chags/ dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji/ lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang bral
94b5('bum): ba'i sems la/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang ldang ldan pa'i sems la/ zhe sdang dang ldan
94b6('bum): pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang med pa'i sems la/ zhe sdang med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
94b7('bum): gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la/ gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la/ gauti mug dang
94b8('bum): bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la/ sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ra
95a1('bum): tu shes so// sred pa dang bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems lan
95a2('bum): bar len pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzag sems shes bya bar yang dag par ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye bar len pa med pa'i sems la nye bar len pa med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag/ 
95a3('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// kun nas 'dus pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par 'bros pa'i sems sa
95a4('bum): rnam par 'bros pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dge ba/ ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rgya chung ngu'i sems la rgya rlung ngu'i sems shes bya bar yang dag par jilta pa
95a5('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so// rgya che ba'i sems la rgya tsha sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yangs pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sems shes
95a6('bum): bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// che bar gyur pa'i sems la che ba'i gyur ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag par rab tu shes so// ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chang
95a7('bum): med pa'i sems la tshad med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems shes bya bar yang
95a8('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i mnyam pa rim banag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par grol ba'i
95b1('bum): sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems shes bya bar bya yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// rnam par ma grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag par ji lta
95b2('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zag pa dang bcos pa'i la zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la shes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab du shes so// bgo ba med pa'i sems can ma
95b3('bum): zag pa med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba
95b4('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems shes bya b.rayang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bla na yod pa'i sems
95b5('bum): la bla na yod pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bla na med pa'i sems la bla na med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
95b6('bum): rab tu shes ste/ gnan gi sems shes pa des/ rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med do// de ni 'di ltar sems de nyid bsam gis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de ni bdag shes so zhes bya bar rlom
95b7('bum): su mi byed do// 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes/ pa'i phyir/ gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur// de lta bu'i sems mi dmyigs te/ thams cad mkhyen
95b8('bum): pa nyid yid la bya bar ma gtogs par/ sems shes bya ba'i bsam pa 'am/ sems shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam du mi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
96a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub
96a2('bum): ba yin no// de ni sbyin gi glanas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rnam pa du ma mngon par sgrub ste/ sems gcig tu kyang rjes su dran pa nas sems brgya'i bar du 'ang
96a3('bum): rjes su dran no// nyi ma gcig nas nyi ma brgya dang / zla bo gcig nas zla ba brgya dang / lo gcig nas lo brgya dang / skal ba gcig nas bskal pa brgya dang / sprul pa brgya phrag du ma nas/ skul
96a4('bum): pa stong phrag du ma dang / skal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang rjes su dran te/ bdag ni de lta bu zhig/ na 'dug 'dug ste/ ming ni 'di zhes bya/ rus ni 'di zhes bya/ rigs
96a5('bum): ni 'di zhes bya/ kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/ yun ni 'di srid gcig du 'dug 'dug/ tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig du gyur ste/ de ltar bdag do nas shi 'phos nas/ che ga
96a6('bum): mo zhig du spyos so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/ gtan tshig dang bcas/ dan rtags pa dang bcas par/ bdag dang gzhan
96a7('bum): gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran te/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bye ba des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de ni 'di ltar ye shes de ye shes ma yin te/ bas
96a8('bum): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ de ni bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ 'di ltar des ye shes des kyang rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang
96b1('bum): bzhi na ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes mi dmyigs so// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par/ rjes su dran pa'i ye shes kyi
96b2('bum): don du bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sngon gi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon
96b3('bum): du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no// de ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa/ mi las 'das pas/ sems can 'chi lo dang / skye ba dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog
96b4('bum): mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / ngan song na gnas pa dang / bde 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dag
96b5('bum): ldan pa dag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur ba 'debs pa log par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen
96b6('bum): kyis lus zhig nas/ ngan song dang / ngan 'gro log par ltung ba'i sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o// sems can 'di dag ni/ lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang / ldan pa/ ngag gis legs
96b7('bum): par skyed pa dgra dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phagaso pa la skur ba mo 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro
96b8('bum): mtho ras kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// de ltar phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klags pas/ nam
97a1('bum): mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gi 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa rnams kyi skye ba dang 'chi 'pho yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur
97a2('bum): ba med do// de ni 'di ltar mig de mig ma yin pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya bar rlom sems med de// de yang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang
97a3('bum): bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i mig de lta bu des mi dmyigs te/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par/ 
97a4('bum): lha'i mig bsam pa'am/ lcug mig mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam po tsam yang mi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
97a5('bum): pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// lha'i mig mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes po'i ye shes mngon pasgrub pa yin no// de ni zag pa dang zad pa mngon du bya ba
97a6('bum): mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub kyang / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'thob par mi byed do// gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur
97a7('bum): ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang mi mthong ngo // de mngon par shes pa des rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byas nas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam pa spang
97a8('bum): bar byed de/ zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa des/ rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de ni 'di ltar ye shes de nyid ye shes ma yin ning / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir
97b1('bum): te/ de bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// de yang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems
97b2('bum): su 'gyur ba'i zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa de lta bu ma dmyigs so// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par zag pa zang po'i ye shes kyi bsam
97b3('bum): pra 'am/ zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do// de ltar sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab
97b4('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa zadang mngon du bya ba mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngo por sgrub par yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
97b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen go shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod cing / mngon par shes pa drug tha yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ bla na med pa yang drag par
97b6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rnam par 'phel ba'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin
97b7('bum): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa lnga gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ chags pa med pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyil mo sbyong ba dag
97b8('bum): kyang yod do// shaur dwa ti'i bu 'dri ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / 
99a1('bum): mtha' yas 'das pa stong ba nyid kyi phyir ltung ba bya ba med pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dri
99a2('bum): ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa 'i
99a3('bum): mi 'khrug pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 
99a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson de 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ lus dang sems kyi brtse
99a5('bum): 'grus mi bshi ga ba'i nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyangayod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ra yang byang chub sems
99a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bsam gtananig pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'khrug pa med
99a7('bum): pa'i sems la nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyor ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes
99a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi 'chal ba'i sems mi dmyigs pa nye bar/ 
99b1('bum): bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir skyong ba dag kyang yod do// shA ra dwa ti 'di de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed
99b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'ong ba medo pa dang / 'gro ba med pa nye bar bzung ba dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa nye bar bzung
99b3('bum): bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba yin no// de la sbyin pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa nye bar bzung bas las gdags so// tshul khrims ni tshul khrims ngan pa
99b4('bum): nye bar bzung ba las gdagaso so// bzod pa nide 'khrug pa med pa nye bar bzung ba lags so// brtson 'grus ni le lo nye bar bzung ba las gdags so// ting
99b5('bum): nge 'dzin ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so// shes rab ni shes rab 'chal pa nya bar bzung ba las gtags te/ da ni rgal te zhes bya bar
99b6('bum): rlom sems med do// margal to zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// sbyin pa byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// sbyin pa mi byed do// zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// yul khrims
99b7('bum): dang ldan pa no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// tshul khrims ngan pa can ni zhe bya bar rlom sems med do// kha zod pa phun sum tshogs so zhes bya bar rlom sems med de/ khro ba can
99b8('bum): ne zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// le la can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// mnyam par bzhag pa'o zhes
100a1('bum): bya bar rlomasems med do// mnyam par ma banag pa'i zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// shes rab dang ldan no// zhes rlom sems med do// shes rab 'chal pa can no zhes bya bar
100a2('bum): rlom sems med do// spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// rim gro ma byas so zhes bya
100a3('bum): bar rlom sems med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra da ti'i bu ma skyes pa ni/ spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// rim gro byas so zhes bya bar
100a4('bum): rlom sems med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar she da rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni rlom sems thams cad yang dag par dag cing pa'i phyir te/ 'di la sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
100a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la
100a6('bum): med de/ de'i yon tan 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/ rnam pa thams cad ma
100a7('bum): pa nyid kyang thob par byed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gan no yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i
100a8('bum): sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed nas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob bo// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob nas/ chos thams cad
100b1('bum): mnyam pa nyid la sems can thams cad rab tu 'god dedo// de ni 'di nyid la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs su byon cing dben par bya ba yin te/ byang chub sems
100b2('bum): dpa' thams cad dang nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yid du 'ong zhing / dben par bya ba yin te/ de ni skye ba gang dang gang du skyes kyang / de dang de dag
100b3('bum): dunam yang mig gis yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs mi mthong ngo // rna bas yid du 'ong ba'i sgra mi thos so// snas yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri mi tsher ro// lces yid du mi 'ong ba'i ri mi myong ngo // 
100b4('bum): lus kyis yid du mi 'ong ba'i reg bya mi reg go// yid kyis yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnam par rig pa med do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
100b5('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyam par mi 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi
100b6('bum): pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ dge slong sum brgya sa gos gyon gyon pa/ bcom ldan 'das la yon du gsol to// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du ses
100b7('bum): bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig lag bar nas/ pus mo g.yas
100b8('bum): nga'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
101a1('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ de skad ces
101a2('bum): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// dga' bo dge slong sum brgya po 'di dag ni bskol pa drug bcu rtsa gcig 'das nas/ bskal
101a3('bum): pata dpe skar ma lta bu la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal chen po zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // de dag ni 'di nas shi'i phos
101a4('bum): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi skul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye'o// 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu/ stong phrag drug
101a5('bum): bcus kyang / bla na med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang / chub du sems bskyed de/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sa pa'i sangs rgyas
101a6('bum): byams pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de nyid du rab tu byung nas/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa des kyang / de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
101a7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro// de na mi sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ de'i tshe'akhor ba'i ba de dag 'drin la 'dru ba bzhin du shAr phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi dang slong mthong bar gyur to/ 
101a8('bum): lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / brang shar dang / shar lho dang / lce nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi nong steng bar mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khas
101b1('bum): de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi ning gi yon tan rnam par phye ba/ gang ji lta bur mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang
101b2('bum): mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gi khams 'di na yod par mthong ngo // de nas 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags stong phrag bcus/ bdag cag gis las gang byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
101b3('bum): dag du skye bar 'gyur ba'i de lta bu'i las spyad par bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ zhal mdzum pa
101b4('bum): mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo bstan los/ langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lci nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
101b5('bum): 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar bas btang de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
101b6('bum): rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyun ci'i rkyen kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ dga' bo srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag
101b7('bum): mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ dga' bo sreg chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas
101b8('bum): kyi ning de dag du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang yang nam du yang ma 'bral te/ phyi ma'i dus na de bzhin gshegs
102a1('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan gyi rgyal ba zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa me
102a2('bum): 'gal chen po'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa shes bya'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / dge slong gzhan dag kyang kun gyis mngon par shes pa shin du
102a3('bum): mang ba dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin du mang po dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge bsnyen ma shin du mang bdag gis/ ma
102a4('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ byang nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
102a5('bum): rol du phyin pa chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ru sems dpa' chen po// rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa yangs
102a6('bum): pa'o// pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dam pa'o// pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rab po// pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni phul lo// pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mchog go/ pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gya nom pa'o// pha rol
102a7('bum): du phyin pa 'di ni thob po// pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bla na mo mchis pa'o// pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni lhag na ma mchis pa'o// pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa ma mchis pa'o// pha rol du phyin
102a8('bum): ba 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dra ba ma mchis pa'o// pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'o// pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'o// bcom ldan
102b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
102b2('bum): kyis pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i
102b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa'adi ni yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa
102b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems/ dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni yon ton thams cad dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dzi
102b5('bum): lnga ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa thub pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
102b6('bum): 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // yongs su rtong pa'o yongs su gtong bar 'gyur/ 
102b7('bum): de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur ro// yongs su rdzogaso par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam
102b8('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// de 'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
103a1('bum): thob par gyur to thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
103a2('bum): kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims spangs so// srung ngo srung bar 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa
103a3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// 'thob par 'gyur 'gyur ro// de'i slad
103a4('bum): du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab
103a5('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i bzod pa sgoms so sgom me sgom par 'gyur ro// / 
103a6('bum): de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
103a7('bum): pa'i lus thob par gyur to// 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tho za par 'gyur te/ mas sa chus
103a8('bum): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus brtsams so// brtsom mo// 
103b1('bum): rtsom par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
103b2('bum): de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// thob po 'thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
103b3('bum): byang chub thob par gyur to// thob bo 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/ mi man/ 
103b4('bum): ba dang mnyam pa'i bsam gtan bskyed par gyur te skyed do// skyed par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam po'i bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
103b5('bum): gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so yongs su rdzogs pa 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur te// thob po 'thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang / 
103b6('bum): mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur to// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i
103b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i se shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms so// bsgom mo// sgom par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du
103b8('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
104a1('bum): lus thob par gyur to// 'thob po// theb par 'gyur ro// de'i srang du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rjes 'ahrIn+da ste/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubathob
104a2('bum): gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam po'i gzugs
104a3('bum): be rnyes par gyur to// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa brnyes par gyur to// mi mnyam pa dang maH
104a4('bum): ba'i byang chub tu mngon par byang chub nas/ mi mnyam pa/ dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to// 'das/ da pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nas dang / 
104a5('bum): ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad
104a6('bum): pas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs brnyes par gyur to// brnyes so// brnyes par 'gyur ro// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
104a7('bum): par shes pa brnyes par gyur to// brnyes so brnyes par 'gyur ro// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems rab tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
104a8('bum): chos kyi 'khyer lo bskor bar gyur to// skor ro// skor bar 'gyur ro// de lta lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// chos thams cad kyi pha
104b1('bum): rol du phyin par 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
104b2('bum): 'di la spyod pa de dag ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gis phyag bgyi ba lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de
104b3('bum): dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du
104b4('bum): smras pa bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' da chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa dag ni/ da lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
104b5('bum): tan gyis phyag bya ba 'os pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ mi'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
104b6('bum): ro// lha'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang / bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang / khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs
104b7('bum): dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / rgyal chen ba ni'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtsham dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gnan 'phrul
104b8('bum): dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge
105a1('bum): dang rlung dge dang tshad med dge ba dang / dbye rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mchi ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin du
105a2('bum): mthong ba dang / gya ne me snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyun du bzhugs dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dad
105a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
105a4('bum): sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ bza' ba dang / gtung ba dang / gzhon pa dang / 
105a5('bum): gos dang / mal cha dang / khyim dang / 'tsho ba dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / dang dang / mal shel dang / bye ru dang / gser dang / dngul dag kyang 'jig rten
105a6('bum): dad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag kyang sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad mi rkyen dang / lha rdzas su bya ba dang / yang dag par bral ba'i bde ba yang rung ste/ de dag thams
105a7('bum): cod kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa ni/ byang
105a8('bum): sems dpa'i skud ba skyed pa'i che/ pha rol du byin pa drug la gnas te/ bdag sbyin pa yongs su gtang ni tsug nono lang byen pa la yongs su sbyor ro// bdag tshul khrims srung ni / gnan
105b1('bum): yang tshul khrims la sbyor / bdag bzod pa rlom ning/ gnan yang bzod pa la sbyor ro// bdag brtsom grus cas ning / gzhan yang ba rgyan rnags la sbyar ra// bdag blas
105b2('bum): gtan skyed cing / gnon yang bsam gtan pa ster ro// bdag shes rab sgom ning / gan na yang shes rab 'i sbyor ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pos rten cing
105b3('bum): rgyun rnams pa rol du phyin pa drugs spyod de/ de dag la rol du byin pa drug la spyad bas/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'dres pa'i phun sum chags pa thams cad thob bo// 
105b4('bum): kyi bu dag de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i de ni du zhugs pa yin no// de nas bcom
105b5('bum): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ zhal gi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'dra khyab par mdzad do// de nas de'i
105b6('bum): tsheljags kyi dbang po de las 'od 'phro ba khe dog du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs su ldan pa mang po byung bar gyur to// de byung nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
105b7('bum): gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to// lho dang / nu ba dang / byang shar dang / sher lho dang / lho nu ba dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig
105b8('bum): rten gi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to// de nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten go khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gis/ byang chub
106a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'od rnam par phye bdag mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la nus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
106a2('bum): lhar 'jig rten gi khyams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags nes yongs su dris so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' bstsal pa
106a3('bum): rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni nub phyogs logs na/ 'jig rten gi khams mi mjed ces bya bar yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
106a4('bum): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnaMs
106a5('bum): la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa'iphyir/ 'jig rten gi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyeng po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// 
106a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan po'i phyir phyogs bcu'i phyogs ri'i bar du 'jig rten gi khams gang+ga'i klung
106a7('bum): gi bye mo snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di
106a8('bum): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ bdag cag kyong/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
106b1('bum): thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag kyang blta ba dang / 
106b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yang mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' bsngal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la bab par shes na de
106b3('bum): shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi zhabs la spyi bos
106b4('bum): phyag 'tshal nas/ len bdun du g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas te/ phyogs bcu nas gtugs nas/ rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i bdan dang / me tog dang / bre
106b5('bum): bo dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs khyer te/ glu
106b6('bum): dang / rol mo brdung ba dang / bkrol ba mang pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na bdor ro
106b7('bum): denas rgya mchen bani'i ris kyi lharnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshom dang / dge' sun dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / sangs ris dang / 
106b8('bum): tshangs ldan 'an dang / tshangs bkun pa'ar dge/ ngas chen dang/ snang bdag/ sung sna dang / tshadi me snang bdang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge pa dang / chung dge dang / 
107a1('bum): dge dang na nga/ bdag / chung bye dang / dadu pa dang / 'bras bum 'a sa gnas gtsang sa dang / shin du byung ba dang / gyanas srung ba dang / ma
107a2('bum): dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams dang / lha rdzas dang / kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / gdug pa dang / phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang / 
107a3('bum): pad+mo dang du kr-i mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang / lha rdzas kyi man dar ba dang / mnad rab chen po dang / ke sa ra dang / ta ma la'i 'dab ma mang po khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
107a4('bum): bdagra bco mo po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de dag dang lha de dag gis
107a5('bum): me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / gdug paM dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan de dag gis/ bcom ldan
107a6('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la gtor to// mngon par gtor to// de nas me tog la sogs pa de dag stong gsum gyi
107a7('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi bkab ba ni dang ldan pa/ cha kun du mnyam pa shin du rnam par
107a8('bum): bye ba/ mdangs dga' ning yid du 'ong bar rid de 'dug go// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dums mi skye ba'i tshes la bzod pa rab tu thib po// 
107b1('bum): de nas de dag snyan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs par
107b2('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang brnyes par gyur pa'i chos kyi rnam pa de lta bu thams cad thob par gyur te/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'di lta bu ni yongs su bsdu
107b3('bum): bgyi'o// da ltar 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas chos ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du 'khor 'di dang 'dra bar ni chos bstan par bgyi'o zhes smon lam btab pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
107b4('bum): rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ chos thams cad la skye ba med par dang / 'gag pa med pa de dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa
107b5('bum): la bzod par gyur pa mkhyen nas/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga'o bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa go cig la gzar nas/ pus mogs
107b6('bum): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// / bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan
107b7('bum): 'dus rnams ni mye nga/ rgyun ma mchis par ba nad pa mi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ dga' bo 'di na sa/ 
107b8('bum): srog chags bye'i khrag khrog brgya phrag sung gis mi skye ba'i chos la brjod pa za'i bar gyur ro// de deg ni ma 'angs pa'i dus nesal ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag drugatu brgyad ni/ bzhin
108a1('bum): pa me tog gi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi yan lag me tog ces bya bar sha stag
108a2('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las// / sha ri'i bu'i l-i'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// 
108a3('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' bstsol pa/ rab 'byor khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
108a4('bum): phyin pa rtsom ste/ ci nas kyang byang chub sems dang sems dpa'i chen po rnamaso/ shes rab kyi pha rol du nga phyin pa la 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi gang
108a5('bum): bya bar spobs pa skyed cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam ste/ 
108a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di rang gi shes rab dang spobs pa tsam gyi stobs dang / shugs kyi chas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston tam/ 
108a7('bum): 'on tam sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston par 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos
108a8('bum): chen po de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi kun du rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shos nas/ tshwa dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu le smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
108b1('bum): nyan thos rnams ni/ gang ni yang rung / gang ci ston kyang rung / glang ci brjod kyang rung ste/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang / 
108b2('bum): bstan pa de thams cad kyang chos nyid dang mi 'gal lo// de ltar rigs kyi bu de dag ni chos bstan pa de la slob pa cing / chos nyid de lta bu mngon du byed do// sha rA dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin
108b3('bum): gshegs pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thabs kyi ston pa mdzad kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
108b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor gyis
108b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bgyi ba 'am/ shes
108b6('bum): rab kyi rol du phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'dams gang gi tshig bla dgas 'gos/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' nos dbye ba 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol du rin pa rnas pa
108b7('bum): dAdi lta bu bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de dang / byang chub ses da / 
108b8('bum): mi dmeng yang dag par rjes su ma mthing na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni su nig/ shes rab kyi pa rom du phyin pa na sunig/ gos rab kyi rom du byed pa na
109a1('bum): nigal gla dmas shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor
109a2('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpe'i ming du bya ba de dag ni ming tsam ste/ ming de ni nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med/ gzhi
109a3('bum): kA med par yang mi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can sems can zhes bya bar ming du gautags pa'i ming de na gi dwags pa tsam ste/ btags pa'i chos can gang
109a4('bum): yin pa de la ni/ ming dang brda' rtsam du tha snyad da kyis gdags pa/ ma gtogs par/ skye ba'am/ 'gag pa tsa med de/ ming de ni/ nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med//

109a7('bum): ste/ btagos po'i chos gang yin pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa tsam gtogs par/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa med de/ ming de ni nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med/

109b1('bum): gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang btags btsam ste/ btag pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni/ ming dang brda' tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa med de/ nga

109b7('bum): thams cad na tshi su gdags pa tsam du zad de chos su gdags pa de la ni ming dang brda' tsam du tha snyad kyis gdagos po ma gtogs par skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa med de/ ming de ni nang na yang

110a1('bum): ces ming dang brda' tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags bam gtogs par/ skye ba'am 'gag pa med de/ ming de ni nang mkha' na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med/ gnyis/

110a7('bum): du tha snyad kyis gdogs pa ma gtogs par/ skye ba'am/ 'gag pa med de/ ming de ni nang na yang med/ phyi rol ni yang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmyigs so// rab 'byor mig gi khas
