161a6('bum): 'dres pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa ma
161a7('bum): mchis/ ma 'ongs pa ma mchis pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag phyir rje su ma mthong ste/ de la ci zhes bgyi zhe na/ de ni 'dus
161a8('bum): ma bgyis te/ 'dus ma bgyis pa ni 'das pa dang / ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa ma lags/ da ltar byung ba ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'dus ma bgyis kyis 'phen
161b1('bum): ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjesu ma mthong / 'dus ma bgyis de yang gang zhe na/ gang la skye ba ma mchis/ gnas pa ma mchis/ 'jig pa ma mchis pa ste/ 
161b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su mo mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig
161b3('bum): rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems
161b4('bum): dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lho dang / nu be dang / byang dang / byang sher dang
161b5('bum): shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'gra'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
161b6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjesu ma mthong
161b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang
161b8('bum): bcas pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes
162a1('bum): bstan par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni glang zhig rtags par bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de yang gnas pa ma mchis rta thag
162a2('bum): pa ma mchis/ byin gyis rlabs pa ma mchis/ dge 'dun gi ming dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis
162a3('bum): te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis
162a4('bum): chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du ga dwags par bgyi/ bcom ldan
162a5('bum): 'das chos thams cad kyi dri bzhin nyid kyi ming dri yang gnas phra ma mchis/ thug phra ma mchis/ byin gis rlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar
162a6('bum): na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis rlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang yang 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes chos kyi brdar
162a7('bum): bgyi ba dang / chos su gdags pa de yang phung po 'am/ khams sam/ skye mched dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar du ma mchis te/ chos su gdags par
162a8('bum): tsam du bas so// chos su gdags pa de/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sgyu ma dang / sgra bstan dang / mig
162b1('bum): yor dang \u0f7fsmyig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha'
162b2('bum): zhes bgyi ba'i mong ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi sro// chu dang me dang / rlung zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang
162b3('bum): brjod du ma mchis so// de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / 
162b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' brasam gyis mi khyab ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// 
162b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
162b6('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i mi ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// tshul khrims zhes
162b7('bum): bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis// ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis
162b8('bum): kyang brjod du ma mchi so// rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos shes bgyi ba'i ming na gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis/ 
163a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// dgra bcom pa'i chos shes bgyi ba'i mang ni grang
163a2('bum): gas kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rang sangs rgyas shes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos shes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du mchis
163a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// byang chub sems dpa'i chos shes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjed du ma mchis so// yang dag
163a4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos shes bgyi ba'i mang yang gang gis kyang
163a5('bum): brjod du ma mchis so// dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang / bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa 'am/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal
163a6('bum): ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag ma mchis pa 'am/ zhi ba 'am/ ma zhi ba 'am/ dben pa 'am/ mi dben pa 'am/ dngos po yod pa 'am/ dngos po ma mchis pa grang gis kyang brjod du ma
163a7('bum): mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis don gyi dbang de lta bu mthong ba'i slad du/ de skad du bdag gis chos thams cad kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes
163a8('bum): ma mthong ba de bzhin du/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bgyi bar ming du gdags pa ni/ bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur/ 
163b1('bum): zhes gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar ming de ni gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis rlabs pa ma mchis ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ 
163b2('bum): de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis rlabs pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/

163b4('bum): zhing / 'gyod pa ma mchis la/ mi 'jigs mi sdang / skrag padra mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges par phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems

163b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ des gzugs la gnas par ma bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par
163b7('bum): mi bgyi'o// des mig la gnas par bgyi'o// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yi la gnas par bgyi'o// des gzugs la gnasde par mi bgyi'o// sgra dang / dI dang / ro dang / 
163b8('bum): reg dang / chos la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par she
164a1('bum): pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig gyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
164a2('bum): pa dang / sna'i 'dus te rig pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pu laM gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig gyi 'dus te reg pa

169a5('bum): mchis te/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
169a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag go// 
169a7('bum): zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i srid du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par
169a8('bum): shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid gang lags/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchi ste/ 
169b1('bum): rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
169b2('bum): chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mu rtag ge zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi'o// gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gran
169b3('bum): par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid
169b4('bum): gang lags pa de yang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong
169b5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
169b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas
169b7('bum): bur mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid
169b8('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes
170a1('bum): ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
170a2('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// gzugs bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par
170a3('bum): mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs bdag med pa nyid/ gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid
170a4('bum): gang lags pa de yang gzugs bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang steng pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong
170a5('bum): pa nyid kyang gzugs bdag med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe
170a6('bum): gzugs bradag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi
170a7('bum): stestede ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa bradag med/ 
170a8('bum): pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 
170b1('bum): rnam par shes pa badrag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dang
170b2('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu
170b3('bum): lnga pa las/ dum bu dang po// // bam po bcu pa// // gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar
170b4('bum): gzugs zhi ba nyid gzugs zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / gzugs zhi ba nyid ma lag sa/ gzugs zhi ba nyid las gud na yang
170b5('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
170b6('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi'o
170b7('bum): zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid rnam par shes pa zhi bri nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa
170b8('bum): zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa ni
171a1('bum): ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid krung rnam par shes bzhi brjid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du/ 
171a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa ni'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// gzugs stong dro zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
171a3('bum): do ni 'di ltar gzugs stong pa nyid gzugs stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs stong pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs stong pa nyid
171a4('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
171a5('bum): sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
171a6('bum): shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par
171a7('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid
171a8('bum): kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sa
171b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btso
171b2('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'dri ltar gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs
171b3('bum): mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na yang / stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzu
171b4('bum): mtshan ma med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mtshan ma med do/ 
171b5('bum): zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
171b6('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa
171b7('bum): de yang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang
171b8('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
172a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
172a2('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs smon pa med pa nyid gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/ 
172a3('bum): gzugs smon pa med pa nyid las gud na yang / stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs smon pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs// 
172a4('bum): des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
172a5('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid rnam par shes pa
172a6('bum): smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa smin pa med pa nyi
172a7('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
172a8('bum): des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
172b1('bum): gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs dben pa nyid gzugs dben pa nyid kyis stong stong ste/ gzugs
172b2('bum): dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs dben pa nyid mi lags/ gzugs dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyang stong pa
172b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs dben pa nyid do// bci ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs
172b4('bum): dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
172b5('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par
172b6('bum): pa dben pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ 
172b7('bum): dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa dben no// 
172b8('bum): zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de banim
173a1('bum): gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyis steng ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
173a2('bum): de bzhin nyid ma lags/ de bzhin nyid las gud ni yang stong pa nyid mi mchis te/ de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ 
173a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i
173a4('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/ chos nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos nyid ma lags/ chos nyid las gang na yang stong
173a5('bum): pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi/ 
173a6('bum): pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad de zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings
173a7('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos kyi dbyings ma legs/ chos kyi dbyings las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos
173a8('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
173b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi'o// chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos skyon
173b2('bum): med pa nyid/ chos skyon med pa nyid kyis steng ste/ chos skyen mong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid grang lags pa de yang chos skyon med pa nyid mi lags/ chos skyon med pa nyid las gud na yang
173b3('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ches skyon med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos skyon med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
173b4('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
173b5('bum): de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' stong ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags yang dag pa'i mtha' las gud na yang
173b6('bum): steng pa nyid ma mchis te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
173b7('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
173b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du
174a1('bum): bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed do// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi/ 
174a2('bum): bral skyed kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du
174a3('bum): phyin pa yongasu zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par ma gyur par
174a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro ni/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
174a5('bum): mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la gnas na/ de yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi// 
174a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du ne na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
174a7('bum): la yongasu zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par ma gyur par
174a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs bzung ba mi mchis pa ste/ gzugs kyi yongasu bzung
174b1('bum): ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de yang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du/ gzugs ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni yongasu bzung ba ma
174b2('bum): mchis pa ste/ rnam par shes pa yongs bzang du ma mchis pa gang lags pa de yang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du/ rnam par shes pa ma lags/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du
174b3('bum): yongasu bzung ba ma mchis pa ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongasu bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de yang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags te/ shes
174b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yongs bzung ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin/ 
174b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du yongasu brtag par bgyi ste/ ci nas kyang chos gang la yang yid rnam par mi rgyu ba de ltar yongasu brtag par bgyil
174b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad yongasu ma bzung ba zhes bgyi ba ste/ rgya che ba phul du phyin pa tshad
174b7('bum): ma mchis pa/ tshad ma mchis par nges pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing de dag dang thun mong ma lags/ pa ste/ ting 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de
174b8('bum): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du byung bar 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang / nang stong pa nyid dang / 
175a1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas/ 
175a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa// 
175a3('bum): nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
175a4('bum): kyi slad du/ yongasu bzung ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni mtshan masra brjod pa ma lags te/ de ni 'di ltar mtshan ma las nyon mongs pa 'byung ste/ mtshan ma de dag gang zhe na/ gzu/ 
175a5('bum): ni mtshan ma'o// tshi ra ba ni mtshan ma'o// 'du shes ni mtshan ma'o// 'du byed ni mtshan ma'o// rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o// mig ni mtshan ma'o// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / 
175a6('bum): yid ni mtshan ma'o// gzugs ni mtshan ma'o// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos ni mtshan ma'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam
175a7('bum): par shes pa dang / lce'i kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
175a8('bum): pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni
175b1('bum): mtshan ma'o// rtsu ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sku'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsho ra ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te
175b2('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par
175b3('bum): pa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o// ma rig pa ni mtshan ma'o// 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tsher ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / 
175b4('bum): srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni mtshan ma'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du
175b5('bum): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / ni mtshan ma'o// nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o// phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma
175b6('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni mtshan ma'o// dran pa nye bor gzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po
175b7('bum): rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnaMs dang / tshad med pa nas/ 
175b8('bum): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa ma/ 
176a1('bum): pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so yang dag par rig pa
176a2('bum): bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni mtshan ma'o// yi ge rnaMs ni mtshan ma'o// gcig tu brjod pa ni mtshan ma'o// gnyisu brjod pa ni mtshan ma'o// tha dad du brjod pa ni mtshan
176a3('bum): ma ste/ de ni nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'o// gal te de mtshan mar bzung ba zhig lags na ni/ kun du rgyu ba 'breng ba can yang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la dad pa thob par mi 'gyur/ 
176a4('bum): da pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yid ches pa dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod pa dang / yang mtshan ma'i tshul du
176a5('bum): ma lags/ mtshan ma'i tshul du yang ma lagaso// de ni 'di ltar mtshan ma dang mtshan ma mchis pa dang / yongs bzang ba ma mchis pas/ yongasu bzung ba ma lags te/ kun du rgyu ba 'phreng ba
176a6('bum): can des kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos par gyur nas/ dad pa'i rjesu 'brang bas nyi tshe ba'i ye shes kyis zhugs te/ der ltar zhugasre nas gzugs yongasu mo bzung / tshor
176a7('bum): ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs ma bzang ngo // de ni 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yongasu 'dzin pa ma dmigs te/ de ci'i slad du zhen
176a8('bum): 'di ltar des ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis nang du yang dag par rjesu ma mthong / ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi rol du yang dag par
176b1('bum): ma mthong / ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis/ phyi nang du yang dag par rjesu ma mthong / ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis/ de las gzhan du yang
176b2('bum): yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos gang gis rtogs par bgyi ba dang / gang rtogs par bgyid pa dang / gang la rtogs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos yang dag
176b3('bum): par rje su ma mthong ste/ des ye shes des gzugs kyi nang du yang yang dag par rje su ma mthong / ye shes de tsher ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang yang dag par rjes
176b4('bum): ma mtho hA ye shes de gzugs kyi phyi rol du yang yang dag par rje su ma mthong / ye shes de tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol du yang yang dag par rjes ma
176b5('bum): mthong / ye shes de gzugs kyi phyi nang du yang yang dag par rje su ma mthong / ye shes de tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi nang du yang yang dag par rje su ma mthong
176b6('bum): ye shes de gzags ma legs pa de gzhan du yang yang dag par rjesu ma mthong / ye shes de tsher ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par
176b7('bum): rjesu ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i nang du yang dag par rje su ma mthong / ye shes de mtha' yang dag pa'i phyi rol du yang yang dag par rje su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag pa'i
176b8('bum): rjes ma mtha'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjesu ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rje su ma mthong ngo // rnam grangs 'di la kun du rgyu/ 'phreng ba can mos
177a1('bum): par gyur te/ de ltar mos par gyur nas/ dad pa'i rjesu 'brang bas/ chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
177a2('bum): ye shes la zhugs par gyur te/ de de ltar mis par gyur nas/ des chos gang la yang mtshan ma mchis pa dang / yid la bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ yongasu bzung ba ma mchis te/ chos
177a3('bum): thams cad bzung du ma mchis/ gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ yongasu bzung bar bgyi ba 'am/ gtang bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang des mi dmigs te/ chos thams cad la
177a4('bum): rlom sems me mchis pa'i slad du/ dro ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang / rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad yongs bzang ba ma mchis
177a5('bum): pa'i slad du/ gzugs yongasu mi 'dzin pa dang / tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongasu bzung ba me mchis pa'i
177a6('bum): slad du/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa/ 
177a7('bum): bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnaMs dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms/ 
177a8('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / 
177b1('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos
177b2('bum): kyi dbyings nyi dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yongasasu mi 'dzin pa de ni/ pha rol du ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sos
177b3('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// 'on kyang smon lam yongasu ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongasu ma rdzogs
177b4('bum): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs ma rdzogs/ 'phags pa'i
177b5('bum): bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
177b6('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / tingange 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs
177b7('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs ma rdzogs par bar ma der yongasu mya ngan las
177b8('bum): mi 'da'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar smon la rnams ni smon la ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma lags/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu
178a1('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i l-i yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnas
178a2('bum): dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
178a3('bum): dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs po'i stobs
178a4('bum): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshe sra ma 'dres pa ma lags te/ de dag ni chos kyang
178a5('bum): ma lags/ chos ma lags pa yang ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad yongasu mi bzang ba'i slad du/ gzugs yongs mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
178a6('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongasu ma bzung ba'i slad du/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongasu mi 'dzin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
178a7('bum): sesomos dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das granan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems drang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rlom du phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam
178a8('bum): pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ci ni gci'i phyir na/ del shes rab kyi pha rol du ni
178b1('bum): bzhes bya zhes yongasu gartag par bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod bu'i tshe/ gal te 'di ltar chos gang yod pa ma yin ning
178b2('bum): mi dmigs pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin nam zhes skyed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do// de nus tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i byas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
178b3('bum): lnga 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa raba'i byor chos gang rnams med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa
178b4('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'das byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
178b5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rung gi mtshan nyid stong/ 
178b6('bum): pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med
178b7('bum): cing mi dmig so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin gyi
178b8('bum): pha rol du phyin pa med cing mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi steng pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / 
179a1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med/ 
179a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong/ 
179a3('bum): pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs med cing mi dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa
179a4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang snying pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang
179a5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong
179a6('bum): pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ skye mched
179a7('bum): rnams dang / khams rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med cing mi dmig so// tshe drang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ 
179a8('bum): pha rol du phyin pa rnams med cing mi dmig so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun med cing mi dmigaso// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa
179b1('bum): rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
179b2('bum): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdebs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sau yang dag par rig
179b3('bum): pa ba ni dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad med cing mi dmig so// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med/ 
179b4('bum): cing mi dmag so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / l-I gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
179b5('bum): pa nyid med cing mi dmig so// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyirade bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigaso// chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos
179b6('bum): kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' med cing mi dmigaso// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ rgyun du zhugs
179b7('bum): pa yang med cing mi dmig so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / byar mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyang med cing rmo
179b8('bum): dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu/ nang dmigs med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmig so// phyi dmig su med pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid med cing mi dmig so// phyi nang
180a1('bum): dmig su med pa'i byi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmig so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
180a2('bum): pa nyid med cing mi dmig so// tshe drung ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ gal te de ltar rtog cing sos
180a3('bum): pra dang / de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe/ sems zhum pa med cing yongs zhum pa med la/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
180a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
180a5('bum): phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa'
180a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang / 
180a7('bum): bral ba/ 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rung bzhin dang bral ba/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
180a8('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni/ rten
180b1('bum): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod
180b2('bum): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa'i rang bzhin
180b3('bum): dang bral ba/ nang stong pa nyid ni nang steng pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba
180b4('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i
180b5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bso gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar
180b6('bum): pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / tinge 'dzin rnams dang / 
180b7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas
180b8('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ rgyun du zhugs pa ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / 
181a1('bum): rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ba rang bzhin dang bral ba/ de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bras
181a2('bum): ga mA nor ba dri bzhin nyid dang / gnan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / ches skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pal+lI ni yang dag pa
181a3('bum): mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes// tshe dang ldan pa sha
181a4('bum): ra dwa ti'i ba de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni
181a5('bum): ji lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bo/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta ba/ yang dag
181a6('bum): pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
181a7('bum): par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po
181a8('bum): med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rna
181b1('bum): shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa'o// skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / khams rnams la khams rnams rnams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
181b2('bum): ba rnams la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i ba/ 
181b3('bum): gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// skye mched rnaMs la skye
181b4('bum): mched rnaMs kyi mtshan nyid med do// khams rnams la khas rnams kyi mtshan nyid med do// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid med do// yang dag
181b5('bum): pa'i mtha'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid med do// mtshan nyid la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do// mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do// smras
181b6('bum): pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis
181b7('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar
181b8('bum): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba'i phyir ro// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na/ chos thams cad ma skyes ma
182a1('bum): pa yin/ rab 'byor byas sbas pa ci tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs// cher ba dang / 'du
182a2('bum): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas slong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yang dag pa'i mthas stong / 
182a3('bum): de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dadwa ti'i ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar skyed pa ni/ 
182a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/ de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yong su dag pa dang / ngag yongasu dag pa dang / sas
182a5('bum): yongasu dgra pa dang / mtshan yong su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// de ji lta ji ltar lus yongasu dag pa dang / drug yongasu dag pa dang / sems yongasu dag pa dang / mtshan yengs dag pa thob par
182a6('bum): 'gyur ba de lta de ltar rtabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do// zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal
182a7('bum): dang ldan pa dang / g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang / 'phra dog dang ldan pa dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / sred pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do// de 'dod chags kyi
182a8('bum): sems mi bskyed cing / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / g.yo dang / sgyu dang / 'phra dog dang / ser sna dang / sred pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed pas
182b1('bum): nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ 'khor zug rtag par rdzus te skye bur 'gyur ro// sems can yongasu sbyin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par nam yang dran song rnams su skye
182b2('bum): bar mi 'gyur ro// des sems can yengs smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ nam bla na med pa
182b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de bas
182b4('bum): na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// yon tan dang legs pa 'di dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la
182b5('bum): brtson 'grus mi btang bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha rA dwa ti'i ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thang
182b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur po yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa steng phrag nyi shu lnga pa las// // le'u lnga pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan
182b7('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzug
182b8('bum): la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra byed dang / rnam par shes pa la smod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzags rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
183a1('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag rjes pabyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la slong ngo // gal te gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mas slod/ 
183a2('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba
183a3('bum): dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal ga te gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
183a4('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
183a5('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod
183a6('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyong na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs zhi zhes bya bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
183a7('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar mtshan mo la spyod do// gal te gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 
183a8('bum): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad de// tshor ba dang / 
183b1('bum): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba
183b2('bum): dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
183b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong
183b4('bum): pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / 
183b5('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par zer pa brirgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
183b6('bum): dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs/ 
183b7('bum): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang bdag med
183b8('bum): ba dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / mi dben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
184a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed do zhes bgyi bar spyod na dmigs pa la spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems
184a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma lo skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
184a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod do// de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom mo zhes bgyi bar spyod na yang mtshan nyid la spyod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas
184a4('bum): par rig par bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA rad ti'i byas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
184a5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pa ji ltar rig par bye ba yin/ raba'i byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
184a6('bum): phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye
184a7('bum): bye dang / rga bo dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / sgo sngags 'dzin pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las ying su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las
184a8('bum): yongasu mi 'grel bar brjod do// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob ste/ 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / 
184b1('bum): sdug bsngal ba dang / yadri mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs mi 'gro la/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
184b2('bum): bai shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig lnga mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ gzug
184b3('bum): la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin
184b4('bum): gyis rlob/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes
184b5('bum): te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'das te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus de
184b6('bum): reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes ti byin gyis rlob/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor be la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i 'dus te rig
184b7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i
184b8('bum): rkyen gyis tsher ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ ma rig pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ 'du byed dang
185a1('bum): rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang tshor ba dang / sbed pa dang len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la mos shing 'du shes
185a2('bum): te byin gyis rlob/ pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnam
185a3('bum): dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong
185a4('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mig lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin ga sh+tsa
185a5('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jugs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob skye/ 
185a6('bum): de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod do// don
185a7('bum): skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dzin pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'gro la/ sdug bsngal
185a8('bum): chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ra
185b1('bum): sngon du bya ba'i skal ba med na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do// tshe dang ldan pa
185b2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar skyed na/ thabs mi mkhas par shes par bya'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab
185b3('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ji ltar spyod/ thabs mkhas par shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
185b4('bum): da ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod cing / gzugs la mi skyed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam
185b5('bum): par shes pa la yang mi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba/ 
185b6('bum): mi spyod/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang
185b7('bum): gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi ba dang / gzugs steng zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mi stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma yid ces bya ba dang / gzugs
185b8('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mi dben zhes bya ba dang / mi spyod pa
186a1('bum): dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag
186a2('bum): ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces
186a3('bum): bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs/ 
186a4('bum): mkhas par shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid med
186a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / rnam par shes pa ma yin
186a6('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 
186a7('bum): skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / nang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa
186a8('bum): bden pa rnaMs dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
186b1('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smin pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnaMs dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin ga
186b2('bum): pa'i stebs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa
186b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang
186b4('bum): stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
186b5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ltar spyod pa ni/ thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// // shes rab dum bu dang po'o// // bam po bcu gcig pa'o// / 
186b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa
186b7('bum): 'tshang rgya ba'i skal pa yod de// de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmig so// mi spyod do zhes bya bar spyo mi dmig so// spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod
186b8('bum): zhes bya bar mi dmig so// spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod po yang ma yin no zhes bya bar mi dmigaso// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
187a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs
187a2('bum): spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi dmigaso pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pra sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ do ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang
187a3('bum): bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems/ 
187a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lA spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod de zhes bya bar yang mi dmig so// mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// spyod kyang spyod la mi skyed kyang mi
187a5('bum): spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmig so// sgyid pa yang mi yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin/ 
187a6('bum): khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ ting 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba ste/ rgya che ba/ mchog tu bya ba/ tshad med/ 
187a7('bum): par nges pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na med/ 
187a8('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting 'dzin 'di 'bi' shig gyis/ rnam par skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' se/ 
187b1('bum): dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on tam de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag kyang yod/ rab 'byor gyis
187b2('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dge la rnam par spyod pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs/ 
187b3('bum): pi'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yod do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan gang dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
187b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya ba gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
187b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba'o zhes bya ba yod de/ ting 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
187b6('bum): chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// seng ge rnam par
187b7('bum): rtsa ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad las shin du
187b8('bum): 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos kyi
188a1('bum): dbyings nges pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin po dang // nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad la 'jug pa
188a2('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod de// ti nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dbang rnam par bkod/ 
188a3('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang yod do// nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi bza' bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// tshig/ 
188a4('bum): bla bradags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin spong ngo // phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin yod do// 
188a5('bum): ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin spyod do// chos thams cad yang dag par 'dra ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyu zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad la/ na mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes
188a6('bum): bya ba'i tingange 'dzin yod do// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin yod de// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin yod de/ 
188a7('bum): rgyun gyi rjesu skyeng bu zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin med do// seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin med do// snrel gzhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nyon mongs pa slong ba zhes
188a8('bum): byi ba'i ting 'dzin mod do// rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin mong ngo // gnas po rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// sos
188b1('bum): med pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin yod do// dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin yod do// 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod
188b2('bum): kun du snang po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 
188b3('bum): yod do// glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin yod do// zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i
188b4('bum): tinge 'dzin yod do// zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin yod do// 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes
188b5('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin yod do// snang ba bsal ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin yod do// / 
188b6('bum): snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin yod do// bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting tingange 'dzin yod do// ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin da yod do// 
188b7('bum): sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i
188b8('bum): ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin te/ 
189a1('bum): chos thams cad kyis 'phags pa zhes bya'i ting 'dzin yod do// rnam par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byud pa zhes bya ba'i ting
189a2('bum): yod do// yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ 
189a3('bum): 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// rnam par med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod de// gnas med par skye/ 
189a4('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yo
189a5('bum): yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin/ 
189a6('bum): yod da do// dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya// 
189a7('bum): ba'i 'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mi mnyam pa dang mnyaM pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ches thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin yod do// yongasu gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ti// 
189a8('bum): 'dzin yod do// nem nur rna bar sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin yod do// gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzi
189b1('bum): yod do// rnam par mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin yod do// rnam par gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// rnam par 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin
189b2('bum): yod do// srid pa'i ba ni thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral
189b3('bum): bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// mtshan nyid yongasu sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin yod do// mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba
189b4('bum): ting 'dzin yod do// rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// bde ba dang sdig bsngal bu zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin yod do// zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya bar
189b5('bum): ting 'dzin yod do// gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin yod do// 'gal ba dang 'gog pa tha~Md
189b6('bum): yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// 'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin yod do// 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod de// snying po dang ldan pa
189b7('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i tingange 'dzin yod do// glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// rgya chen po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin/ 
189b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin yod do// ting 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do// rdul ba med cing rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 
190a1('bum): nyon mongs pa med par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin yod do// nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod/ 
190a2('bum): gnas dmigasu med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin yod do// de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin yod do// lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel bas/ rab
190a3('bum): tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin yod do// ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas/ nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu na mkha' ltar chags pa med pas/ rnaM bar/ 
190a4('bum): grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod de/ tingange 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
190a5('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/ tingange 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod
190a6('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de ltar ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo gangal
190a7('bum): bslabs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu/ tshad med grang
190a8('bum): med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ yang 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu/ byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po / 
190b1('bum): gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa de ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
190b2('bum): byang chub tu lung bstan to// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
190b3('bum): bzhugs shing mtsho skyong ba de ji snyed gcig zhugs pa de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung bstan te/ des ting 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes mi mthong ngo // dag
190b4('bum): ni snyoms par zhugaso zhes bya bar tingange 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med do// bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go/ bdag gis mnyaM par gzhag par bya'o// bdag ni mnyam par gzhag
190b5('bum): par gyur to zhes rlom semasu 'gyur ba med de/ de la rnam par rtog pa de dag med cing mi rgyu'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
190b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
190b7('bum): da ti'i bu de ni med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan la/ ting 'dzin yang gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan/ 
190b8('bum): zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang tingange 'dzin te/ ting 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o// byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting 'dzin to// smras pa tshe dang / 
191a1('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor gal te de ltar ting 'dzin yang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la/ ting 'dzin kyang gzhan zhes bya ba
191a2('bum): med de/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ ting 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/ de la ting 'dzin bstan par nus som
191a3('bum): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pra sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni ma yin no// smras po tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu ting 'dzin de la 'du shes su byed dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe drang ldan pa
191a4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du shes su byed pa med do/ smras pa ji ltar de la 'du shes byed par mi 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin/ 
191a5('bum): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir/ rtog pa med de/ de ltar na tingange 'dzin de la rtog pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i ba rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu tinge 'dzin de
191a6('bum): la rnam par shes par byed pa med do// 'du shes byed pa med do// smras pa ci'i phyir/ rnam par shes par byed pa med cing / 'du shes su 'gyur ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ting 'dzin de sad
191a7('bum): med la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems drape'i tshon po de yang med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa med do// 'du shesu 'gyur ba med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
191a8('bum): leg so zhes bye ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor leg so leg so// tshig 'di ni legs par bshad do// ji ltar ngas nyin mongs pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang na mchog tu bshad pa des
191b1('bum): bshad pa ni 'di yin// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
191b2('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bsgrub par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang
191b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te
