191b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin
191b5('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob
191b6('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnaMs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bre co brgyad kyi ba ro la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang
191b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'gruso// 
191b8('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyog
192a1('bum): kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i srang du mi dmin
192a2('bum): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shar dwa ti'i bu shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmig so// sems can dang srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gas pa dang / skyes bu dza / 
192a3('bum): zag dang / shed can dang shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po mi dmigs// shin du rnam par dag pa'i byo/ phung po dang / khams dang / khyim
192a4('bum): rten ci brel bar 'byung ba mi myigaste/ shin du rnam ra dag pa'i ra/ sdug bsngal mi dmig sa// nId+ha rnam par dag po'i drim kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / sam mngorig so// 
192a5('bum): shin dun par dug pa'i phyi/ 'dod pa'i khams myi dmigs/ skyon du na par drug pa'i sbyin/ gzugs kyi dpo bas su ming myog sa// sbyin dunam byu ngadu pa'i phyir/ gzugs med kyi
192a6('bum): kham sa mngomig sa// na du rnam par dag pa'i phyi/ pha rol du phyin pa rnams mi dmigs// na du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi khrinas kyi chos rnams dang/ 'jims du'i
192a7('bum): ba rnams dang / pasas rnarnams dang / tshad med pa nams dang / gzugs med pa'i rnams ra gru pa rnams dang/ rnam yor parnam pa / Sh+Ta na
192a8('bum): nga mang ba ga nas yang ba dang / pa pa dang / ma mi ga rnas dang ma
192b1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
192b2('bum): mi dmig so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmig so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang
192b3('bum): sangs rgyas mi dmig so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mi dmig so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub mi dmigaso// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir
192b4('bum): sangs rgyas mi dmigaso// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / mi 'gags pa dang / kun
192b5('bum): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'di ni/ rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ sha ra da ti'i ba de ltar
192b6('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' seMs
192b7('bum): dpa' chen po chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang
192b8('bum): slob pa med de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bos/ ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa yod pa ma yin no// gsol ba bco ldan
193a1('bum): 'das yon chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis bsags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bre skyes ba ji ltar med pa de ltar yod do// de ltar spong ba ma yin pas de'i phyir med ces bya
193a2('bum): gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lagus pa/ de la ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos
193a3('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
193a4('bum): bar gi phyir yod pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar da nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi
193a5('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams med pa la mngon par
193a6('bum): zhen pas/ srid pa yo myangon por zhen te de dag gis med pa la yongasu brtags pas med pa la mngon par zhen cing 'di lta ste/ chad pa dang rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas/ de dag mi shes/ 
193a7('bum): mi mthong ste/ gang med pa'i chos de dag yongasu brtags pas/ ming deng gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
193a8('bum): rnams kyi bar la mngon par zhen to// de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas yod pa ma yin/ pa'i chos rnams la yongasu rtog ste/ de dag mi shes mi mthong ngo // ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ tshor ba dang / 
193b1('bum): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu
193b2('bum): rtsa bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi shes mi mthong ngo // de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dong ba ste/ de dag byung ba ma yin no// 
193b3('bum): gang nas 'byung ba me yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// nyan thos dang / 
193b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa na pe 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni yid mi ches pa ste/ ji ltar yid mi ches zhe na/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi cheso// byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyi stong
193b5('bum): zhes bya bar yid mi ches// de dag ni gnas ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin
193b6('bum): pa dang / brtson 'gres kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin no// phyir mi ldog pa'i so la gnas pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas
193b7('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la gnas pa ma yin no// de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed
193b8('bum): dang na bar shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye mched dang khams dang rta rten cing 'brel bar
194a1('bum): 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dod chags dang ni sdang dang gti mugs mngon par zhen pa yin/ lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byang chub kyi bar la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ 
194a2('bum): de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi
194a3('bum): 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
194a4('bum): pa nyid du mi 'byung rab yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das co'i srid du byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags
194a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha rA dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rtags shing mngon par zhe na khas
194a6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ 
194a7('bum): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag nas
194a8('bum): rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
194b1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnas dang / 
194b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
194b3('bum): bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtags shing mngon par zhen pas/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa'
194b4('bum): chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no// ga sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' ses
194b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnag pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba la gros/ ji ltar bslabs na rnam pra thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
194b6('bum): stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de mi dmigs/ yang dag par rje su mi mthong
194b7('bum): zhing / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin/ 
194b8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
195a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
195a2('bum): nyid de mi dmigs yang dag par rje su mi mthong zhing / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul/ 
195a3('bum): gyis rta rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes
195a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa
195a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal po/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi
195a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u drug pa'o// 
195a7('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
195a8('bum): la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur rami zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du/ 
195b1('bum): bstan par bgyi/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang
195b2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ramo/ sgyu ma'i skyes pa 'di byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing
195b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
195b4('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thob par 'gyur ro zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'bri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
195b5('bum): rab 'byor de lta bas na/ de khyod nyid la bris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yon snyam laM/ 
195b6('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gnan zhig yin snyam la/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
195b7('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gnu ni la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan
195b8('bum): zhig yin snyam laM/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yi ni snyam 'am/ skra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin sngam+ba 'aM/ mig gi
196a1('bum): rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par she
196a2('bum): pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ni la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam laM/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
196a3('bum): dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin sgyum 'aM/ mig gi 'dus te reg
196a4('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yini snyam 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshur po dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te
196a5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'o/ gsol ba/ 
196a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig
196a7('bum): yin sum 'i/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de rje snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ya
196a8('bum): gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam laM/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la/ 
196b1('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs
196b2('bum): kyang gnan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
196b3('bum): pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
196b4('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ mig nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go/ bcom ldan 'das rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te
196b5('bum): yid nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid de/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzug so// bcom ldan
196b6('bum): 'das sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang cho so// bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa
196b7('bum): yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang
196b8('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi rnam par shes
197a1('bum): pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus
197a2('bum): te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'das te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te/ 
197a3('bum): reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan mi lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lag ste/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcoM ldan
197a4('bum): 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba yang gzhan ma legs/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lcags te/ mig gi 'dus te rag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgra me/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi
197a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tsho
197a6('bum): ba de lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhani ma legs/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
197a7('bum): gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gnan ma legs/ sgyu ma yang
197a8('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnam so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi/ 
197b1('bum): bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam so// bcom ldan 'das
197b2('bum): byang chub kyi bar yang gzhan mi lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de rje
197b3('bum): snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am/ 'gog pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
197b4('bum): sgyu ma laM kun nas nyin mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 
197b5('bum): gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad
197b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
197b7('bum): pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes dang / brda' dang gdags pa dang tha snyad du bya
197b8('bum): ba yin nam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes dang brda dang gdags pa dang / tha snyid
198a1('bum): tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po skye ba dang / 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar dmyigs par 'gyur ro/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi/ 
198a2('bum): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing brda' med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med
198a3('bum): pa dang / ming du gdogs pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus su gdags pa med pa dang / ngag med pa dang ngag gi las med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gas
198a4('bum): pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ 
198a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 
198a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thob par 'gyuro// gsol pa
198a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
198a8('bum): byang chub tu srab par bgyi'o// de ci'i srad du zhe ni/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi bsha stag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa2
198b1('bum): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi
198b2('bum): 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs ma mchis so// / 
198b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sa slabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
198b4('bum): bar 'gyur rama?/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyu ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rmi la ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ra
198b5('bum): bzhin de ni dmigs ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta ba dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / smig sgyu lta
198b6('bum): bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyu ro// de ci'i
198b7('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla ni/ 
198b8('bum): dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ smig skye ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmig su mi mchi
199a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lo lta bu/ tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmi la lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ na bar
199a2('bum): shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drag go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa
199a3('bum): gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ rnam par shes
199a4('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs na mig yer lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni mig yor lta bu ste/ rnam par
199a5('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni chu zla lta buHtshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang
199a6('bum): smin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni smig spyi lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni smig sgyu lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang
199a7('bum): yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// dri ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni skal ba lci bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang
199a8('bum): yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmig so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcoM ldan 'das delta
199b1('bum): lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / skrag par mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
199b2('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yang yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste
199b3('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma 'ongs na/ 'jigs shing sdang ba ni dang skrag par yang 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan
199b4('bum): pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi sding mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub seMs
199b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmig so// / 
199b6('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmig so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
199b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ 
199b8('bum): kyi dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ 
200a1('bum): de mi dmigs/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa
200a2('bum): bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmig so// rnam pa tha~Md mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'di shes dang 'du byed dang
200a3('bum): rnaMrna par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// tshe ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du
200a4('bum): byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmig so// rnam pa thaMd mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmyig so// tshor ba dang 'bru
200a5('bum): shes dang 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmig so// rnam pa tha~Md mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi/

200a7('bum): par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmig so// rno ba thad mkhyen pa nyid / 
200a8('bum): ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'dra shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang/ 
200b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
200b2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag pa'i rna bar rtog par byed de mi dmig so// rnam pa tha~Md mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas

200b4('bum): rtogs par byed de de mi dmigaso// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rna par rtogs par byed de de mi dmig so// rnam pa tha~Md mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
200b5('bum): bya bas/ gzugs bdag med pa'i rna par rtogs par byed de de mi dmig so// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med pa'i rna bar rtogs par byed de ma dmig so// na pazang
200b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi ba'i rna bar rtogs par byed de de mi dmig sa// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de
200b7('bum): de mi dmig so// rnam pa thaMd mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong pa'i rna bar rtogs par byed de de mo dmyig so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa stong pa'i
200b8('bum): rnaM par rtogs par byed de de mi dmig so// rnam pa thad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rna bar rtogs par byed de de mi dmig so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /

201a3('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba'i med pa'i ni par rtogs par byed pa de mi dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rna par rtogs par byed de de mi dmin/

201a6('bum): sos dpa' chen po de ltar rtog pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thaMd la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
201a7('bum): rna par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang
201a8('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / na bar shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / 
201b1('bum): zhi ba dang stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub seMs dang

201b3('bum): chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yod
201b4('bum): la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa mi rtag pa/

202a1('bum): 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyu ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rna ba dang / sdug bsngal ba
202a2('bum): na pa dang / bdag med pa'i rna ba dang / zhi ba'i rna ba dang / stong pa nyid kyi rno ba dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rno ba dang / mngon par 'du bye ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben po'i rna bar rtog/

202a6('bum): bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya/

202b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas mi gtong zhing / brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub

202b4('bum): yin la/ byang chub kyi bgegasu 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma 'byed pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces

202b6('bum): bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgog su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug sngal
