202b8('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub seMs dpa' sos/ 
203a1('bum): dbu' dren po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin bya ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// shes
203a2('bum): rab kyi rol du phyin pa steng blag nyi shu lta ba las dum bu dong po// bram po bcu gnyis pa'o// // rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
203a3('bum): bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas// rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtogs te/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyi
203a4('bum): gzugs stong pa nyid ma yon gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tsher dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis
203a5('bum): rna mi prar shes pa stong pa nyid ma yin gyis/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gros stong bu nyid kyis/ mig stong pa nyid ma yin
203a6('bum): g+hi/ mig stong pa nyid ma yin gyis/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gro/ rna ba dang / snga ba dang / lce dang / lus dang yid kyis stong pa nyid kyis/ yid stong pa nyid ma
203a7('bum): yin gyis/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyi gzugs stong pa ma yin gyis// gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
203a8('bum): gzugs so// sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg dang / chos kyis stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyis/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam pa
203b1('bum): shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gre rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyis/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyi mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam
203b2('bum): par shes pa dang / sna'i rnams par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes
203b3('bum): pa stong pa ma yin gyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi
203b4('bum): 'das te reg pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang / stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna'i 'das te reg pa dang / 
203b5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyis 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'das te reg pa ma yin gyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong
203b6('bum): pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang
203b7('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / 
203b8('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyis 'dus
204a1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
204a2('bum): tshor ba'o// dran pa nye bar bzhog pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhigro pa stong pa ma yin gyis/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
204a3('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhig pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
204a4('bum): myi 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha
204a5('bum): rol du phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang/ 
204a6('bum): ldan pa'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs mi sang+ga dang sgeg par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
204a7('bum): dge ba'i go shes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs mi dang skrag
204a8('bum): par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen de gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bstsal pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i ga shwe
204b1('bum): gnyen ni/ rlung de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mI dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston rnying / dge ba'i rtsub thams cad kyang / rnam pa thamus cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par
204b2('bum): nyan thos kyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa m+b+ha rtag tses bya bur dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 
204b3('bum): chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi so 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mongasu sngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor
204b4('bum): 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gshes
204b5('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsnga
204b6('bum): zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyi se chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba de dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sde chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
204b7('bum): rnam par shes pa dag med ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'od
204b8('bum): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos smon pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ce stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
205a1('bum): chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ce/ 
205a2('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
205a3('bum): dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs min pa mid ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang // 
205a4('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya
205a5('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos smon pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'di shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
205a6('bum): ston pa dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar dri mi dam
205a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dgro ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mA rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong so sngor mi 'jug
205a8('bum): pa ste rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
205b1('bum): rkyen po dge ba'i gshes gnyen ni/ glang de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs bu'i tshul gyis cho snga ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba
205b2('bum): dri mi dmigs bri'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs bI'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna bi dang / sna dang / lci dang / lus dang sdug bsngal
205b3('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mige bdag mod ces bya bar de mi dmig sme ba'i tshul gyis chos skyon pa dang / rno ba dang / sne dang lce dang ri lus dang / 
205b4('bum): yid dag/ med ces bya bar de mi dra mi gus pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / migo zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rnaM ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / 
205b5('bum): lus dang / yIng ni sa bya bar de mi dmyigs tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig sdong zhes bya ba ri de mi dmyigs pA'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang lci dang
205b6('bum): sa dang / yi de sto zhes bya bar de mr-i dmigs blo'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / myig stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / 
205b7('bum): lce dang lus dang / yid mtshan ma med ceste bya bar de mi dri migs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten+da pa dang / mgo smon pa med ces bya ba ri dri ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos skye nu bre nga
205b8('bum): rna ba dang / na dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid smon pa med ces bya ba ring mo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba rung mi dgas
206a1('bum): kra ba'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang sku dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mngon par 'du bye ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa
206a2('bum): dang / mi dbena? zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston rna ba dang / rna ba dang / sA dang / lce dang / lus drang / yid dben zhes bya bar de mr-i dmigs pa'i tshul
206a3('bum): gyis chos sten cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par/ nyen thos kyi sa 'am/ rang srangaso rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngo re mi/ 
206a4('bum): 'jugs pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge bri'i gshes gnyen ni gang de lnga gzugs mi rtag ces bya brar de mi dmigs kyi
206a5('bum): tshul gyis ches ston cing dge ba'i rtso ba thems cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma togs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sto/ 
206a6('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / ches mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tham
206a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid me gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi slar yongs su sngor mo 'jug pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ro da mri dmigs
206a8('bum): pa'i tshu lo gyi chos ston pa dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg dang / chos sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba/ 
206b1('bum): dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi chos ston pa dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos bdag med ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi
206b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs snying zhes bya bar de mi dmin
206b3('bum): bri'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma mdo ces bya bar de
206b4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mtshan ma med ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugos ston
206b5('bum): pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigus pa'i tshul gyi chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / 
206b6('bum): gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi drimigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de ma dmigs
206b7('bum): pa'i chos gyis chosra ston pa dang / gzugs dbenu zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang dI dang / ro dang / reg da // chos dbeno zhes bya bar de mi
206b8('bum): dmigos pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa cing / dge ba'i rtsa bo thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
207a1('bum): yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa mi
207a2('bum): rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
207a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid
207a4('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa dang mi rtag ces bya ba ro de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
207a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmi gras pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / 
207a6('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa ru shes pa dang / yod kyi rnam par shes pa sdugre bsngal zhes bya bar de
207a7('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang // 
207a8('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyis rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
207b1('bum): chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i
207b2('bum): rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes
207b3('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / 
207b4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
207b5('bum): chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyis rnam par shes pa mtshan
207b6('bum): mi med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa smon pa mad ces bye ba rnyed mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rgyas sbyin pa dang rna ba
207b7('bum): rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar dri mi dam
207b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmig pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gis rnam par shes pa
208a1('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sku'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa
208a2('bum): drung / lus kyi rnam par shes dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dben
208a3('bum): zhes bya ba ru chos ston pa dang khri dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lha'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyis
208a4('bum): rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
208a5('bum): nyid da ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
208a6('bum): ba'i gshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i gau shre se gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni/ 
208a7('bum): rtag ces bya bar de mi dmi gso ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
208a8('bum): sangs rgyas sor yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i 'du te reg pa dang / sna'i 'du te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyis 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi
208b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos skyon cing / dge bu'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
208b2('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / 
208b3('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te regro pa dang / lho'i 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar do mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rgyu/ 
208b4('bum): ston pa drang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya ba rA de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg po dang / sna'i 'das te reg pa dang / lce'i/ 
208b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa dang lus kyis 'dras te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa drag/ med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos smon pa dang / mig gi 'dus
208b6('bum): pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmi grosra pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rno ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te/ 
208b7('bum): rig pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg bri zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi
208b8('bum): chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang // sna'i 'dus te rig pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyis 'dus te reg pa stong zhe/ 
209a1('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa la cwo lI ces bya bar dri mi dmi gus pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus
209a2('bum): rlig pa dang / snga'i 'dus te rig pa dang / lho'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyis 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
209a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mrig gi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te rnyog pa dang / sna'i
209a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
209a5('bum): ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs po'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te/ 
209a6('bum): reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te regra pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
209a7('bum): ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dbyen zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'o 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i
209a8('bum): 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyis 'das te reg pa dang / yid kyis 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dam gos pa'i tshul gyis chos ste na cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thos
209b1('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sra 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
209b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen ne/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
209b3('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dri ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rung sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
209b4('bum): 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus
209b5('bum): kyis 'dras te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te rag pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
209b6('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gau togs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi 'jug pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las
209b7('bum): byang ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ngo mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te rnyog pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa lhas byung
209b8('bum): ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba de nga / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyis 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
210a1('bum): bsdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba bdagra med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
210a2('bum): tshul gyis ches sbyin pa drang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
210a3('bum): dang / lus kyis 'das te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'das te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa
210a4('bum): dang / mug gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher bu dang / sna'i
210a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyis 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la
210a6('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sbyin
210a7('bum): pra dang / rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor bro dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te/ 
210a8('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang nga yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lis byung ba'i tshor ba dang / zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te rig
210b1('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
210b2('bum): balnga byung ba'i tshe ru ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshe
210b3('bum): ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mi ge gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
210b4('bum): bya'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa lngas byung ba'i tshor bu dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
210b5('bum): tsher ba dang / lus kyis 'dus te reg pa la su byung ba dang / yid kyis 'dus te reg pa lis byung ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa
210b6('bum): dang / mig ga 'dus te reg pa lus byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung / 
210b7('bum): bla'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor po dang
210b8('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te re
211a1('bum): pa las byung bu'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bur de mI dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byang ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus
211a2('bum): te reg pa las byung po'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'duso te reg pa'i las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las/ 
211a3('bum): byung ba'i tshe rab dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa ra
211a4('bum): nyin thos kyi sra 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen ni/ gang
211a5('bum): de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba de mi dmugs po'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya
211a6('bum): dang zhi zhes bye bo dang / stong zhes bya ba dang ga me tshe na ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'di bya ba med pa drong / dben zhes bya bar de mi dom/ 
211a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge bu'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
211a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtigaso por nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi// 
211b1('bum): bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces pa dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / 
211b2('bum): mtshan ma med ce sa bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bye ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / 
211b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa sgom pa'i phyir ngo mi dmigs pa'i chos ston pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis bar du sgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i
211b4('bum): phyir tshul gyiso chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyis bar du sgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
211b5('bum): cod mekhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyen thos kyis sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sder mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
211b6('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i ga shes gnyen du rig par bya'o// dge ba'i gshos gnyen des yongasu zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha ro// 
211b7('bum): du phyin pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs mi sbyang sgeg par mo 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dres ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen
211b8('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyid pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos ni 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur zhing / thabs ma mkhas te
212a1('bum): sdig pa'i grogs po'i zug par ltung zhing / dge ba'i ga shes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa// 
212a2('bum): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
212a3('bum): la bya ba med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin/ 
212a4('bum): pu sgom zhing dmigs te shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa des rloms sems su byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ bos mu gte ni
212a5('bum): gyi phyi rol du phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa de / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom zhing dmugs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa rlom sems su
212a6('bum): byed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin po sgom zhing dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa de rlom sems byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom zhing
212a7('bum): dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sgom zhing dri mi ges te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa des
212a8('bum): rlom sems su mi byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems ngo bo'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyong pa'i tshe/ thams mo mkhas
212b1('bum): par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
212b2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pararu/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong po zhes bya bor yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang pa zhes
212b3('bum): bya bar yid le byed gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyo bar zhes bya bar yid li byed/ tshor ba dang / 'od shos drang / 'du bye dri dang / rnam par she
212b4('bum): pr-i nang stong pa zhes bya bA ro ya la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yi la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang steng pa zhes bya ba ro yid la byed/ rnam pa/ 
212b5('bum): shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyi dro stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / drimigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid
212b6('bum): dri yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigos/ rmugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi brar de yang dmyigs ldastong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlomo sems su
212b7('bum): byed do// mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ migra phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med
212b8('bum): po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis bor zhes bya bar yid la byed// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce da // lus dang / yid nang stong pa nyid zhes bya b.ro yid la byed/ yid phyi ste/ 
213a1('bum): stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / 
213a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nong stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
213a3('bum): kyi bar de yang dmi gis la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bur ying byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
213a4('bum): gzugs phyi nang stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang
213a5('bum): dang chos nang stong pa zhes bya bAr yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyidadri stong pa nyid kyis bar chos phyi nang spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos dngos po me/ 
213a6('bum): bya'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar zhes bya brwa yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de yang dmigs phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba de yang dmigs/ phyi nang
213a7('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya ba de yong dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs lo/ stong pa nyid de drag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// mig gis rnam par
213a8('bum): shes pa nang stong po zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gis rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
213b1('bum): byed/ mig gis rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la bying / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rna
213b2('bum): par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya ba/ 
213b3('bum): yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang snang pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byid/ yid kyis rnam par shes pa rtsa slong pa nyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
213b4('bum): nyid kyi bor zhesu bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs bya'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmig
213b5('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// mig gi 'dusra te reg po nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid/ 
213b6('bum): la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg par mis
213b7('bum): su med/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna bre'i 'dus te rnyog pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / 
213b8('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / stong pa nyid ni sa bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa byi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi
214a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la byed cing // zhes bya bar yid la rgya
214a2('bum): cing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
214a3('bum): kyis parA de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gris kyang rlom sems su byed do// mig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba stong pa zhes bya bar yidra la byed/ mig gi 'as
214a4('bum): tirlig pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba phye stong zhes bya bar yid lto byed/ mgrig 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yad la byed/ mug gi 'dus te reg
214a5('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor dang / sna'i 'ongs te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
214a6('bum): tshor po dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyi rme ba ning stong zhes bya bar yod la
214a7('bum): la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyo nang stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed
214a8('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigaso pa'i tshul gyis na ngo stong pa nyid de yang
214b1('bum): dmigs/ khyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang rimasras/ stong pa nyid de dag gi
214b2('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// sa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sra'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la bying/ sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa
214b3('bum): nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chu'i khams de / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams
214b4('bum): dang / namo mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam paro shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yidra la byed
214b5('bum): rnam parla shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khamos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya brar yid la
214b6('bum): byed du ma rig pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yi dra la byed/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ mi rig pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar ying lo byed/ ma rig
214b7('bum): bye dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mang drong gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa
214b8('bum): tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi'i nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi
215a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar zhes de yang dmigs la/ bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
215a2('bum): nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sngo kyi bar de yang dmigs
215a3('bum): la stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
215a4('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bor gzhag pa de dag/ 
215a5('bum): kyang dmigs la/ dran pa nye bor gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / 
215a6('bum): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyis yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'o lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams
215a7('bum): dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rgyu dra dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
215a8('bum): dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin no
215b1('bum): pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi drang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dres pa brjod brgyad sgom te/ tshul dmigs gi
215b2('bum): tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres po de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan
215b3('bum): ye de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de lta thabs mkhas pa sa/ de ni shes rab kyi phyin pa bstan pa/ 'di/ 
215b4('bum): thos no 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pos yongasu zin// 
215b5('bum): cing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyu re zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das
215b6('bum): kyis bka' bskul pa/ raba'i byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa mi dag par
215b7('bum): byed cing zlog bya'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du
215b8('bum): byin pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mos pa med par byed cing / bzlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs po ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin 'di ni
217a1('bum): 'dul bar yin gyis/ 'di la bsla bar bya ba mi rigs mi tshwa'o// mdo sde 'di dag ni rlung sor bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya ste gzung bar mi bya
217a2('bum): bcang bar mi bya'o// klag par mi bya'o// kun chub bar mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yi la bya'o// 'di dag ni yid la bstan par mi bya'o// zhes zer bu 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang
217a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen bri sdig pa'i gro gos po ni 'di ltar bded sdig tro can spangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sem so dag
217a4('bum): chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol du phyin pa drug las zlog cing / mos pa med per byed de/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgoms pas ni khyod la ci zhig
217a5('bum): bya/ bsam gton gyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin
217a6('bum): snyoms pras khyod la ci zhig gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin po sgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ zhes zer
217a7('bum): ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mau snro ni/ bdud kyi nyes pa mi stor pa 'di ni rlab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig bri'i grogs po ro rig par bya'o/ 
217a8('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po bdud sdig to can dge sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
217b1('bum): chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis snyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / tshod du brjod pa dang / gleng bzhi dang
217b2('bum): 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin du rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab par bsten pa dag ston to// 'grel
217b3('bum): to// rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar byed do// yongs su ston to// zhes bdud kyi sgo las rnams pa 'di lta bu dgra mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dbu
217b4('bum): chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig por bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yung bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi chu byed du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
217b5('bum): chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems kyang cung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang mo yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na med pa
217b6('bum): yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so// zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi sa las ngag mi spro mi ston pa 'di ni
217b7('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can drag sangs rgyas kyis
217b8('bum): cha byad du byos shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu/ mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba dang / 
218a1('bum): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag gama? bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag gam bradag gis stong ngo // sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos ni
218a2('bum): bdag gam bidrag gis stong ngo // mig gis rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis spong ngo // rna bu'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shA
218a3('bum): pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis skyong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
218a4('bum): drad / s+thA'i 'duswa ti reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'das te reg pa dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag grama? bdag gis stong ngo // migri gris 'dusa? te reg bI
218a5('bum): rten gyis tshor ba ni/ bdag gram bdag gis stongango // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bra dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
218a6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yod kyi 'dusra te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ bdog gom bdag gis stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha ro
218a7('bum): du phyin pa ni bdag gam gri gis stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis
218a8('bum): pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bdag bdag bdag gis steng ngo // byang chub kyis phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis bar ni bdag gam bdag gis stong / 
218b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gram bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te yang ci zhig
218b2('bum): bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyis las bdag mi sgra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs poru rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gnas
218b3('bum): yong bdud sdig te can dge/ sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shur phyogs ni sangs
218b4('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di lnga sangs rgyas shes bya ba ying med do// nyan thos shes bya ba yang
218b5('bum): med do// lho dang nub dang / byang chub dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lce nu ba dang / nub byang dong / 'gro dang steng gri phyogaso bcu kun kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 
218b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba yang med dro// byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba yang med do// nyan thos zhes bya ba yang
218b7('bum): mod de// zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi la sr-i dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// raba'i byor
218b8('bum): gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyon thos kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
219a1('bum): pa'i yin la bya ba las zlog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang 'dems shing rjesu ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las mi smras mi
219a2('bum): ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig po'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yong bdud sdig tuto can dag mkhan po dang slob
219a3('bum): dpen gyis chu bad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub semos dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
219a4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba los zlog cing / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par sbyong ba drong / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang
219a5('bum): po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
219a6('bum): smon pa med pa'i bar gyi chos rnams lo skya re zhing / de ltar rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos de drug yongs su bsgoms la/ nyan thos kyis mngon du bgyis shig/ bla med pa
219a7('bum): yid dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
219a8('bum): sdig pa'i grogs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang ba dad sdig to can dag pa dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgya
219b1('bum): du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad med
219b2('bum): grangs med par 'okhor ba nu 'khor zhing / rkang lag dang mgo bo bcad pa tshad med pas/ nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar
219b3('bum): yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa
219b4('bum): dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dro la/ brtson par gyis shig/ ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyis lus dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
219b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to tsan dog dge slong gi cha byed du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa
219b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces tso bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / 
219b7('bum): zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigos pa'i tshul gyis chos stong pa dang / tshor ba/ 
219b8('bum): dadang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar dmigasro ba'i tshul gyis chos ston po dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / 
220a1('bum): bdag med pa drang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul
220a2('bum): gyis chos ston pa dang / mig mi rtag zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi bra dang / stong po dang / mtshan me dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du
220a3('bum): bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang lce drang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang // 
220a4('bum): bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang // stong pa dang / mtshan mo dang / smyon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sa
220a5('bum): pa dang / gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / srug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong po dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngod par 'du ba
220a6('bum): ba med dang / draben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi rtag ces bya bar dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bringag
220a7('bum): med pa dang / zhi ba dang stong pa dang / mtshan mi dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs po'i tshul gyis chos ston/ pa dang / mig
220a8('bum): gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
220b1('bum): par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par
220b2('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med ces bye ba dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan
220b3('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya ba ri dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces
220b4('bum): bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / zhi bA dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon po med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya
220b5('bum): bya bar drimags pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dra te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid
220b6('bum): kye 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa maud pa dang / mngon par 'du
220b7('bum): bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
220b8('bum): bo dang / bdag med pa dang / bzhi pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
221a1('bum): chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
221a2('bum): bla dadang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang
221a3('bum): zhi ba dang stong pa dang / mtshan med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / dran
221a4('bum): pa nye bar bzhig pa rnams kyi sra bar du mi rtagri ces pa dang / sdug bsngal bu dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba drang stong pra dang / mtshan mA med pa drung / smon pa med pa dang drim
221a5('bum): par 'du bya ba med dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs bya'i tshul gyi sa che so ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / 
221a6('bum): sdug bsngal pa dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi bA dang / stong pa dang / mtshan me pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / 'du bya ba med pa dang / dpon zhes bya ba/ 
221a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyis las kyi rnam pa dang / mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grogs por rig
221a8('bum): por bya'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs pa 'di dag rig par byo ti/ 'di ltar shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o/ 
221b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong brag nyi shu lnga pa las// / le'u bdun pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
221b2('bum): gsol to// bcom ldan 'dres byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lcags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'dus kyis
221b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'du skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dron ni tshig med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyang ma skyes la
221b4('bum): sems can yang ma skyes pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor byang chub la yang tshig meng / sems can+da la yang tshig med pas de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni tshig gi don
221b5('bum): med pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mo mkha' bya'i rjes med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems draba'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste drapar na/ rmi
221b6('bum): lam la gnas mod do// rabu 'byor de bzhin du byang chubo sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di ste dper na/ sgyu ma la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
221b7('bum): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rmig rgyu la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dra ba'i tshig gi don mang ngo// 
221b8('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chu zla dang / sgra brnyan dang mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgrol po la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin tu/ 
222a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshug gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas med do// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
222a2('bum): nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyis dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas mang ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
222a3('bum): tshig gi skyon med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta skye dper/ sgyu ma'i smos bu'i gzugasra la gnas med do// 
222a4('bum): tshor ba da nga / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du sems dpe' sems dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
222a5('bum): phyin la spyod pa'i bong chub semaso dpa'i tshig gi gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lnga sde dpor rA/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i myig la gnas med do// rna ba dang / sU dang lce dang
222a6('bum): lus dngo // yang lho gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub semaso dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems/ 
222a7('bum): tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu mo'o skyes bu'i gzugs lnga gnas med do// sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / rlog dang / chos la gonas med do// rab 'byor
222a8('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta stong sa
222b1('bum): na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do// rna'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam
222b2('bum): sngar shes pa drong / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
222b3('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do// rna bo'i 'dus te reg pa dong / 
222b4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pra dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te rare gi bra dang / yid kyi 'das te reg pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sem
222b5('bum): drape'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lnga skyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'o skyes bu'i mig
222b6('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba lo granas me dro do// rna ba'o 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te res
222b7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dres te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bu dang gnas mod do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
222b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu mo'i skyes bu
223a1('bum): 'i ma rig pa la gnas med do// 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dngang ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / srid pa dang / len pa dang
223a2('bum): srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi la gnas med do// rlob 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gis don med// / 
223a3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la skyed ma'i tshig gi dron med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du
223a4('bum): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / la skyed pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
223a5('bum): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshig gi don med do// shos rab dum bu dang po// 
223a6('bum): sbom po bcu gsum pa// // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper no// sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rlung stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// phyi stong pa nyid
223a7('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid la skyed pa'i tshig gi don med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar la skyeng pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub se mos dpa' ses
223a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpe'i tshig gi don med// 
223b1('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / 
223b2('bum): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i badren pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad
223b3('bum): med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa/ 
223b4('bum): sgro gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi drang / 
223b5('bum): so so yang dgra par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la smod pa'i tshig gis don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
223b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pra la spyod po'i byang chub sems drapa'i tshigra go don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin go shegs pa dgra bcom pa
223b7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs lo gnas/ med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de med pa'i phyir/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
223b8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpe'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dpon/ de bzhi ni gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ma
224a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa de med pa'i
224a2('bum): phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems ngo pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor
224a3('bum): 'di lta ste dpe ro na/ de bzhin gau shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig la gonas mod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ migra de med pa'i phyir te/ rlob
224a4('bum): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gis don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta
224a5('bum): sto dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// 
224a6('bum): yid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
224a7('bum): med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la granas me do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzug
224a8('bum): de med dam pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
224b1('bum): de// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg dang / chos la gnas med do/ 
224b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zho na/ chos de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i chub sems dpa
224b3('bum): semaso dpa' chen po'i tshig gi don med do// rlaba'abyor 'di lta sgo dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi
224b4('bum): rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe no/ mig gi rnam par shes phra med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
224b5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'a'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhi ni gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
224b6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna bo'i rnam por shes pa drang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyis rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam
224b7('bum): par shes pa dang / la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang kyi rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir tede/ rab 'byor de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sems/ dpa'i chen
224b8('bum): bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi med do// rab 'byor 'di lta sgo dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
226a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi 'dus te reg pa gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du
226a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na
226a3('bum): de bzhi ni gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'das te reg pa dang lus
226a4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pu dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyis 'dusa? t+ye reg pa de med pa'i phyir t+ye/ rU ba 'byor de bzhin du byang chubri/ 
226a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpo'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ da ba zhe na
226a6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gri 'dres te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gis
226a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'o rkyen gyis tsho ra bu de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa
226a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i tshig gi don mod do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dpe ron/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
226b1('bum): kyi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
226b2('bum): rkyen gyis tsho ro ba dang / yid kyi 'odus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lnga gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byer
226b3('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na// 
226b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasdu pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mu rig pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mu rig pa de med pa'i phyi ru ta/ rab 'byor de bzhin
226b5('bum): da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lto ste dper na/ 
226b6('bum): shi gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du byed dang / rnam pra rdi shr-i sra pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / rkye ma chung drug dang / reg pa drang / tsho
226b7('bum): ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / sra pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rga shi de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ba zhin du byang chub sems
226b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems ngo ba'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na// de bzhin gsheg
227a1('bum): de bzhi pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa de
227a2('bum): med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste de bzhin du bya chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyodapa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
227a3('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
227a4('bum): dang / brtso ni 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bras mi gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / la glanas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ she so rab
227a5('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa de med pa'i phyin to// rab 'byer de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
227a6('bum): tshig gi dron med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhi ni gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas med do// 
227a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong po nyid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor dri bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa rol du phyin pa pa lnga spyod pa'i
227a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don meng do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper no// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dngos po
227b1('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhi
227b2('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de
227b3('bum): bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden+da pa rnams dang
227b4('bum): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i sros/ 
227b5('bum): paR+Sha 'jug pra dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams drang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / 
227b6('bum): de bzhi ro ga shegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas med
227b7('bum): do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
227b8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpo'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la 'das byas kyi khyams med do// 'dus byas kyi khams la
228a1('bum): 'dus ma byas kyi khams dbyings kyi gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyod
228a2('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa la gnas med do// 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang
228a3('bum): rnam par byeng ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
228a4('bum): snyems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// bcom ldan 'das gang gis skye ba ma mtshos pa la gnas ma
228a5('bum): mchis/ gang gis 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du gyi ba ma mchis pa dang / 
228a6('bum): pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / gang gis mi dmigs pa la gnas ma mchis pa legaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs skye
228a7('bum): ba med pa la gnas med do// gzugs 'gag pa med pa dang / gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / gzugs rnam par byang ba myed pa dang / gzugs rnam

228b1('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa la gnas med do// rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par shes

228b7('bum): pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /

229a6('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i bor du shin du rna mo par dag para'i mtshan ma'i gnas med do// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
229a7('bum): gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs

230a1('bum): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don medado// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bskal ba'i me 'bar ba'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas med do// rab 'byor

230b1('bum): nga'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la/ rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

230b8('bum): 'od la gnas med do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / 'ga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris do
231a1('bum): tshangs lha nye bon dang tshwa dris pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang zla 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'odra la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub

231a5('bum): 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpo'i tshig gi don gang yino/ pa'i chos de dag kyang ldan pa yang yan/ mi ldan pa yin te/

231b1('bum): bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi buka'i bstsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thaMd
231b2('bum): ces bya ba ni/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang lung du bstan pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'ongs pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang /

231b4('bum): 'byor de dag ni chos thams cud ces bya ba de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos de dag thams cad kyi ming ba nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems
231b5('bum): dpo' sems dpa' chen pos shes par bya bro ying chos thams cad po de dag nyid do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan
231b6('bum): 'das kyis bgra' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni par shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du shes par bram zer shes pa/ rigs kyi nang na rgan
231b7('bum): pa la/ rim gror byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dong / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi los kyi dngos
231b8('bum): po dang / nyam su blo ba dang / ldan pa'i dngos po dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lom rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / dbu
232a1('bum): can gyi 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dngos pa'i 'dra shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / 
232a2('bum): rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med
232a3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang / chos rjesu dran pa dang / dge 'dun
232a4('bum): rje su dran pa dang / tshu l+r-i khrims rjesu dran pa dang / gtong pa rje su dran pa dang / lha rje su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rje su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rje su dran pa dang / skye bya
232a5('bum): rje su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rje su dran po drag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o// gsol po bcom ljin 'dis 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags tha bco
232a6('bum): ldan 'odas kyis bka' bsnol pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa
232a7('bum): leg par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / 'phra me dang / zhe gcod pa dang / tshig khyal pa dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / mdu pa
232a8('bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'cha ba dang / 'tshog pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'phra dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang / leg pa'i nga rgyal ste/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge
232b1('bum): ba'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das lung ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bsngal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// ngag gi las ni lung du
232b2('bum): ma bstan pa'o// yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// rkye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan po'o// / 
232b3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhir skyes pa na lang du ma bstan pa'o// phung po dang khams dang / skye mched ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// rnam par smin pa thams cad ni lung
232b4('bum): du mi bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor de drag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos su shes par bya'o// gsol pra bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten+de pa'i chos gang legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
232b5('bum): bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ phung po dang khoms dang skye mched dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyis lam dang / bsam gtan+da bzhi dang / tshad myong
232b6('bum): pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma rtogs par de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi chos
232b7('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten po'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bsngal pa/ 
232b8('bum): rab 'byor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stob/ 
233a1('bum): lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang
233a2('bum): ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dpung po dang / yongasu shes par rtogs par dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas spyod pa dang bcas pa'i
233a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa lo spyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing skyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes shin
233a4('bum): dang tshul khrims dang / bzhin yid bya bo dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad glang zho na/ gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang
233a5('bum): gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ljon pas phyi rol gyi gzugs mtho' ba 'di ni rnam par thar ba gnyis pa'o// sdug par mos par gyur pa 'dra ni rnam par thar pa gsu
233a6('bum): pa'i/ gzugs kyi 'dre shes las yang dgo par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par 'gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la byed// pas nam mkha'
233a7('bum): mtha' ya sa skye mchod la nye bar sgrubs tra gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du ni mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te// 
233a8('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas so// zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' ya so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar
233b1('bum): sgrubs te gnas pa 'dri ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam par thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do// zhes cung zad
233b2('bum): med pa'i skye mched lngas nye bar sgrubs te gnas pa 'dra ni/ rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du
233b3('bum): med 'du shes med smin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam thar pa brgya dra pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pAM
233b4('bum): 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes
233b5('bum): bI'i dga' bi drang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs tre gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhe nas nang yongasu dad te/ sems
233b6('bum): kyi rgyud gcig ste/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar sgrubs tre
233b7('bum): gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyi myong la 'phags pa rnams kyi// 
233b8('bum): de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par skyed pa btang snyoms pa'i// zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i' bsam gtan gsum lo nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// des
234a1('bum): ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid mi ba dang mi bde ba snga nas kyang spangs pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa/ btang
234a2('bum): snyoms dran pas yongasu dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pA la nye bar sbubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes yang dag par 'das te/ thogs
234a3('bum): bi'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnam yang la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha'i yi so so zhes te nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched
234a4('bum): la nye bar sta bras tre gnas so// de rnam pa thims cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang drug par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' ya so zhes rlom shes
234a5('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar smra bas te gnas so// nga rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do// zhes
234a6('bum): zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar sgru bas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad de cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'a
234a7('bum): shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'dre shes med 'du sheso med min skye mched de las yang dag par 'dus te/ 'du
234a8('bum): dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang
