234b1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
234b2('bum): pa bzhi drang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang
234b3('bum): bcas pa'i glang lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa'o rab 'byer zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos shes bya bo ni/ 'di lta ste phung po dang / skye mched dang / 
234b4('bum): khams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa'i jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dge ste/ de ga ni zag pa dang
234b5('bum): bcas pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnam so gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor za/ 
234b6('bum): pa'i chos bya ba ni/ dran po nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang ni stebs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan
234b7('bum): lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bde na po bzhi dang / rnam pAr thur ba brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'o snye mas par
234b8('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon pa shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thaMd dong / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
235a1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig par bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / sring rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
235a2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag ste/ de dgra ni zag pa med pa'i tshe sra shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
235a3('bum): bskul pa/ rab 'byor 'das byas kyi chos shes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dung / gzugasro med pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa 'dus
235a4('bum): byasas su rtogasra pi'o chos rnams dang // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun de nga sangs rgyas kyi ches mi 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis par dag ste/ de dag rmi 'das
235a5('bum): byos kyi tshe sra shes bya'o// gra sol pa bcom ldan 'angs 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lagaso// bcom ldan 'angs kyi sa bka' bskul pa'o/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos
235a6('bum): sa bya ba ni/ gang lo skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas ba las gzhan+da du 'gyur pa med pa ste/ 'dod tshogs zad pA/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gauti muge zod pa/ de bzhin
235a7('bum): nyid mo nor ba dri bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ chos nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid/ chos skyon med pa nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings yang dag pa'i ma
235a8('bum): ste rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya'o// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi ches gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' bstsal pa/ rab 'phyo
235b1('bum): thun mong gi chos shes bya ba ni bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag
235b2('bum): ni bris pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang / thun mong gra chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma yin pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
235b3('bum): bsnol pa tu rab 'byor thun mong mo yin pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtse bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag ste/ 
235b4('bum): ngag ste/ de dag ni thun ming ma yin pa'i chos shes bya'o// de la byang cheb sems dpa' sems dpa' cheng+ge pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pas/ rung gi man
235b5('bum): nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thos cad la rtog pa med pos/ chags par mi bya'o// chos thams cad gnyis med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa medo cing rnam par rtog pa med pa
235b6('bum): phyir/ chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o// de nas tshe drang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das lnga 'di snyed ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'dri
235b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes gyi ba de ci'i phyir du/ byang tshob sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bstsal pa/ 
235b8('bum): rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed por 'gyur bas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan
236a1('bum): 'das sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/ 
236a2('bum): 'di lta ste rigs kyi sa drang / 'di ltar rigs kyi sna dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang // ldan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom po dang
236a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas/ pra'i byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
236a4('bum): byar drug ste/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul byed par lu
236a5('bum): ro/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can kyi phung po chen po'i nges pa'i bu la zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom
236a6('bum): ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po
236a7('bum): 'di ltar sims bskyed de/ 'khor po dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go chu go bar bya'o// bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su
236a8('bum): btang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongasu
236b1('bum): na pa tshangs na byad kyi mas kyi sa rol du phyed pa drug la spyod pa bya'o// 
236b2('bum): mya dran las bzla bar bya'o// de ltar sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan la su bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba med pas/ chos thams
236b3('bum): cad skye ba med do// 'gog pa med pa bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rje su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslob par bya'o// bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu
236b4('bum): sgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la bslab par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed par bya de/ rab 'byor 'di ni
236b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de de la gnas shing // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
236b6('bum): gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpe' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can
236b7('bum): dmyal bra dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig/ sdug bsngal gyis tsho re ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdug
236b8('bum): bsngal gyis tshor ba de dag thams cad / sems can dri dag gi don du bdag gis nyams mong bar bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dag
236b9('bum): sems dpa' chen pos/ gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don yang / bskal pa bye ba khra go khrig brgya stong med pore sems
237a1('bum): sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag
237a2('bum): kyang / bdag gis nyam su mong bar bya'o// zhes thabs de lta bu'i/ sems can thams cad kyi doni du/ sems can thams cad kyi phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das bI/ 
237a3('bum): dbyings su mya ngan las mi bzlas kyis bar du/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sdug bsngal ngo dag thams cad kyi phung po ma lus pa'u mya ngan las 'ongs pa'i dbyings su
237a4('bum): yongs su mya ngon las bzlas kyis bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dgu thams cad kyang nyams su myong bar bya'o// de nas bzod pa bdag gi don du dge ba'i/ 
237a5('bum): rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal ba bye bo khru ga khri ge brgya stong du mas byang chub kyis tshogs mang po sngags te bla na med pa yong dgra por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
237a6('bum): par 'tshang rgyu bar bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rab 'byer 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems skyed pa rdo rje lto bu ste/ de la gnas shing / 
237a7('bum): byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen nges po'i phul mi dmigs gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
237a8('bum): chen pos rgyun mi chad pa'i gnas rlabs po che'i sems gang gis/ sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems brlabs po che bskyed par bya'o// de la
237b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni sems dang po skyed phyin chud 'dod chags kyi sems kyi mi skyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed/ gti mug gi
237b2('bum): sems mi skyed // mtshe ba'i sems mi bskyed/ nyan thos kyis sems dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang mi bskyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
237b3('bum): rlabs po che'o// des sems can thams cad kyis phul byed kyang / sems rlabs po che des rlom sems so mi bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
237b4('bum): chen pos mi skul ba'i semaswa dang ldan+da pAr bya skye/ dwe l-i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i semos mi skul po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pI
237b5('bum): yId la byed cing / des rloms semasu mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skul ba'o// sems des sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin pa mi
237b6('bum): dmyigaso ba'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro// ri bo 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa
237b7('bum): bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems ni/ sems can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongs su btong la ngos
237b8('bum): rlom sems su 'gyur ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems te de la gnas shing / sems can gyi phung po chen po
238a1('bum): nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad phrar ches ston par
238a2('bum): bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o// chos la mos par bya'o// chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams rtsod dbyer med pa ste/ 'di ni
238a3('bum): sa shes bya'o// de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mos te/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos dri la dga'
238a4('bum): zhing mngon por dga' ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa zhes bya'og du chos dr-i la yon tan du lta ba ste/ 'di na chos la mos pa zhes bya'o// 
238a5('bum): de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mIng du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o// 8
238a6('bum): de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs po'i tshul gyis
238a7('bum): bya'o rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid le gan+da
238a8('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la gnas// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po dris pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
238b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 
238b2('bum): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
238b3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
238b4('bum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'dzegs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
238b5('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gnas/ te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang/ 
238b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpra' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin lnga gnas num mkha' ltor chags pa med
238b7('bum): rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// 8
238b8('bum): 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyo dge sems can gyi bu je bu chen po nges pa'i phul tu/ 
239a1('bum): byed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to
239a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba stsa
239a3('bum): pa sha re dwa ti bu de la spobs pa skye de cig/ sha ra dwa ti busa? gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta bu dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu
239a4('bum): lta ba dang / gse ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed dgi dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes po dang / mthong ba par lta ba dang / chad par
239a5('bum): blta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta bo dang / med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang / rten cang 'brel par 'byung
239a6('bum): ba dang na pha rol du phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lto ba dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya bar
239a7('bum): lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya bar blta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyasu lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun de lci ba dang / chos
239a8('bum): kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / yongasu mya ngan las zla 'da' bar lta ba'i slad du/ sems can rnamos le chos ston par bgyid kyang / mi dmig se bo'i tshul gyis bgying
239b1('bum): de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 
239b2('bum): dang ldan po sha ri'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur bar 'gyur yin/ tshor ba dang / 'dra shes dang / 'du byed dang // 
239b3('bum): rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems ngo bo'i sems
239b4('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lo skyod cing / thabs mi mkhris pas gzugs la dmigs shing drimigs pa'i tshul gyis lha bo bskyed do// tshor ba dang / 'du
239b5('bum): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par nga lo gas shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lte bar bskyed do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar
239b6('bum): 'byung bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang
239b7('bum): dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
239b8('bum): lan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs
240a1('bum): shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// rnam par thar pa dang / mthur gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
240a2('bum): ba dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang
240a3('bum): dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres par dmigasu shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lbu ba bskyed do// yongs
240a4('bum): su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
240a5('bum): po gzugs su lta ba yin tsho re ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongaso so mngan las 'da' ba'i bar du blta bar 'gyur
240a6('bum): bra yi nr-i te/ de lnga byang chub sems dpa' sems dra ba'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshed thabs mkhas pas blta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phye/ 
240a7('bum): mi dmigs pa'o tshul gyis chos ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'ad so la 'di skad ces gsol do// bcom ldan 'das don gang gis slong
240a8('bum): byang chub sems dpe' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyi bo de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis spobs pa
240b1('bum): bskyed cig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyis samras ma mnyam pa dadun mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang spongs rgyas thams dang / 
240b2('bum): thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la yang chags pa mo mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
240b3('bum): 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag bla ma mchis shing / khengs su chud pa ma mchis pa te/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma
240b4('bum): mchis shing / khams go sum gyis khongasu chud pa ma mchis/ pa'i sems de la yang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis blas/ de'i srad du byang chub
240b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems den zag pa ma mchis shing / khongasu chud pa ma ma
240b6('bum): ste/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zad pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum gyis khongs su chod pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang / rang bzhin stong pa
240b7('bum): nyid kyi slad du/ chags pa mchis byas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi so// de nus tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan
240b8('bum): pa rab 'byor le 'di skad zhes smra so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa sted nyan thos dang / 
241a1('bum): krasangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
241a2('bum): chen po sems dpe bskyed phyin chad/ chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong // 'gog pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'ang ba dang 'gro ba dang / kun nas
241a3('bum): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang la skye ba med cing / 'grag pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med cing 'gro ba pa
241a4('bum): myed pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing / rnam par byang ba mang po de la/ nyan thos kyi sems med do// rang byang chub kyis sems ma
241a5('bum): dos byang chub sems dpa'i sems med do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ru dwa ti'i ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
241a6('bum): chen po'i sems mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so// sbas pa tshe drang ldan pa rab 'byor gang
241a7('bum): khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag phred pa/ khyokho ngos su chud pa med pa ni de lta bu'i sems la yang tshugs pa med do// zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te
241a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta bas na/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang ni 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// rnam pa
241b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa myed do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du
241b2('bum): byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chugs pa med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu
241b3('bum): rnams kyi brar yang gnas pa med do// sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar la yang tshogs ba med do// rnam pa thamaso ci de mo khyen pa nyid kyi bar mar
241b4('bum): chags pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag pa med cung khongasu chud pa med do// zhes
241b5('bum): chung ba med// smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor de yang mu zad de/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing
241b6('bum): khongs su chud pa med do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis phye
241b7('bum): zlag pu me cing khongs su chud pa med do// rab 'byor gyis skyes pa de yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa
241b8('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su
242a1('bum): chung po med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan
242a2('bum): rab 'byor de lnga yin no/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong phra nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pararu shes
242a3('bum): pa ying ring bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir/ zag pa med cing khongasu chud pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis byar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir
242a4('bum): ga pa med cing khongasu chud bri med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi brda yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis phyiraru/ zag pa myed cing khongasu chud pa myed do// rab 'byor gyis
242a5('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pu med cing khongasu chud pa med do// tshor ba dang 'dra shes
242a6('bum): dang / 'du byed de gu rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis phyir/ zag pa med pa'i khongs su chud pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar
242a7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongasu chud pa med do// nu mo pa thums ca du mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zug pa med cing khongasu chung/ 
242a8('bum): pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang yang khyed 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir// sems de la yang chags pa medo// zhes smos pa de ni de lta yin te/ tshe
242b1('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma zag ste/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do// tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa
242b2('bum): med pa yang rnams par shes pa la chags pa med do// byang chub kyis phyogs kyis chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / byang chub kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi/ 
242b3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'di yan chad kyi bar du med pa yang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dresu pa rnams la chags pa maudado// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang
242b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do// skyes pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs med pa yang gzugasA la chags pa med do// tshor ba med pa dang / 
242b5('bum): 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang / rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / byang chub
242b6('bum): gyi phyogs kyi chos rnams lnga chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do// rnam
242b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chegos pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' snyoms dpa' chen
242b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems/ 
243a1('bum): ngas kyang chos thams cad la dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med/ mngon par tshugs par 'gyur ba med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems// 
243a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams pa gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gros slang
243a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de lo bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ gang khyed kyis spobs pa skyed cig/ 
243a4('bum): gong pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgros pa'i sems can lagros te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag paro zhugs pa'i sems can
243a5('bum): lags la de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags te/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan
243a6('bum): sha ra dwa tI bA s+yA/ tshe dang ldan pa byams pa gang gris bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan+do po gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
243a7('bum): glo cha chen po ge so zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti buM 'dri la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po ni/ sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du
243a8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su btong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongasu
243b1('bum): btong ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dag la gnas shing / tshul khrims bsrung ba ma yin gyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don du
243b2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol de phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrimaso srang ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyi re/ bzod pa'i pho rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa sgom pa ma
243b3('bum): yon gyisems can thams cad kyi don du/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la cing bzed pa sgom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
243b4('bum): gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi rtso mo pa mi yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'a gle so brtsom mo// sems
243b5('bum): dUng zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / bsem gtan skyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ bsam gtan gyi
243b6('bum): rol du phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan skyid do// sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab kyi sgom pa ma
243b7('bum): thams ts+tshed kyi don du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab sgom mo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can 'di snyed cig/ phung
243b8('bum): ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni/ yongs su mya ngan las par mi bya'o// zhi 'am/ sems
244a1('bum): can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub du dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyed gcig ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o// zhes/ sems can yongasu dpagra bas go cha mi gyi rgyu
244a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ go cha chen po gyon te/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yi/ 
244a3('bum): su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
244a4('bum): de phan pa dang ni brtsom 'gas kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha ro'o du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can
244a5('bum): thems cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// budag kyang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phagos pa'i bden pa dang / 
244a6('bum): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med po rnams dang // gzugs med pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa rnams lo gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med
244a7('bum): pra'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / man+da
244a8('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / me / 
244b1('bum): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mu 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas kyi cho/ 
244b2('bum): ma 'dres bu bcwo brgya dzam sbyor bar bya'o// zhes bya bar sems skyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ba rgyas
244b3('bum): ba zhes bya'o// / shes rab dam bu dang po// / bam po bcu bzhi pa'o// / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gr-i zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chem
244b4('bum): chen po shis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su btong ba de drag nyan thos dang / sangs rgyas dang ldan po'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cang
244b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yo di la bya bas yo ngase su stong ste/ dge ba'i rtse ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / blo med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
244b6('bum): chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongasu bting ba sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'on
244b7('bum): che'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs
244b8('bum): btong zhing / nyan thos dang / reng sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi sngob 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa spyod cing // 
245a1('bum): sbyin pa yongs su btong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnam pa tham
245a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba'i chos de dgro lo bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
245a3('bum): papa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su btong zhing bzod pa'i pha'i rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ro dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po skyon
245a4('bum): bya yongasu btong po'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus mnyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon
245a5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su btong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa she rA dA ti bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
245a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su btong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi sel bya bas/ sems rtse gcig
245a7('bum): tu rten cing / de la dmigs pa rnyog pas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyis go myi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
245a8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongasu btong ba'i ga bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shau ra dwe ti bu gzhan byang chub sems
245b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongasu btong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams
245b2('bum): cad sgyu ma byas pa'i 'dra shes nye bar gonas te/ sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ gtong ba yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
245b3('bum): chen blo/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti bu/ nam byang chub sems
245b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam po thums cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol du phyin po de dag la mtshan mar byed cing / mi drimigs pa de'i tshe/ byang chub
245b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
245b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ni sbyin pa gang yongs su btong ba de
245b7('bum): deg sems can thams cad then mong du byas shing / blo ni med pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ yongs su sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems
245b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyis pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
246a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa nyid drang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas/ 
246a2('bum): kyis la yang mos pa mi byed na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa la lto smos kyang ci smos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyod // 
246a3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyi ne pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i/ 
246a4('bum): yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyong bas/ ches de dag la bzang ba dang / chos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
246a5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyong pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa lnga skyong du'o// tshe dang ldan pa shU ra dwa te'i bu grA zhan yod byeng chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan/ 
246a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bsatshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus mo nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
246a7('bum): dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub semaso dpe'i sems
246a8('bum): dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing // gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rangs sla rgyas
246b1('bum): kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang 'thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo ba 'di na
246b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA r-i dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byong chub/ 
246b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan tho sra dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ljon pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lo bye bra
246b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rloms su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong
246b5('bum): dze kyi phyir/ tshul khrims de yang mi ro migasu shing / dge ba'i rtsa de yang sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya sr-i te/ bla na med pa yang dag
246b6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
246b7('bum): pa'o// tshe dang ljon pa sha r-i dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa no/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongasu
246b8('bum): 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po gos po shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i phyi rol du phyin pa la cing nyar
247a1('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba ma yin gyis/ rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su btong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de/ 
247a2('bum): yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byaso shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod
247a3('bum): pa'i pha rol du phyin/ pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu gzhan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la
247a4('bum): spyod cing / nye nu thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yis la bya ba ma yin gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / 
247a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mo du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang cheb sems dpa' sems dpa'
247a6('bum): chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byeng che ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod
247a7('bum): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dge la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
247a8('bum): chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po nyan thos dang / 8
247b1('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed/ 
247b2('bum): pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
247b3('bum): sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan po'i yid lo bya bas ma yan gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzang po'i
247b4('bum): pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sems brtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la skyid pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du
247b5('bum): phyin pa lo spyod pa'o// tshe dang ldan+da pa sha ra dwa ti'i grwazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyis/ rnam
247b6('bum): rlom pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad sgyu mor byas pa'i 'du shes nyi bor gnas te/ bzod pa
247b7('bum): des rlom sems su mi byed cing / bzod pa mi dmigs po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// / 
247b8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra do ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin to/ de'i
248a1('bum): phyir go cha chen po bgos pa shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dadwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing // 
248a2('bum): nyan thos da rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas me yin gyi/ rnam pa thoms cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su sde po 'di ni/ byang chub
248a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan po sha ra dr-i ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems pa'o/ 
248a4('bum): sems dang / 'a chun po brtson 'gras kyi wa rol du phyin pa la spod cing / nyin thaMs dang / rang sangs rgyaso dang ldan pa'i yade le bA bse ma aiTI gyis// rnas pa glama? sa cang ma khe na
248a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems n+dan thams cang dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byab
248a6('bum): tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan po
248a7('bum): rAdwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyod po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
248a8('bum): ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bye bas ma yin gyis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
248b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson zhugs kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang / myos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
248b2('bum): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i'o bzod po'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
248b3('bum): chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'o yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid deng ldan pa'i yang la bya bus/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du
248b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'gras nyam par mi byed cing / myun me nges pa 'di na byang cheb sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus
248b5('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang
248b6('bum): rlong sangs rgya sri dang ldan po'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ nem pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yud la bya bas ni/ sems rtso cig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa
248b7('bum): sems dpa'i chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu gzhan yod byang chub sems dpa' sems
248b8('bum): dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yi la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas
249a1('bum): ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa bya de yang sems can thams cad dang
249a2('bum): thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa
249a3('bum): skyong pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shwa rA dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ltar skyod pa ni/ 
249a4('bum): pha rol du phyin pa drag po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub semasau dpa' sem so dpa'
249a5('bum): chen po bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa la skyed cing / nyon thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang ldan/ pa'i ying la bya ba ma yin gyi ro rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
249a6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yong su btong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu phongs
249a7('bum): su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po bsam gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu ga zhan yang
249a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed cing / nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa
249b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang
249b2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha'o// 
249b3('bum): du phyin pa'o// tshe drang lda no pa she ra dwa ti'i bu gre zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin po la slong na rje/ nyan thos drang rang sangs
249b4('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzong po yongs su sgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can
249b5('bum): thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla nu ming pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo bo 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi
249b6('bum): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i phyi rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs
249b7('bum): rgyus dang ldan pa'i yid la bya zas ma yin gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yong ye bya bsan bsam gtan gyi phyi rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson
249b8('bum): 'grus kyi mnyam par mi byed de/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
250a1('bum): sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan
250a2('bum): pa shA rA dwa ti'i bu gzhan yod byeng chub sems dpa' semasnga dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
250a3('bum): ldan pa'i yi li bya ba la sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang songs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi sgo cha mi 'byed cing
250a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thon mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub soms dpa' sem
250a5('bum): dpa' sems chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe deng ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
250a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gau tan des kyang rlom
250a7('bum): sems su mi byed cing / bsam gtan de yang mi ngamigos te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ 
250a8('bum): byang chub tu yongasu sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa ga ra
250b1('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen+da po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa de la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongasu 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha/ 
250b2('bum): chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sa
250b3('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas me yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa btong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa
250b4('bum): ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ta yongs su spo ba 'di ni/ bang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa'
250b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyor pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha rI dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byeng chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shwe/ 
250b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin bya la skyer corje nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bye bas ma yin gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
250b7('bum): bsro/ tshul khrims yongasu srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thon mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu slob
250b8('bum): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpe'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin phye la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha r-i dwe tI'i bye gzhan yang
250b9('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems rngapa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po lo skyong ci // nyan thos dang / sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid le bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa
251a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos shing rten de dgra dag pa'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang
251a2('bum): mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag pur rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su spo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
251a3('bum): skyong pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha r-i da ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
251a4('bum): la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas/ bertson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang
251a5('bum): thun mo nga du pas te/ bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i bang chub tu yongaso su so ba 'di ni/ bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
251a6('bum): skyed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan po shA re dwa ti'i bu gzhi na yang byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skye/ 
251a7('bum): nyon thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba
251a8('bum): de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po / 
251b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
251b2('bum): rol du phyin pa lo spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas po'i 'du shes nye bar gnas ste/ nyen thos dang / rang songs rgyas dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa
251b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rlom sems su byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mo da byas
251b4('bum): shing / bla na med pa yang dug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo ba 'di rlo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyong/ 
251b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol du byin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ro dwa ti'i bu nem yang byang chub sems dra ba'u sems dpe'a'i chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidri dong ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 
251b6('bum): pha rol du phyin pa 'du dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan me re mi byed/ mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
251b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shau ra da ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol du phyin pa re re la gan
251b8('bum): shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gti
252a1('bum): dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par 'jog ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa
252a2('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang myong bar mi byed do// bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa de dag gis kyang mi 'phogs te/ bsam gtan dang / tshung
252a3('bum): med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o// tshe dang ldan pra sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
252a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha re da ti'i bu gzhan yid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan
252a5('bum): dadan tshad med me dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dbyen pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshoni me med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par
252a6('bum): bzlo ga ste/ dri drag gi dbang gi kyang mi skye/ yang dag pa'i mthe'i mngon du yang mi byed de/ nyan thos dang ring sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan pa shar
252a7('bum): radwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thubras mkhas pa'i go tshe chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan+da pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar
252a8('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan po sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lcer go che tshe
252b1('bum): blo dgos pa la 'ashAr phyogasu dang / lhon pa dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / skyeng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi
252b2('bum): gyi khyims glang ga'i skyong gi bye mu skyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhugs bya rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing / myong yongs su sgrogs pa mdzad de/ 'dzud de
252b3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po gro che chen po dgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin de'i byed do// sangs rgyas kyi ni
252b4('bum): yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o// zhes sku brjod pa mdzad cing / dbyangs rjesu sgrog go/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang pi ji tsam gyis ni/ byang chub sboms
252b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ glang pos smos pa/ tshe dang
252b6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol de phyin pa drug la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to mi
252b7('bum): drag ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas/ dben pa la so skyesra ba'i dga' ba dang / badre bu can bas mo gautan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de
252b8('bum): bzhin du bras mo gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / byizhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gan so// de byams pa dang / ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin du yangs pa/ me gnyis pa tshad med pa
252b9('bum): gzugs med pa tshad med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin du sgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mtha' sa ga
253a1('bum): pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya
253a2('bum): chen po shin du yongs pa/ mi gonyis pa tshad pa/ gzugs mong po/ gnod pa med pa/ ltong pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin du sgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyis dbyings
253a3('bum): kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas btags pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de tshang med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa// 
253a4('bum): 'di dag la na mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mus rnam par 'jog cing / rnam par ldang po'i tshe yang / rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa
253a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / 
253a6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shos rab kyi pha rol du phyini pe ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ror-i dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe' chen po theg pa chen po la
253a7('bum): yang dag par bzhugs pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa
253a8('bum): mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gzugs med pa/ gnod pa med pe/ lhong pa med pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa/ shin du sgoms paso// 'jig rteni chos kyi dbyings kyis blas pa/ nam mkha'i
253a9('bum): mthas btus pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par skyed do// de snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pI sems rgya chen
253b1('bum): po/ shin du yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gzugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa shin du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyis klas pa/ 
253b2('bum): namakhye'i mthe'as btags pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bi kang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de 'did pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas
253b3('bum): dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dngango bo la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bzhin du brasam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsu
253b4('bum): pra dang / bzhi ba lu nye bar bsgrubs te/ gnas so// na mkha' mtha' yas rgya mched dang / rnamra shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'a
253b5('bum): shes med min skye mched la nyi bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
253b6('bum): de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po mngon du 'gro bas/ nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ bsgom gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
253b7('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing 'chad pa dang / rten cing 'brel lnga/ rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro dang / de dag gi skyon 'byung ba
253b8('bum): ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// nam byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams
253b9('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba de dag gis/ bsam gtan dang / tshad mod pa dang / gzugs po'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par
254a1('bum): ldang yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sram/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
254a2('bum): po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma nyams pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bas
254a3('bum): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnams par spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad mkhyen kyi nyon mongs
254a4('bum): pa zad par bya ba'i phyir/ chos bstan to mnyam du sems shing / yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa dang / sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni byung
254a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dong ldan pa'i yod
254a6('bum): la bya sa/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'o snyoms par 'jog po de dag gi rnam par sbyong pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / ma pa thams cad mnyes
254a7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyis pha rol du phyin pa'o// nem byang chub sems dpa'
254a8('bum): sems dpo' chen po rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang // ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
254b1('bum): mnyam pa bzhog cing / rnam par ldang ba yang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ mi lhung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyis
254b2('bum): pha rol du phyin pa'o// rnam byang chub sem+b+ha swa dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan
254b3('bum): gnyis po dang / gsum po dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gdan gyi yan lag mi rtog pa'i rnam dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / 
254b4('bum): ba'i rnam pa dang / slong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog cing / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa
254b5('bum): 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing / de dag gis/ sems med pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti
254b6('bum): bu ga zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sgom pa drung / rnam pa thams
254b7('bum): cang du 'phagaso bo'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
254b8('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
255a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
255a2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgoms pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pra shwa ra du ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
255a3('bum): chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad
255a4('bum): yongasu bsgrub par bya'o// zhes de la bzhil bar bya'o// snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin deng / la mnyam par bzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying rtse ba'i nyams
255a5('bum): byed do// 'ga' ba'o ting nge 'dzin la mnyam pa zo zhog cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so// btang snyom
255a6('bum): kyoting nge 'dzin la bzhog cing / sems can gyi zag pa bzung bar bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed do// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la
255a7('bum): spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam
255a8('bum): por bzhog cing / rnam par ldong yang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sde ba ma btogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yengasu sngo ba 'di ni byang chub
255b1('bum): sems dpa' sems ngo bo' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
255b2('bum): chen po// bsam gtan dang / chud med pa rnams lnga dang / gzugs med po'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la de dag gi mA 'dres par rnam par skyed cing / sa gnyis po nyan
255b3('bum): kyi sa 'aman rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing / dga' ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad
255b4('bum): me pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// na mi byang chub sems dpo'i sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
255b5('bum): pa'i mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang bar bya ba dang / dge bo'i chos phun su ma tshogs par byas pa'i don du brtson 'grus mi btong bas/ rnam par spyod pa 'di ni byang chu
255b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// nem byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan
255b7('bum): dang / tsha dra med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par bzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa
255b8('bum): 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar byed med la de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsha
256a1('bum): med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
256a2('bum): yid la bya bas/ bsam gton dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugaso med pa'i snyoms pa de dag la yang mnyam par bzhog cing / rnam par ldang la/ de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam
256a3('bum): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par
256a4('bum): rab tu rtog cing / nyan thos dang du rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang 'jug par mi byed pa 'ang ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phra rol du sbyis
256a5('bum): pa steng tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa/ 
256a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid shos kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ byi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
256a7('bum): bar du shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'od na byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan
256a8('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing / mnyam par bzhag po/ 
256b1('bum): shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa tI'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sem
256b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi rtag bu dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdage dang / bdag med pa dang / sdug bI dang / myi stu/ 
256b3('bum): ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul dri byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// 
256b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po n+do grong 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar dus
256b5('bum): mashes pa 'jug/ par mi byed de dus gsum mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 'di la dus gsum mi shes pa yang med pa 'di ni tshe dang ldan+de pra shA ra dwa tI'i bu byang chub sem
256b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thig pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shi ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste/ 'ong/ 
256b7('bum): bla'i khamasu shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khamasu shes pa 'jug par mi byed la/ 'dod pa dang gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i kham
256b8('bum): migs pa ying meng ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i zag pa chen po'i// 
257a1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la snang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ 
257a2('bum): zug pa dang bcas pa dang / zag medadro pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi bar chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed cing / 'jig rten pa drang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
257a3('bum): mi shes pa yang mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa meng bu dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byos kyis chos rnams kyang myed pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
257a4('bum): bu 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thog pa chen po'o// smras pa tsho dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub
257a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thug pa chen blo la ga nas shes bya/ gang pos smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dri la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
257a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyong nga'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin po la yang drug par gnas kyang nges sbyin pa yang mi rimigs sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang mi dmigs
257a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' yang mI dmigs/ ljon pa yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
257a8('bum): chen po'i mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang dgi par gnas shes bya'o// tshul khrims kyi rim du byed pa ngon bu thod pa'i pha rol du phyin/ 
257b1('bum): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang
257b2('bum): dag par gnas kyang / nges dge ba'o chos kyang mi dmigs mi dge ba dang / 'jog rten pa dang / 'jig rtenA las 'das pa dang / 'odus byas dang na zug po dang bcas par ngo/ zag pa
257b3('bum): med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing / shes rab kyang mi dmigs shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag
257b4('bum): kyang mi dmigs ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// 
257b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra de de'i bu gzhon yeng byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ljon+do yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rna
257b6('bum): par bsgom pa'i don du de/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam
257b7('bum): par som pa'i don da dzi mi dmi gas pa'i tshwa'i kyiso// pheM nang srong pa nyi ji sbom mo// rnam pa thams cad mo// ben pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying lo ba pa ma 'dres pas/ besgom pab+h+yAM
257b8('bum): bar bsgom pa'i don du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyo nang steng pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam
258a1('bum): ba sgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
258a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnams par bsgom pa'i don du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byas
258a3('bum): chub kyi phyogs kyis chos rnams sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
258a4('bum): gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams drang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / 
258a5('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon po med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa
258a6('bum): yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom ma
258a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu da
258a8('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dge par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad sgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems da
258b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'di ltar byang chub sems
258b2('bum): dpa'i dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni the snyad tsam du zad do// zhes bya bar sheso// gzugs migs su med pa'i phyir/ gzugs
258b3('bum): shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zod do// tshor ba dang 'du shis dang / 'du byed dang sgo rnam par shes pa dmi gsu med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ ming tsam mo du zad du/ 
258b4('bum): snye mchod dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmi gse mod pa'i phyir rten cing du 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mang tsam mo/ sbyin po'i pha rol du phyin pa dmigs
258b5('bum): su med pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni miji tsam du zad do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du byan pa dang / brtsone 'o gas kyi
258b6('bum): pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa drimigs su med pa'i phyir// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ma
258b7('bum): tsam du zad do// nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'od ni/ ming tsam du zad do// phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid
258b8('bum): ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo du zad ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po mong pa'i ngo bo nyi
259a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dmi// 
259a2('bum): su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnas
259a3('bum): dz+re/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
259a4('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jig
259a5('bum): ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa rnams bcwo brgyad ces
259a6('bum): bya ba 'di ni ming du zad do// de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mong tsam du zod do// de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid
259a7('bum): ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang ngo // ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyis gnas nyid dang / chos skyen
259a8('bum): med pa nyid dang / yang dag po'i mtha' mugasu med pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// zhes bya bar yang dag par shes byang chub dmig su med
259b1('bum): ba'i phyir/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad // zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ 
259b2('bum): tshe dang ldan po sha re dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg po chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha r-i dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
259b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing // 
259b4('bum): sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i phyir tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyaso bcom ldan
259b5('bum): 'das la rim gro bya dang / bkur s+t+wa~M bya ba dang / ste bo steng du bya ba dang / mchod parlabya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
259b6('bum): 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid chos kyi chos nyan to// de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhi dra nase sang/ 
259b7('bum): rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro/ sangs rgyas kyi zhong yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongasu smin por byed kyang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byong na sems
259b8('bum): can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi byung ngo // de gnyis su med pa'i sil gnos shing / lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya bo'i mthu yod
260a1('bum): de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing / yongs su 'dzin to// nges rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyis bar du du thegs pa de dang nam du ya
260a2('bum): mi bAl te/ nges rnam pa thams cing mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang nga nyan+da thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha de da/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha
260a3('bum): mo yin dang / namakhra' ldeng dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho phye chen po dang / ma dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyis 'khoru lo rab tu
260a4('bum): bskor ro// nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang go'i klung gi bye ma rnyed
260a5('bum): dragu ts+tsha/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus zhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyis khams che ga mo zhig du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
260a6('bum): chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tho ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
260a7('bum): gyis kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do// zhes gragasra ba sgrog cing / dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// lho ngang nub dang ni byang dang / byang shar dang / sha ro lho dang / 
260a8('bum): lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snying dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhugs
260b1('bum): pa/ rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i
260b2('bum): mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor la bskor ba byedado// / 
260b3('bum): zhes grags pa sgrog cing / dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag pA
260b4('bum): seM nas shes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ljon 'dus go cha chen po dgros so// go cha chen po bgro
260b5('bum): so zhes bgyi ni// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'a'i go cha chen po brags shes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
260b6('bum): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bsngal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha gyon cing
260b7('bum): de 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha dgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / bas
260b8('bum): kye t+yan s+yai pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha gos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha gos/ phye stong pa nyid kyi go cha gos/ phyi na ngo stong pa nyid kyi go cha gos// 
260b9('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha go cha go/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi go tshe bgos/ yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang ste
