261a1('bum): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / laM gyis go cha gos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pur 'jug pa dang / 
261a2('bum): rnam par gyur ba dang / mthor gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang // 
261a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ 
261a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha gos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha gos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas bor bkang ste/ 
261a5('bum): shor phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengaso ti// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho
261a6('bum): dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng ge phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gong ga'i klung gi bye mo snyed snang ba tshe rgyas bar 'gongs so// stong gsum gyi
261a7('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug du rab tu bskyod do// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye mi skyeng rnam pa drug du rab tu skyong // lho phyogs
261a8('bum): nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shir dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi kham so gang ga'i klung gi
261b1('bum): bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do// des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thaMd med
261b2('bum): par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal
261b3('bum): ba'i sems can de dag kyang nga sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang / bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag
261b4('bum): sems can dmyal ba de drog nas rnam par longs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu sbyin
261b5('bum): de bzhin du byolo song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin
261b6('bum): rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang nang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhugs shing mtsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// rab
261b7('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gos lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dir 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du
261b8('bum): sems dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon par sprul la/ de ltar mngon par sprul nas ngan song gis sems can de dag la sangs
262a1('bum): kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrogs par 'gyur te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal
262a2('bum): bu dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems sgyu'i mkhyen po dang / sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan
262a3('bum): bu ngas/ sems can gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de nas rnam par blong ba yod dam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mi mchis
262a4('bum): sa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal ba/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i
262a5('bum): sems can nemes ngan song gsum las yongs su dkrol yang / sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar bya ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na
262a6('bum): chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po dgos shes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
262a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po dgos pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams b+he dUr+ya'i rgyu los
262a8('bum): byung ba mngon par sprul par byed do// de ltar bye dUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par skul nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar 'khor lo sa sgyur ba'i rgyal
262b1('bum): srid mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed// skom 'dod pa rnams la skom/ gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la gzhon pa/ dgos 'dod pa rnams la dgos
262b2('bum): me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams lo phreng ba/ smos 'dod pa rnams la spos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/ mal tshwa 'dod pa rnams la mal cha/ 
262b3('bum): 'dod pa rnams la khyim/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tshe ba/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad 'dod pa rnams la nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa
262b4('bum): byed do// nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye dur+ya dang / dung dang / na shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye dur+ya dang / dung dang man
262b5('bum): shilnga dang / byi ru dang / gaM sde ra dang / de ngul gyi sbyin pa byed cing / mi'i yo byad gang tswi yang rung ba'i sbyin pa byed de/ des de ltar zlas 'dod pa ma rnams la zas byin/ mau'i yo byad gang
262b6('bum): gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta snyed pha rol du phyin pa drug dang / ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston no// semaso can de dag gos// 
262b7('bum): kyang chos bsten pa de thos nos/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sang se ma rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang lnga ni mra yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// / 
262b8('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis la po che bzhi mdor 'i dug sbyid/ skye bo'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skyes
262b9('bum): mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sbrel te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin/ yod byed gang ci yang yod pa'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byorarong lo ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i
263a1('bum): po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang la yang ci yang skyen pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis// 
263a2('bum): bkra' bskul pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul te/ zlas 'dod pa rnams la zos skye/ 
263a3('bum): mi'i yo byad grang ci yang rung ba'i bar byin yod / sems can gang la yang ci yang sbyin pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams/ 
263a4('bum): kyikyichos nyid kyi de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go chu chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub ses/ 
263a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / ched du bsams te skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs skyo zhing / de 'khor
263a6('bum): sa sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas shing / sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i lus kyi lam la rab tu 'god do// bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
263a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang rnam par thar pa brgyad
263a8('bum): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang
263b1('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god do// sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang
263b2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur kyi bar du/ chos bstan pa de dang / nam yang 'bral mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper ni/ sgyu ma'i
263b3('bum): mkhan po 'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyis mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshe gas shig mngon par sprul
263b4('bum): te sems can de dag mngon bdag pa bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dum/ sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis bar la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ skye
263b5('bum): ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mokhas pa des/ sems can gong yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam lo bkod pa yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa bcwo brgyad
263b6('bum): kyi ba ra la prakod pa yod dma?/ gsol phreng bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' bskul pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems da/ 
263b7('bum): chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyis lom la rab tu bkod ngo // sangs rgyas kyi tshe so ma 'dres pa bron+do brgyad kyis bar la rab tu bkod// sangs rgyas
263b8('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams
264a1('bum): kyi chos nyid kyi de bzhin pa'i phyir te// rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gro cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// / shes rab bam po/ 
264a2('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'a/ 
264a3('bum): dorab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin po lo sbyor zhing rab
264a4('bum): tu 'grod pa zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dpe bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang dbyig/ 
264a5('bum): rdeg cing / mtshon gyis 'debs kyang / de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyod par mi bya'o// zhes go cha gyon cing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa
264a6('bum): ba la rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'o mtshan po mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo tshogs
264a7('bum): mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor ba dang / rab tu 'god pa byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am
264a8('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'ongs kyi
264b1('bum): bka' bsngal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin+d+ra pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang
264b2('bum): yang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bkod po med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te// rab 'byor
264b3('bum): de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po dgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus
264b4('bum): pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing / gzhog gi 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems
264b5('bum): dpa' se mos dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas zhing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dog par skul pa dang/ 
264b6('bum): gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pon rnam pa thams cad mukhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems pa ste de pa dang / 
264b7('bum): can thams cad lus dang / sems kyis brtson 'gros la yang drag par skul zhing gzhog go 'gado// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgo ma'i ma
264b8('bum): mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ lus dang sem
265a1('bum): 'grus la bkor na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des/ sems can gang yang lus dang / sems
265a2('bum): kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dmo/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bsrel pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
265a3('bum): dpa' chen bris/ sems can tshad med grangs med pad lus dang sems kyi brtson grus la spyod bkod kyang / sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi sra brtson 'grus la bkod do// 
265a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
265a5('bum): po ni go cha chen po dgos bya zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams
265a6('bum): cad bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par skul zhing / gzhig go// 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du
265a7('bum): phyin pa gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog zhing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
265a8('bum): dro b.ra' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyis chos nyid la gnas shing chos gang la yang 'khrug pa 'am/ 'khrug pa med par yang dag par zlos mi mthong na/ bsam gtan
265a9('bum): gyis pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhingang gzhog pa dang / 'go/ 
265b1('bum): pa med de/ de ltar yang dag par bskul ba rnams kyang / nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyis bar du nam
265b2('bum): yang bas gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhyen po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam
265b3('bum): po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs sha ga mngon par sprul te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor
265b4('bum): de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'o mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhyen po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol
265b5('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can thos
265b6('bum): cangad bsam gyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod kyang sems can gang yang bsamya gratan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos
265b7('bum): bar bzang ni/ chos rnams kyis chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta ra'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// 
265b8('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyis pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang
266a1('bum): dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'grod do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / sen thams
266a2('bum): cang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
266a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun+da nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byeng ba 'am/ tshu rol tam/ pha rol du me dmigs
266a4('bum): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
266a5('bum): phyin pa la yang dag pa re skal zhing bzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor 'di l-I sde dper no/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam
266a6('bum): bro che'i bzhi mdor mdug snye/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyis mngon du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul
266a7('bum): te bzhag cing bkod ni/ rab 'byor du ji snyam du sems/ sgyu mo'i mkhyen po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
266a8('bum): la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol po bcom ldan 'das de ni mi mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' som
266b1('bum): dpa' chen pos/ sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin/ pa la bkod kyang // sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i
266b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyis chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor do lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' seMs
266b3('bum): dpa' chen po ni go tsho chen po dgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go tshwa chen po dgosra shing / shar phyogs kyi 'jig
266b4('bum): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du srong zhing / ji ltar bang ga sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni sems
266b5('bum): can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la skul zhing gzhog go/ 'gogrod do// ji ltar bdage tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang
266b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin bu dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gra la gnas pa// 
266b7('bum): du 'jig rten gyi kho mos de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag por skul zhing / bzhog go// 
266b8('bum): do// 'di lta sted pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid chos kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma/ 
267a1('bum): par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi bar du pha rol du phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// lho dang nub dang byung dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / 
267a2('bum): nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dge tu song zhing ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pho rol du phyin pa la gnas pa dang / shes rab/ 
267a3('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin bI bar la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thas cad kyang / smyon pa'i pha rol du sbyin pa la yang / 
267a4('bum): dog par skyelo zhing gzhag go/ 'god do/ de bzhin du pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan skyes pha rol
267a5('bum): du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go// 'god do// 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drag po 'od nyid kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can
267a6('bum): de dog kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyo bar du pha rol du phyin pa drug dang namya yang 'bral bar mi
267a7('bum): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'am/ sgyu ma'o mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gisau/ lom po che'i bzhi mdor 'duge ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyis/ 
267a8('bum): mdun du/ skye bo'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ pha rol du phyin pa drug la yang dag par skul ste/ gzhag ste bkod pa gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan sa
267b1('bum): 'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i chan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang pha rol du phyin pa drug la yang dag par bskul zhing bzhig ste/ bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
267b2('bum): ni ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// shar phyogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung
267b3('bum): gi bye ma snyed dang / lho dang nub dang / byang dang / byang sher dang / shar lho dang / lce nu bo dang / 'og dang / steng ge phyogs kyi phyogs re re nus/ 'jog rten gyi sa khams gang ga'i klung gi bye
267b4('bum): ma snyid kyi sems can glang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad pha rol du phyin pa drug la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang pha rol du phyin pa drug la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir
267b5('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyis chos nyid kyi de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go tsha che
267b6('bum): po dgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis nA
267b7('bum): par spyod cing / sems skyed pa gzhan gyis go mi 'byed de/ bdag gis sems can 'di ji snyed cig ni/ sbyin pI pha ral du phyin pa la 'gad bar bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi
267b8('bum): bya'o// bdag gi sems can 'di snyed cig ni tshul khrims kyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / bas gtan gyis/ 
268a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyis pha rol du phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di skyed cig ni dgong por mi bya'o// mdzag gri sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub kyis
268a2('bum): phyogs kyis chos sgom bcu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdug gis sems can 'di skad cig ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcom
268a3('bum): brgyad kyi bar la bya'o// 'dre snyed cig ni dgod par mo bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cigra ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// 'di ji snyed cig ni dgong
268a4('bum): prar me bya'o// bdog gis sems can 'di ji srid cig nau/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di ji snyed
268a5('bum): cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gi sems can 'di ji snyed cig ni/ rang byang chub la dag par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bu drag gis sems can 'od snyed cig ni nirna
268a6('bum): par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// zhes bya bar sems skyed pa gzhan gyis go mi 'byong gyis/ de 'di snyam du sem/ 
268a7('bum): gis sems can tshad meng grangs med pa sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// bdag gis sems con tshad med grangs med pa tshul khrims kyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / 
268a8('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gton gyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// nang stong pa
268b1('bum): la dgod par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par bya'o// byang chub kyis phyo/ 
268b2('bum): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o// 'phagaso ba'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i semaso par 'jug pa bzhi pa/ 
268b3('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gronas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
268b4('bum): shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyis sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mo 'jig sna ba bzhi dang / so so
268b5('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la dgod par bya'o// rgyun du bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgong por bya'o// lon cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
268b6('bum): bu dang / phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod por bya'o// rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ 
268b7('bum): ra sems bskyed par bya'o// raba'i byer 'dra lnga ste dbyer n+ya/ sgyu mA'i mkhyen pa 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'o mchur bu me khros pa zhig gros/ lom po che'i bzhi mo
268b8('bum): ste/ skye bo mang po'i cho gos kyis mngon du skye bo mang po'i chags zhig mngon bai sprul / 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i da ngon
269a1('bum): byin pa drug la dgod par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par bya'o snyam du sems skyed par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma
269a2('bum): mkhan po 'o ma/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu nges/ sems can gang yang pha rol du phyin pa drug la dgod par bya ba yod/ dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ba re la dgod
269a3('bum): par byas pa yod dmi/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
269a4('bum): brosas sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis bar la dgod par sems skyod kyang / sems can gang gi don du yang
269a5('bum): sems bskyed pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu myi'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyis chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub seMs
269a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po// go tshe chen po dgos shos bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ 
269a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rang gis mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis slad du/ go cha ma mchis pa'i go dgos par rig par gyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'dra/ 
269a8('bum): de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyi stong ngo // tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed/ dang rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo // mig mig gis stong ngo // de bzhin du rna pa dang / 
269b1('bum): sna dang / lce dang/ lus dang / yid yid kyis skyong ngo // gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo // sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos chos kyis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam
269b2('bum): brir shes pas stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyis rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par
269b3('bum): shes pas stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gri 'dis te reg pas stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyis 'dus te
269b4('bum): reg pa dang / yid kyis 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bad mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo // rna ba'i lus
269b5('bum): te reg pa rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo // dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid
269b6('bum): kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi sa tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo // tshul khrims kyis
269b7('bum): pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsom gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyis pha rol du phyin pa shes rab kyi
269b8('bum): rol du phyin pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid nang pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po med pa ngo bo nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // byang chub kyi phyogs kyis chos sum bcu rtsa bdun byang chub kyi/ 
270a1('bum): phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / chu tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
270a2('bum): pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
270a3('bum): phyir shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyis sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi// 
270a4('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'as stong ngo // go tshe che// 
270a5('bum): yang go cha chen pos stong ste// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ go che ma mchis ba'i go cha dgos par rig par bgyi'o// bcom
270a6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' bsrel pa rab 'byor 'di ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyang
270a7('bum): ma byas// rnam par ma byas mngon par ma byos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// gang gi don du go cha chen po dgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma
270a8('bum): byas/ mngon par ma byaso// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bgyis/ rnam par ma bgyis/ mngon par ma bgyis ba lags/ byang / 
270b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du du go ma bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ci'i slad du ma bgyis/ rnam par ma gyis mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/ bcom
270b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor byed pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byaso// byang chub sems
270b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gang gis don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rob 'byor 'di
270b4('bum): ltar gzugs mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed
270b5('bum): do// rab 'byor gzugs mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi byed/ rnam par mi byed mngon pa
270b6('bum): mi byed do// rab 'byor gzugs mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg dang // mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rab
270b7('bum): migo gis rnam par shes pa mi byed/ rnam pa mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam
270b8('bum): shes pa dang / yid kyis rnam par shes pa dang / mi byed/ rnam par mi byed// mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te rog pa mi byed// rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi
271a1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus de reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyis 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyis 'dus te reg pa mi byed/ rnam par mi bye/ 
271a2('bum): mngon par mi byed/ rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor po mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / smi/ 
271a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi so tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
271a4('bum): tshor bar mi byed/ rnam pA rA mi byed/ mngon par mi byedado// rab 'byor ba drag ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// 
271a5('bum): rab 'byor sems can ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dag dang / sems can dang srogau dang / 
271a6('bum): ga so' ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shod can dang / shed bdag dang / byed po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba bo// mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi
271a7('bum): byed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du myi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rmi lam ni me byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe no// de shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyiraro
271a8('bum): sgyu ma dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / mig sgyu dang / sprul pa ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du mi ngomig
271b1('bum): ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i phyi rol dus byin pa ni mi byed par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi
271b2('bum): pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mi byed/ 
271b3('bum): rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir
271b4('bum): na/ shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis bar du mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ dri ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du mi dmigs pa
271b5('bum): phyir ro// rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// las
271b6('bum): bro'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / thar gyis gnas pa'i
271b7('bum): snyoms parla 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo spong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes bya dang / tingange 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
271b8('bum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni mi byed rnam par mi bye
272a1('bum): mngon par mi byed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
272a2('bum): de shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan mu yin pa de bzhin nyid dang // chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa
272a3('bum): yang dag po'i mtha' dang / bsgom gyi me khyab bu'i dbyings mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par ma byed de// de ci'i phyir na na/ de shin du mi dmigs pa'o phyiro// rab 'byor byang chub ni mi bye/ 
272a4('bum): rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon pa rom/ 
272a5('bum): bye/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rnams grangs des na/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par
272a6('bum): mo byas par rlog par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gang gi gro don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byos/ rnam par ma byos/ mngon pa
272a7('bum): ma byos par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go rgya chen po bgos pa na bags pa nA go tshe mang po'i ga chen po bgoso shes bya'o// 
272a8('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
272b1('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams pa gang gis byas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
272b2('bum): gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'di byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de
272b3('bum): bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs mim bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings grol ba'o// gang pos smras pa che dang / 
272b4('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzugs gang yin/ de ltar ma bcings ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang
272b5('bum): yin/ smras pa che dang ldan pa gang po gang 'di rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gang 'di rma lam lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
272b6('bum): sheshes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ du gang 'di sgyu me lta bu dang / sla brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / mig sgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i gzugs de ni
272b7('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gang 'di sprul ba lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'i// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs
272b8('bum): ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni ma
273a1('bum): bcings ma grol ba'o// da ltar byung ba'i tsho ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa glang po gzug
273a2('bum): med pa'i phyir/ gzugs mu bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa
273a3('bum): gang po gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol
273a4('bum): ba'o/ tshe dang ldan pa glang po gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gzugs mA bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir/ 
273a5('bum): rnam par shes be ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dge pa'i gzugs ni me bcings ma grol ba'o// mi dge ba'i tshor bo dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par she
273a6('bum): ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs ni ma bcangs ma grol ba'o// lung du ma bstan pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / 
273a7('bum): rnam par shes pa ni me bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'jig rten pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings grol ba'i// 'jig rten pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dre byed dang / 
273a8('bum): rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 
273b1('bum): 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nem bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dadu ldan pa gang po lag pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs rim bcings ma grol ba'o// rnag pa dang bcas pa'i
273b2('bum): ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe ngang ldan pa gang po zag pa med pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// zag pa med pa'i tshe la
273b3('bum): bya dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba
273b4('bum): tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par+ya shwes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'i// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
273b5('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ rnam pi re shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gzugs ma smos pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du she
273b6('bum): dang / 'du shes byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi skyes pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ches thams cad kyang ma grol ba'o// med pa'i phyir/ 
273b7('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir mu bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rnam bcings ma
273b8('bum): grol ba'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
274a1('bum): rol du phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir/ sbyin po'i pha rol du phyin pa ni mA bcings
274a2('bum): ma grol ba'o// dbeni pa'i phyir ma bcings mi grol ba'o// mA skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir
274a3('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba'o// med pa'i phyir ma bcings tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson
274a4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni ma bcings mo grol ba'o// dben
274a5('bum): pa'i phyir mu bcing si ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir mi bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings
274a6('bum): ma grol ba'o// phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang me btsongs ma grol ba'o// dngos po med
274a7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong panyid kyi bar yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ma bcings
274b1('bum): ma bA/ dben pa'i d+hA ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i ma bcings ma sgrol ba'o// med pa'i
274b2('bum): stong pa nyid ma bcings mya grol ba'o// dben pa'ime bcings ma bril pa'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings
274b3('bum): zlos blo'o/ med pa'i sbyor/ nang stong pa nyid ma btsud su ma grol ba'idabye pa ma pa ngas mthomyo 'o// ma
274b4('bum): pa'i phyir/ ma bcings ma grol ba med pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir ji stong pa nyid kyi
274b5('bum): ma bo cings ma grol ba'o/ dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol bam skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma ma
275a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyis chos
275a2('bum): sum bcu rtsa bdun ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dong ldan pa geng po de bzhin gsheg
275a3('bum): pI stobs bAts+tsha'i bar dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa/ 
275a4('bum): gang po med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir mu bcing so ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang / 
275a5('bum): ldan pa gang po ma po cings ma grol ba'o thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cang+ga mA bcingasra ma
275a6('bum): gril ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// mo skyes bu'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' yang ma bcings mi grol ba ste/ 
275a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben po'i phyir ma bcingasre ma grol ba'o// me skyes pa'i phyir mi bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de
275a8('bum): bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhon ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas dang / rmo skyon ste
275b1('bum): pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir/ de nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol bu'o// ma
275b2('bum): skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mthe'i bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma gro rol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma
275b3('bum): bocings mo grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'dus ma byas kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma bcings mu grol ba'o// 
275b4('bum): dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyer ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di ni byang chub sems dpo sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
275b5('bum): bcings mo grol ba'o// zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshul khrims kyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin
275b6('bum): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi sa pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mo bcings ma grol ba'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
275b7('bum): bo nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' ma btsongs ma grol po'o// sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma nor ba
275b8('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyis dbyings dang / chos kyis gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma/ 
277a1('bum): grol ba'o// 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma bcings ma grol gnas 'tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
277a2('bum): dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gton gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas/ ma bcings
277a3('bum): ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad ma len pa nyid kyi ber la gnas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i de bzhin nyid la gnas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i ma no bo de bzhin nyid dang / ma bcings
277a4('bum): ma grol ba'i gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos nyid dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi dbyings dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos skyon med pa dang / 
277a5('bum): ma bcings ma grol yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas/ ma bcings mi grol ba'i 'dus ma byas la gnas te/ ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams yos
277a6('bum): su smin par byed do// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// ma bcings ma grol ba de bcings ma grol ba de sangs rgyas
277a7('bum): rnaMs la bsnyen bkur smra bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos nyan to/ ma btsongs ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nam
277a8('bum): yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang / nam yang 'bral bar mo 'gyur ro// me bcings ma grol ba de ma
277b1('bum): bcings ma grol ba'i mig lnga dang rnam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma tsangs ma grol ba'i gzungs rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings
277b2('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i ti nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings pa'i lam gyis rnam par shes pa nyid
277b3('bum): sgrub par 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas brar 'gyur// ma bcings ma grol ba de
277b4('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba'i// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de mi bcings mu grol ba'i// sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab du bkod par
277b5('bum): gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba pha rol du phyin pa drug ma bcings ma grol ba med pa dang / dben po med pa dang / 
277b6('bum): skye ba med pa dang / nyer bar bzung zhing chos thams cad khong du chud par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me bcings ma grol ba zag pa
277b7('bum): blo'i go cha dgos par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ga sol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
277b8('bum): yi theg pa chen po ni gang lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg po chen po yang dag par zhugs par rig par gyi ba'i theg pa
278a1('bum): chen po ni gang nas byung ba lags// theg pa ni gang du gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ theg pa des ni su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'ad
278a2('bum): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor khyod de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po gang zhes zer ba ni/ rab
278a3('bum): 'byor pha rol du phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po s+ho/ drug gang zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin
278a4('bum): pa dang / bzod po'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyis pha rol du phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor
278a5('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pas yid la bya ba don du gnyer ba rnams la phyi nang gi dngos po'o sbyin pa yongasasu btong
278a6('bum): ste/ de yang sems can thams cad dang 'thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chubo dA de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongasu bsngo ba 'di no/ byang chub sems/ 
278a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin po'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpe'i sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang lagaso ba dang / bconi// 
278a8('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal po dang / rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i sem bskyed pas/ bdag kyang dag pa bcu'i
278b1('bum): lus kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas la sems phra rol kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhog pa dang / rab tu 'god pa'i byang chub
278b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu ma nyams pa'o// gsol phra bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzong pa'i pha rol du phyin
278b3('bum): ba gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i byang chub sems steng
278b4('bum): bas bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin la/ gzhan yang mi dmigaso pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa la yang drug par bskul ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin
278b5('bum): pa'o// bzod gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang logs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul pa/ rab 'byor 'ong
278b6('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skyed pos/ bdag kyang pha rol du phyin pa drug la brtson par mi 'dor zhing / gzhan yang
278b7('bum): pha rol du phyin pa drug la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyor ba 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
278b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ gtan gi pha rol du phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
279a1('bum): gnye go bdag kyang rnam pa thams sa ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ byas ma gtan nams thabs mkhas pas mnam pA gnog kyang / de dag skye bang mis
279a2('bum): m+me smra nas dngas ma gtan rnams la dmyigs pa'i ra rgya sa yang dgu pad+ma bskul ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam godan gyi pha rol du / 
279a3('bum): pa'o/ gsol bu bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ rab
279a4('bum): 'di la byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas bdug kyang chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med par chos
279a5('bum): thams cad kyi tshul yang dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par byed cing / sems can rnams kyi chos thams cad mngon par chags pa med pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
279a6('bum): rtogs par bya ba'i la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bskulo zhing yang dag par bzhog pa dang / rab tu 'god pa 'angadi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi
279a7('bum): rol du phyin pa ste/ d+he ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa'o// rab 'byor tshe gA gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nang ste
279a8('bum): panyid deng bya stong pa nyid dang / phye nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don ngom pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang
279a9('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha mi med pa nyid dang / der ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid/ 
279b1('bum): dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa dang / dngos po med pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / de la nang stong pa nyid kyang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nang gi
279b2('bum): chos shes bya ba ni mig dadrang rna ba dang / sI dang / k+She dang / lus dang / yid dreg mi rdeg mi 'jigs pa'i phyir/ mig gi gis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i phyi rang bzhin de yin+da pa'i phyiro// mig mi
279b3('bum): rtagla mi 'jigs bu'i phyir/ rna ba dang sI dang / l+li dang / lus dang / yid de/ de la mi rtag mi 'jigs pa'i phyir li das kyi stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin+da pa'i phyir ro// 'di ni nang skyong
279b4('bum): papa nyid do// de la phyi sdong po nyid gang zhe na/ phyi'i chos shes bya ba ni gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnams de/ de la mi rtag mi 'jigs pa'i phyir/ gzugs gzugs kyis
279b5('bum): sto // dwe ci'i phyir zhi nu/ de'i rang bzhin no ni/ de yin pa'i phyiro// de bzhin du ma rtag mi 'jig pu'i phyiru/ sgra dang / dri drangang dro dang / reg dang / chos chos kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dri'i rang ba
279b6('bum): de yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la phyi nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ nang gi skye mched drug dang / phyi'i ske mra ched drug dang / 'di dgo na phyi nang gi chog shes bya ste/ dr-i mI rtag ma/ 
279b7('bum): 'jug pa'i phyir// nang gi chos rnams phyi'i tshwa sra rnams kyis stong ngo // de ts+yai byer zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyiro// phyo'o chos rnams ni phyi rlung gi chos rnams kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir na
279b8('bum): nA/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di ni phyi nang gi stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la stong pa tudI stong pa nyid gong zhe na/ mi rtag ma 'jig pa'i phyir ro// chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid grang yin
279b9('bum): ba'i stong pa nyid nges stong pa nyid stong // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni stong pa nyid stong nyid ces bya'o// de la chen po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ mi rtag mi 'jig / 
280a1('bum): khyer/ gar phyogs glur phyogs kyis spyod/ ba phyogs nub phyogs kyis stong / byang phyogs kyi sa spyo ba thog phyogs zlog phyogs kyis spyong // steng phyogs sted phyogs kyis
280a2('bum): skyo // phyogs mtsha ma so rnams phyogaso mtshams rnams kyi sa stong // de rje'i phyir zhe ni/ de'i ring bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te// 'di ni chen po stong pa nyi ces bya'o// de la den dom pa stong pa/ 
280a3('bum): nyid gang zhes na/ don del bya'o mtha' lhas 'das pa ste/ mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'jus pa de yad mya ngan las 'das byas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin
280a4('bum): de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni don dum pa skyong b+ha nyi ces bya'o// de lta 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus byas skyong po nyid ces bya bya ni 'dod pa'i khams dang // gzugs kyi khams da
280a5('bum): gzugasas med paSh+Ti kham s+yA tI/ d+hIl mAM rtag ma 'jig pa'i 'dred bu'i khams kyis stong ngo // gzugs kyi khyams gzugs kyis stong // gzugs myed pa'i khams gzugs med pa'i khyam
280a6('bum): myed pa'i khams kyis stong // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la 'dus mi byas stong pa nyid gang zhi na/ 'dus ma byas stos
280a7('bum): zhes bya ba ni gang lo bskyed pa dang / 'ogog bri med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhon du 'gyur ba med do// 'di ni 'dus mi byas shes bya'o// me rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir 'dus de ni 'dus mi byas
280a8('bum): kyisgra spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin+da ni de yin da'i phyir te/ 'di ni 'dus mi byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la mthu'u lus 'das pa stong pa nyid ga zhen/ gang la mtha' las la/ 
280a9('bum): bo mi dmigs de ni mtha' las 'das pa te/ mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir mtha'i las 'ongs pa mtha' lus 'i nges pas sbyong // nga ci'i phyir na na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te 'di ni sa
280b1('bum): sa 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang lom+bu mi dmigs shing / tha mA yang mi dmyigs pa de la/ 'gro ba mi dmigs 'ong ba mi mos
280b2('bum): tide mi rtag myi 'jug pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ thog med pas stod+mo// dwe tsa'i phyir wA na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni thog mA dang tha ma med pa sti
280b3('bum): buny-id ces bya'o// de la dror po medra pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la yang dor ba med pa ste/ me na gre mi 'jig po'i phyir/ dor ba med pa dor ba med pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rlung ba
280b4('bum): de yin pa'i phyir ting 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus byas so 'dus ma byas kyang rung ste/ chos thams cad kyi rong bzhin gang yin pa
280b5('bum): de ni nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas/ rlung sangs rgyas rnams kyis mA byas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo'u chen po rnams kyis ma byes/ de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang
280b6('bum): bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas te/ mi rtag mi 'jog pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid
280b7('bum): ces bya'o// de la chos tha~Md stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ chos thams cad ces bya ba ni// gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / hUM shes de ban+de 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang na rna ba dang / smra dang / 
280b8('bum): lce dang // lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang na rig dang / chos drang / mig gi rnam bA re shes bu da / rno ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lci'i
280b9('bum): par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shisra bu dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mr-i gri 'das te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus
280b10('bum): kye 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis/ 
281a1('bum): tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / gzugs yod pa'i
281a2('bum): chos dang / gzugs med pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas kyis chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos dang / 'odi dag ni chos thud ces bya'o// de la mi rtago mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad
281a3('bum): chos thams cad kyis stong // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ni rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir to/ 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong po nyid gang zhe na/ gzug
281a4('bum): ni 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid/ tshor bA ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid/ 'du shes nI 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid/ 'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed po'i mtshan nyid/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan
281a5('bum): nyid de/ mi rtag mi 'jug pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / rang rang gi mtshan nyid de dag gis chos de
281a6('bum): dag thams cad sto // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dog gi rong bzhin de yin pa'i phyi'o// 'di ni rlung gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la mi dmigs pa mi dmigs pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
281a7('bum): de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir do// 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// dwe lA mI dmigs bu stong pa nyid grang zhe na/ gong la dngos po dga' yang mi dmigs pa ste/ ther zug tu gnas
281a8('bum): dang du 'jig pa med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin dri yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyi de ces bya'o// dri la dngos
281a9('bum): nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la ngo bo nyid dga' yang mi dmigs pa de/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig med po'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i
281b1('bum): de 'i phyir ste/ 'di ni po 'dri spyod pa nyi skye smra bya'o// de sa ngos po myed de bon+na snong pa nyid blang na/ chos pas sgra rlung rkyen cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir/ ngo bo zhing med de/ 
281b2('bum): mirtag pa'i phyir 'dus pa 'dus pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni dngos po med pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 
281b3('bum): da me pas nga / bzhi ni buzhin rjes gan byung ngas pa gagazhan byung sa thas sa
281b4('bum): de la dngos po dngos po zhes bya ba gdod na/ phung po b+hA bi te/ phung po klu bre de dag kyang phung po rnams kyis steng bas/ de ltar na dngos po dngos po snang ngo // ji ltar na dngos po med pa dngos po me
281b5('bum): pas sbyong ngozhe na/ dngos po med pas steng dri zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas te/ de la 'dus ma byis de yang 'dus byas kyis stong pas/ de ltar na dngos po med dngos po med pas spyod ngo do// d+hiltar na rang btsun
281b6('bum): gis snying ne na/ rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid mo nor ba ste/ de la stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ shes pas mi byas te/ 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// de la gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid gang ni
281b7('bum): de bzhin gyi shags pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nyid dang ni chos kyi dbyings dang chos skyon med pa zhi dang / de bzhin
281b8('bum): dang mnar ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag po'i mtha'i dri bzhi na nyid du gnas pa ste de ltar chos de dag gi gzhan gyis stong pa mA yin/ kha de ni gzhon gyi dngos mi
281b9('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshe no'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpe'i chen po'i theg pa chen po 'ang
282a1('bum): ste dpa' bar 'gro ba'i rnyi 'dzin dang / rin chen byug rgya zhes bya ba'i drirje 'dzin dang / seng ge nas par brtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du
282a2('bum): zlab rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin du 'bugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting badzin da // sbyi tsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin drang / rgya
282a3('bum): dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshon dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jog pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin pa
282a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal bye lhor rab tu glunas be ba zhes bya ba'i ting dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed bla zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bye bI dingange 'dzin dang / yang ngag
282a5('bum): 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la don mi za bu zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang // tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs rnam
282a6('bum): par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongasu lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / mnyam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / chos tha~Md yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya
282a7('bum): ba'i phyag rgya ting 'dzin dang / nAmakha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i dinge 'dzin dang / rdo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rkyen zhes bya bo'i ting nge
282a8('bum): dang / dbang po dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjesu song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rlom par sgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang ni sprul ba ni zhes pa'i ting 'tsho
282a9('bum): dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rnam zer sdang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / tshol ba meng pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / gnas la rten pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
282b1('bum): sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri mang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / 'od 'byud pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / kun du slang
282b2('bum): ba zhe bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / drag pa de pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / klo ga gi gron mo zhes
282b3('bum): bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi phram pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes
282b4('bum): bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya bo'i dinge 'dzin dang / 'jig pa med zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / nyi ma'i sgron me zhes bya ba'o ting 'dzin dang / zla ba dri med pa zhi bya ba'i ti// 
282b5('bum): 'dzin dang shes ra sgron ma zhes bya ba'i tong nge 'dzin dang / snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa zhe bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang
282b6('bum): ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting du 'dzin dang / rdo lta bu zhes byi ba'i ting 'dzin/ sems gnas ba zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin drung / kun du snang ba zhes po'i tinge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas
282b7('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos dpa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / tshe sI tha~Mng snyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang
282b8('bum): dga' bo stong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / ni pA ru 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / chos thod kyi tshig rab tu 'byeng
282b9('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / yi ge snyam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 
283a1('bum): 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / granas pa med par sbyong
283a2('bum): zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / yul wa
283a3('bum): gal po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang na yan tan tha~Md kyi tshogasu 'gyur ba zhes bo ba'i ting 'dzin dang / seMs med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing bsal/ 
283a4('bum): shu zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i
283a5('bum): ting dang rdo chos tha~Md las 'das po zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang yongs spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam por sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnasu bya ba med po zhes
283a6('bum): bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rnam par mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par grub pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin
283a7('bum): dang rnam pa cig tu gyur pa zhes pa'i ti nge 'dzin dengang rnam par 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / brda
283a8('bum): dang / sgra las 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting ngo nge// 'dzin dang / sgra dang dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge/ 'dzin dang / mchin nyid yangs su
283a9('bum): sbyong ba zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes pa'i ting 'dzin dang / rnam pa'i mchog thad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thad la mngon/ 
283b1('bum): dga' ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blos zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa drang log par sel ba zhes bya
283b2('bum): ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma mang
283b3('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / gdung ba med pa'i glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin drang
283b4('bum): klog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rkyen chen po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rnam pa thang du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / ting 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya bI tiSh+Tha
283b5('bum): 'dzin dang / rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par zhol po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa drang bcaso ba tha
283b6('bum): nan mongs pa med par yang dag par zhol ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / gnas dmigasu med pa la brtson zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med
283b7('bum): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / lus skyon yang drug par sel ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig par na mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 
283b8('bum): nam mkha' ltar tshogs pa med pas rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ti de ni ting nge 'dzin thod kyi spyod yul la spyod
283b9('bum): kha ste de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin to// de la rin phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin gang zhe na/ tinge 'dzin des ting nge 'dzin thaMd rgyas btab pa lta bur gyur ba te/ 
284a1('bum): ni rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la seng ge rnam par brtse ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin grang zhe na/ ting de la gnas shing / ting 'dzin zad kyis rnam par brtse ba dang
284a2('bum): 'di ni seng ge rnam par brtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin grang zhe na/ ting 'dzin de la gnas shing / tinge 'dzin thaMd snang bar byed ma steng 'di ni zla ba gang
284a3('bum): po zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin to// de la zla bo rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin gango zhes na/ tinge 'dzin de ni ting nge 'dzin thad kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa stes 'di ni zla ba rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba/ 
284a4('bum): tingange 'dzin to// de la chos thams cad las shin du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin gang zhen+da/ tinge 'dzin de la gnas shing tinge 'dzin thams cad kyi mngon par 'phags ting 'di ni chos thA da las sha na
284a5('bum): 'phaT ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin to// de la spyi tsug rnaM par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ denge 'dzin de la gnas shing tingange 'dzin thams cad kyi skye rtsag rnam par lta ba sbeng 'di ni skye chug rna par
284a6('bum): lta ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin to// de la chos kyi dbyingasu nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ tingange 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos kyi dbyings nges par 'gro ba te/ 'di ni chos kyi dbyingasu nges pa
284a7('bum): zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin to// de la nges pa rgyal mtshon dpal zhes bya ba'o ti nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting de la gnas shing / ting thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan nges par 'dzin te/ 'di ni nges pa'i rgyal mutshan dpal
284a8('bum): zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin to// de la rdo zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting 'dzin de la gnas shing tingange 'dzin thad 'jig par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'di ni rdo zhes bya bI ting 'dzin to// de la chos thams/ 
284a9('bum): cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting 'dzin de la gnas zhing / chos thaMd kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin to// 
284b1('bum): de la ting 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// tingange 'dzin la gnas shing ting 'dzin thar la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa skyed 'di ni tinge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas
284b2('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting gang zhe na/ ting de la gnas shing / ting 'dzin de la thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed
284b3('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la dpung rnams par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin gang zhe na/ ding 'dzin de la gnas shing ting 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rnam par bkod pa ste/ 'di ni dpung
284b4('bum): rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de lnga yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ tingange 'dzin de la gnas shing ting 'dzin thung yang dag par 'phags par 'gyur
284b5('bum): ba sten 'di ni yung dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la nges pa'i tshig la gdon ma za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting 'dzin de la gnas shing ting 'dzin
284b6('bum): thad kyi nges pa'i tshi ga bstan pa la 'dzag pra ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i tshig la mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de lo tshig bla da gra sra la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i tI nge 'dzin
284b7('bum): gang zhe na// ting 'dzin de la gnas shring / tang 'dzin thad kyi tshig bla dgas la 'jug pa ste 'di ni che go bla dgros la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin to// de la phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya bI
284b8('bum): bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting 'dzin de la granas shing ting 'dzin thams cad kyi phyogs rnam par lta ba ste/ 'di ni phyogs rnamaso blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la phyag rgya yongasu
284b9('bum): 'dzin pa zhes bya bu'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting 'dzin de la gnas shing ting 'dzin thad kyi phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni phyag yongasu 'dzin po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin tokau/ de la mnyam pa/ 
285a1('bum): med pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin gang zhe na/ tinge 'dzin de la gnas shing / tinge 'dzin thaMd mnyam par mi 'gyur ba zhe ste/ 'di ni mnyam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la chos
285a2('bum): thams cad 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting 'dzin de la gnas shing ting 'dzin thams cad 'du zhing / khong du chud par 'dod de/ 'od ni chos thad yang dag par
285a3('bum): ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la na mkha' rgyasra par 'grangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin/ to// gang zhe na/ tinge 'dzin dri lu gnas shing / ting 'dzin thams cad kyis/

285a5('bum): shing / tingange 'dzin thad kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu 'dzin bu ster 'di ni rdo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzina? te// de la nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ tIng ngi/ 
285a6('bum): 'dzin de la gnas shing nyon mongs pa thad dri ma rab tu sel ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin to// de la rnam par snang mdza ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ 
285a7('bum): ti 'dzin de la gnas shing ting 'dzin thad lham me lha ni ldang der byed pa steT 'di ni rna bar snang ba zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin to// de la tshol ba mad pa zhes pa'i tinge 'dzin+da grang zhe na/ 
285a8('bum): ting 'dzin de la gnas shing ting 'dzin gyi chos gang la tshol po med pa ste/ 'di ni tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
285a9('bum): gang zhe na/ tinge 'dzin de la gnas shing chos gang yang gnas la rten pa med par yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba te/ 'di ni gnas pa rten pa med par zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin to// / 
285b1('bum): de skem se med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin te gang zhe na/ tingange 'dzin de la gnas shing sems kyang mi 'byung / seMs las byung ba rnams kyang mi rgyu ba skye/ 'di ni ses med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
285b2('bum): 'dzin to// de la dri ma med pa'i sgron ma gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ tingange 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting 'dzin thaMd kyi sgron mo/ dri ma med par byed pa ste/ 'di no dri ma med
285b3('bum): pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin to// de la 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gung zhe na/ tinge 'dzin de lnga gnas shing 'od mtha' yas par byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'di mtha'/

285b6('bum): thod kyi sgro snang brir byed pa ste/ 'odi ni kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin te// dge ba dang zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ tinge 'dzin de la gnas shang ting 'dzin thad kyi dag pa mnyam
285b7('bum): bdod zab pa ste 'di ni dge pa debu dam po zhes bya ba rI ting 'dzin to// dri l+la 'di dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ dwe ladzin de la gnas shing ting 'dzin thaMd kyi dri ma spel
285b8('bum): khyod dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin to// des dga' bu byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang rje na/ ti 'dzin rdo la gnas shIng ti 'dzin zad kyi dga' ba nyams myong bar 'gyur ba sgra
285b9('bum): ni dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la klog sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting 'dzin tha~Md kyi sgron ma byed po ste/ 'di ni klog sprin
286a1('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ti de la gnas shing ting 'dzin thang zad mi shes pa dang / zad mi shes pa yang dag par rje su mi mthong /

286a8('bum): 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting thad kyi so so yang dag par reg pa bzhi rab tu thong ba ste/ 'di ni snang ba gsol ba zhes bya'i tingange 'dzin te// de la snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i

286b1('bum): zhe na/ ti nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / tingange 'dzin thad kye kha bye ba byed pa ste/ 'di ni bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin to// de la ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting gang zhe na/ ting 'dzin de la

286b3('bum): shring / ti nge 'dzin thams cad lA ti nge 'dzin nyid kyang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong bar khong du chud par byed pa steng 'di ni ji lta bu zhes bya'i ting 'dzin to// de la sems gnas pa zhes bya / 
286b4('bum): dang 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting 'dzin de la gnas shing / sos mi gra yi rnam par mi g.yo/ rna par mi ldog yongasu yi chad par mi 'gyur/ nyam su mi bde ba med pa de la ses shes bya ba'i ni 'di yin

286b7('bum): sti 'di ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i tenge 'dzin to// de la chos dpa'i phyag rgya rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting 'dzin de la gnas shing ting 'dzin thad ran na
286b8('bum): mtha' ltar kun du snang ba ste 'doni rin mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la chos de pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting 'dzin de la gnas shing ting tha~Mng phyag rgya med pa'i / 
286b9('bum): rgyas btab pa nye bar bzung nas phyag rgya btab par gyur pa ste/ 'di ni chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bI ti 'dzin to// de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ 
287a1('bum): dring 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang mnyam pa nyid du me chud pa med par yang dag par rjesu mthong ba ste/ 'di ni ches thang mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la
287a2('bum): bsrong ba zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin gang zhe na// ting 'dzin de la gnas shing tingange 'dzin byung dang / ting 'dzin thams cad kyi mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba stong 'di ni ches kyi 'pha gus
