287a4('bum): 'dzin te// dwe lA chos thad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya bo'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting 'dzin de la gnas shing // so chos tha~Md kyi tshig rab tu 'byeng ba ste/ 'dri na ches thad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed
287a5('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la yi gri rno par 'god po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ ti 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting 'dzin thad kyi yo gI rab tu thob pa steng 'drin la ga mnyam par 'grong
287a6('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge gcig kyang dmigs pa med pa ste/ 'di ni/ 
287a7('bum): yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin to// de la dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting 'dzin thad kyi dmigs pa 'chang bar 'gyur/ 
287a8('bum): 'di ni dmigs pa gtsud pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin gang zhe na/ tinge 'dzin de la gnas shing chos thang 'gyur bar mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di mo
287a9('bum): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la rnam par med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting 'dzin de la gnas shing ches thad kyi gnas rnam pa tsam yang dmigs pa med pa/ 
287b1('bum): 'di ni rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ tinge 'dzin de la gnas shing / denge 'dzin thad kyi gnas dmigs su me

288a1('bum): tinge 'dzin to// de la byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya'i tinge 'dzin gang zhe na/ te nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ti nge 'dzin thad byang chub kyi yan lag rab tu thob pa te/ 'di ni byang chub/

292a8('bum): pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
292b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i 'thil yan chad skra dang / klad pa man chad sen mo dang / skra dang pags pa dang / yan chad mi rtsang ba
292b2('bum): sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs ste/ lus 'di la skra dang / spyi dang sen mo dang / pags pa dang / klad pa dang / sha dang chu ser dang / khrag dang
292b3('bum): rus pa dang / rkang pa dang snying dang / 'khal ma dang / 'chin pa dang / klo ba dang / ser ba dang / long g+ha dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / nang grol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / 'chi
292b4('bum): ma dang / rdul dang / tshil dang / stabs dang / ngar stabs dang / rnag dang 'khyis pa dang / zad kun dang / chu ser dang kha chu dang / dri ma dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / rdum dang / 
292b5('bum): spags dag kyang yod do// zhes bya bar yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chen pa'i skye snod til dang / yungs kar dang / sran chung dang
292b6('bum): bal+la sman dang / nas dang / gro dang / 'bras dang / 'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba mig dang ldan pa'i mi zhig gis/ phyi ste bltas na/ 'di ni til lo// 'di ni yungs kar ro// 'di ni sran chu
292b7('bum): 'di ni bral sran no// 'di ni nas so// 'dri ni bri'o// 'di ni 'bras so// 'di dag ni de ma yin pa'i 'bru/ gzhan no zhes bya bar rab tu shes/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub seMs
292b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i 'thil yan chad skra dang / spyi bo man chad sen mo dang / sku dang / pags pa yan chad mi rtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang
293a1('bum): bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs te/ lus 'di la skra dang sgra dang / sen mo dang / pags pa dang / klud pa dang / shwa dang / chu ba dang khrag dang / rus
293a2('bum): pa dang rkang dang / snying dang 'khal ma dang / 'chin pa dang glo ba dang / mcher ba dang / ling ga dang / rgyu ma dang mnye ma dang / nang grol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma nga
293a3('bum): rdul dang tshal dang / snabs rdza dang / ngar snabs dang / rnam dang / 'khris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu ser dang / khra chu dang / dri mi dang klad pa dang / klang rgyus dang / rdu ma dang
293a4('bum): rna sgrags dag kyang yod do// zhes bya bar yang drag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
293a5('bum): du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gri lus de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis lus kyi rje su lta zhing rta brtson 'grus tso na/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig
293a6('bum): rten gi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par sbyong ngo // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
293a7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod na yod pa'i gzugs dur khrod du bor ba'i ro'i mal du bskal ba/ shi nas zhag cig lon pa'i/ shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa 'am/ shi nas
293a8('bum): zhag gsuM lon pa 'am/ shi nis zhag bzhi lon pa'i/ sha ni si zhag lnga lon pa 'am/ shi nas rnam par bam pa 'am/ rnam par bsngos pa thams cad 'am/ rnam par zags
293b1('bum): pa'am/ rnam par zos pa'o/ rnam par 'thor ba 'am/ de'i lus de nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can no// 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin cano// 
293b2('bum): chos nyid 'di las ma 'das so// zhes bya bar nye bar sbyor ro// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
293b3('bum): phyi'i lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing brtson 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par

293b5('bum): nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro shrI nas zhag drug len pa'o/ shri nas zhag bdun len pa'aM/ bya rog gro/ khri 'am/ 'ol ba'i/ byA rgod dam/ s+yAd khyi'aM/ wa 'am/ khyi 'am/ de mA yin pa'i srog
293b6('bum): chags kyi rigs sna tshogs kyis za ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ de'i lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'od nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ chos
293b7('bum): nyid 'di lta bu las ma'ang ste n-i bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs
293b8('bum): pa'i tshul gi lus rje su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gi chags sos dang / yid mi bde ba rnaM par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor
294a1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin bral spyod pa'i tshe/ nAm dur khrod du bor ba'i ro rnam par zos pa/ mi rtsa
294a2('bum): ba rnam pa/ rnam par spangs pa/ mthong ba de'i tshe/ lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyar te/ nga lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can/ 'di
294a3('bum): lta bu'i chos nyid las mi 'das so zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/

294a5('bum): mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam du
294a6('bum): khrod kyi rus pa keng rus/ sha ra ri dang / khrag riri chags pa/ rgyus pas brang bring du 'brel ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyar te/ lus 'di yang
294a7('bum): 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'dis so zhes bya bar nye bar rtog gi/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
294a8('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di lta bu'i ring bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las tshe/ phyi'i las la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis mi dmig lus kyi rje su lta zhing
294b1('bum): brtson 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gi chags sems dang / gnod sems rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor

294b3('bum): gzungs med pa/ rgyung gi mdog ltar gyur pa de/ mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can/ 'di lta bu'i

294b7('bum): rus pa/ keng rus/ gzungs med pa/ gyes pa/ dang gi mdog lhur gyur pa/ sa lo rnam par mthor pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus
294b8('bum): 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos ce na/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das so zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
295a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lngas la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis lus kyi rje su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can/

295a4('bum): rkang pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ byin pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ brla'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ dbyi'i rus pa rnams kyang gzham
295a5('bum): du 'thor/ tshogs pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ rtsib ma'i ros po rnams kyang gzhan du 'there'abying ba'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ 'go bo'i rus
295a6('bum): ba rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor kha mthong na/ de lus kyi 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can/ chos
295a7('bum): nyid 'di lta bu'i lus mi 'das so zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
295a8('bum): phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis lus kyi rje su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gi chags sems dang / 
295b1('bum): kye yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

295b7('bum): rdul dang 'dren 'dren du gyur pa/ mthong ba de tshe/ de'i las de nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/

296a1('bum): la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis lus kyi rnaMs lha zhing phyi'i lus dang / dri'i rlung gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis lus kyi rjes lha zhing / brtson 'grus can/ shes

296a3('bum): gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis lus kyi rje su lta zhing nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis sems kyi rjesu lnga zhing

296a5('bum): gi chags sems dang / yid mi badri ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod do// raba'i phyir 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor
296a6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
296a7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ rig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir de mi dmigs po'i tshul gos mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo// brtsod
296a8('bum): 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyi mthu skyod do// yang dag par smon lam 'debs so// rig co mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis mis pa bskyed cing rtso la// 
296b1('bum): brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyi mthu bskyed do// yang dag par smon la 'deb so// dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir/ dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis mos pa bskyed ci
296b2('bum): rtsol lo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyi mthu bskyed do// yang dag par smon lam 'deb so// dge ba'i chos skyes pa nas gnas pa dang / phyir zhing skem pa dang / nyams par mi
296b3('bum): 'gyur ba dang / yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyi mthu bskyed do// yang dag par smon la
296b4('bum): 'drebaso// rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po

296b6('bum): sbyong ba'i 'di byed dang lda na pa'i rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnos pa/ rnam par spong bas yongasu grub pa
296b7('bum): skem mo// brdzun 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin sbyong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gri rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa lags/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa
296b8('bum): yang dag par sreng bas yongasu grub pa/ skom mo// dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa
297a1('bum): 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongasu grub pa sgom mo// dpyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin skyong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod
297a2('bum): chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs grub pa sgo ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang byeng chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor
297a3('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni dbang po lta ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting 'dzin gi
297a4('bum): dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub ses dpa' sos dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i theg pa
297a5('bum): chen po ni 'di ltar stobs lnga ste/ lha gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs date/ rab 'a
297a6('bum): 'di yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'i stobs dang / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po
297a7('bum): ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun to// bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gogs pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas
297a8('bum): yongasu grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis sgom mo// chos rna par 'byed pa byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin du byung ba yang
297b1('bum): dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 
297b2('bum): 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas songasu grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis sgom ste/ rab 'byor 'di meng byang chub seMs dpa' sos dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gnan
297b3('bum): yang byang chub seMs dpa' sos dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i la yan lag brgyud pa ste/ de gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba
297b4('bum): la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gris sgo mo// yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / 
297b5('bum): yang dag pa'i tshor ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gag pa la gnas pa/ rna bar spong
297b6('bum): bras yongasu grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis sgom ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub ses dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
297b7('bum): chen po theg po chen po ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gsuM ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ steng pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glen pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de la stong pa nyid
297b8('bum): kyi ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid du rtog pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa stong nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin ces bya'o// 
298a1('bum): de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med par rtog pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni mtshan ma
298a2('bum): med pa'i ting 'dzin ces bya'o// de la smyon pa med pa'i ti nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med do zhes bya bar mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa smon
298a3('bum): pa med pa rna bar thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin ces bya'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo de dag la zhum pa med par 'dron par byas te/ rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi
298a4('bum): byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar shes pa bcu gcig ste/ bcu gcig gang zhe na/ 
298a5('bum): sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / la shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjesu rtogs pa shes pa dang / kun
298a6('bum): rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o// de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal mi skye bar shes pa'o// de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba sa
298a7('bum): bar shes pa'o// de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe ni/ sdug bsngal 'gog par shes pa gang zhe na/ de la la shes pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i la yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o// de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na
298a8('bum): 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug zad par shes pa'o// de la mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ srid pa'i rgyud skye ba med par shes pa'o// de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/ phung po lnga sgyu mar yongs rtog shing
298b1('bum): shes pa'o// de la rjes rtogs pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/ skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi rtag shes bya bar shes pa'o// de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/ seMs can gzhan
298b2('bum): dang / gang zag gzhan gi sems kyis shes pa'o// de la 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang gis la shes pa dang / yongs byang bar shes pa'o// de la sgra ji bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
298b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ rab 'byor 'di yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub seMs
298b4('bum): dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar dbang po gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ yongs ma shes pa yongasu shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongasu shes pa'i dbang po dang
298b5('bum): yongasu shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po'o// de la yongs ma shes pa yingasu shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang
298b6('bum): po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / tingange 'dzin gi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po yongasu snang bar gyur pa de ni/ yongasu ma shes par bya ba'i dbang po'o// de la yongs
298b7('bum): shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa yongasu shes par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting 'dzin gi dbang po dang / shes rab
298b8('bum): kyi dbang po ste/ 'di ni yongasu shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o// de la yongs shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag mi slob pa'i dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
299a1('bum): sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang
299a2('bum): po ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni yongasu shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg ma chen po/ 
299a3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni ting 'dzin gsuM ste/ gsum grang zhe na/ rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i tingange 'dzin dang / 
299a4('bum): pa med pa la spyod pa tsam gyis tingange 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa'i tinge 'dzin to// de la rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i tingange 'dzin gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sos
299a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben/ dig te mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa spyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan
299a6('bum): dang / po la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas pa 'di ni/ rtog pa dang bcas shing spyod pa dang bcas pa'i tinge 'dzin to// de la rtog pa med pa la spyod pa tsam gi ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang
299a7('bum): bsam gtan gnyis pa ste/ 'di ni rtog pa med la skyed pa tsam gi ting nge 'dzin to// de la rtog pa med cing skyed pa tsam gi ting nge 'dzin grang zhe na/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi
299a8('bum): pa dang na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang // cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi 'du shes dang tshor rab 'gog
299b1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni mi rtog mi spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
299b2('bum): po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar dran pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang / chos rjes
299b3('bum): dran pa dang / dge 'dun rje su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjesu dran pa dang / gtong ba rje su dran pa dang / lce rje su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du gyu ba rjesu dran pa dang / skye ba rjesu dran pa dang
299b4('bum): 'chi ba rjesu dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjesu dran pa dang / rab 'byor 'di yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor
299b5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan dang / tsha de med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang rtsa rnam
299b6('bum): par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de la bsam gtan bzhi gang zhe na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
299b7('bum): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben dag to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa spyod pa dang / bcasre pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can pas
299b8('bum): gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / spyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs gtang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa/ spyod pa med pa'i
300a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan mnyes pa la/ nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing
300a2('bum): shes bzhin dang snyoms las gnas te/ bde ba lus kyi myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa gtang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba
300a3('bum): med pa'i bsam gtan gsum la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde
300a4('bum): yang med par gtang snyoms bsgoms pa'i// dran pas yongasu dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ 'di dgra ni bsam gtan
300a5('bum): bzhi'o// de la tshad med pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po
300a6('bum): shin du yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshud med pa/ gtsugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongasu rdzogs po shin du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten gyi chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
300a7('bum): pa/ na mkha'i mthas btugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ba/ mos par byas shing de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis rnam par spyod do// sring rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang
300a8('bum): gtang snyoms dang ldan pa dang / sems rgya chen po shin du yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs pa med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltong pa med pa/ yongs rdzogs pa/ shin
300b1('bum): du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ na mkha'i mtha' btugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gris rnam par
300b2('bum): skyid de/ de dag ni tshad med pa bzhi'o// de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
300b3('bum): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cig/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la
300b4('bum): mim byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes zer te/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag
300b5('bum): dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las
300b6('bum): yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do// zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas te/ de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 
300b7('bum): dri shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dag gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o// de la rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gis
300b8('bum): gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gi gzugs rnams mthong ba/ 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar
301a1('bum): mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / 
301a2('bum): sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ na mkha' mtha' yas so zhes na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes
301a3('bum): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam
301a4('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te cung zad ma yod do zhes rnam shes mtha' yas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thos
301a5('bum): cad du ba cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med mni skye mched la nye bar bsgobs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes
301a6('bum): med 'du shes med mini skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba dang / 'gog pa'i bar la/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gris nye bar bsgrubs te gnas tede
301a7('bum): dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do// de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
301a8('bum): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / do pyad pa dang bcas pa'i dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' bo dang
301b1('bum): bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongasu btang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas
301b2('bum): rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang
301b3('bum): bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa
301b4('bum): btang bsnyoms pa'o// zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing
301b5('bum): yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba spangs nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pas bsam gtan bzhi
301b6('bum): pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dreg par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du
301b7('bum): shes yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas so zhes ni mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
301b8('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas
302a1('bum): skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ba cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du bcung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag
302a2('bum): par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yong dag par 'das te/ 
302a3('bum): 'du shes dang tshor ba 'geg pa'i bar la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis nye bar bsgrubs te glenas shing / de dag ni mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
302a4('bum): chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ban+d+ha ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
302a5('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gnas la yang gnas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// 'das pa
302a6('bum): dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da lhor byung ba'i las dang las yongasu lon pa'i rnam par smin pa'i gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu she so// 'jig rten gi khas ni sna
302a7('bum): tshogs can teH'jig rten gyi khams khams ni du ma'o zhes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du she so// sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gis mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang
302a8('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhon gyi dbang po rab dang tha ma shes par bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sheso// kun du 'gro bIHlam yang dag
302b1('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes// dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / tinge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas can
302b2('bum): pa dang / rnam par byeng ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta bo bzhin du rab tu she so// de rnam pa thams cad du snron gi gnas rjesu dran te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rje su dran te/ rnam pa dang / 
302b3('bum): bcas sa mal dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas pa'i bar du rnam pa du mir sngon gri gnas sa rjesu dran no// lha'i mig rnam par dge po mi las 'das pa seMs can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dag kyang
302b4('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// zag pa zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol pa zag pa med pa/ rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon par byas te
302b5('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te rnam par spyod do// bdag gi skye ba ni zung ni bdag gis tshams par spyad pa spyod do// bya ba ni byas so// rnam pa 'di lta bu gzhan ni med do// zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ 
302b6('bum): rab 'byor dri yang myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
302b7('bum): chen po ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/ gzhi gang zhe na/ gang gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyaso zhes dam bcas na/ de la chos 'dri rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyu sa zhes bya bar dag la dge
302b8('bum): sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par dgol bar 'gyuro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang
303a1('bum): dgu par rje su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / phyag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / me 'jigs pa thob pa nye bar gnas te/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam
303a2('bum): bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na/ dge sbyong ngam bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gas sus kyang
303a3('bum): kyang rung ste/ chos ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis/ rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs zad par ma
303a4('bum): gyur to zhes bya bar/ bdag la dge sbyong ngam du bram ze 'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangasu pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar
303a5('bum): 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas/ de la bdage bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'gre
303a6('bum): pi thob par rnam por spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bcu'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrags so// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na/ dge sbyang ngo
303a7('bum): bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dmang tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos ldan par bskore bar me nus paM/ bdag gris rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang dag gis bar
303a8('bum): chad kyis chos su bstan po de dag la bstan pa de dag la bstan na bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med de/ de ci'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ A
303b1('bum): 'am/ btud dam/ tshungs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgolta bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag
303b2('bum): par rjes su mi mthong bsu/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba ming pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam
303b3('bum): bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra skrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bo dod dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung
303b4('bum): rung ste/ chos dang ldan par 'khor ba mi nus pa/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung gnas pa rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal
303b5('bum): yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan du byas/ na/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de lta bu'i gnas med/ de'i phyi re bdag/ 
303b6('bum): ladage sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhin sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang
303b7('bum): dag paro rje su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rje su ma thong bas de la bdag bde ba zab pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mtsho/ 
303b8('bum): rlabs po che'i gan su dam bitsa'o// 'khor ni nad de seng ge'i sgra sgrog go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud ngam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan
303b9('bum): sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed
304a1('bum): pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan du byas na sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba mi 'byung ngo // zhes bya ba de lta bu'i
304a2('bum): gnas med de/ de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngan bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang mi byed de/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par dgol ba
304a3('bum): 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag paro rje su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rje su mi mthong bas de la bdag bong ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa tho ba pra dang / mi 'jigs
304a4('bum): pa thob pa rnams par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gi nang du gle'i sgra skrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten nA dge sbyong dum bram
304a5('bum): ze'amag lha 'am ba dang dA ma tshangs pa 'am gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bsko re bar mi nus so// bdag gis rab tu bskor bur bya'o// zhes bya ba ste/ nub 'byor
304a6('bum): de yang 'di mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
304a7('bum): theg pa chen po'o// 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa
304a8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa dang / rab 'byor de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
304b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'i 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ste/ bcwo brgyad gang zhe na/ gang gi nam yang de bzhin
304b2('bum): gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang go nam la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na bdud dang tshangs pa
304b3('bum): dang / bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skyes chu dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i sdug bsngal zad par gyur pa'i le gyis rjesu bstan te/ phung po ma lus pa'i
304b4('bum): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yong su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'a'o// tsA tsam mnga'o dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o// 'du
304b5('bum): sna tshogs mi mnga'o// thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga'o// ma rtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o// mos pa yongasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// 
304b6('bum): dgongs pa yongasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// ting 'dzin yongs nyams pa mi mnga'o// shes rab yongasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba yongs nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnams par grol
304b7('bum): ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongasu mi mnyams pa mi mnga'i // sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi sngon du 'brang ngo // gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye
304b8('bum): kyis mngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rje su 'brong ngo // thugs kyis phrin las thams cad ye shes kyis sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ngo // 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs ma
304b9('bum): chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa la 'jug go/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa la 'jug go/ da ltar byung ba'i dus lam thogs ma chags pa'i yig
305a1('bum): gzigs pa 'jug ste/ rab 'byor de yang 'di mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dbu
305a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i thig pa chen po ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams ste/ de yang yi ge mnyam pa nyid dang / brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ge la 'jug pa ste/ de la yi ge'i
305a3('bum): glo dang / yi ge 'jug pa gang zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyis sgo'o// ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi go'o// pa zhes bya
305a4('bum): ni don dam pa ston pa'i phyir nga chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// tsa zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho dang skyo ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir du chos thams cad 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba med pas/ chos thams cad
305a5('bum): kyi spre rI kan zhes bya ba ni mr-ing dang bral zhing / ming gi rang bzhin ma tho bo/ ma stor bas chos thams cad kyis sgo'o// la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das zhing / srid pa'i khri shing / dang / 
305a6('bum): rgyu dang rkyen yang dag par bcom pa'i phyirachos thams cad kyi sgo'o// da zhes bye ba ni dul ba dang dus pa'i gan su yongs su nges pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ba zhes bya ba
305a7('bum): ba cingaso pa dang bral ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// d+ha zhes bya ba ni dkrugs ma dang bral bI phyirachos thams cad kyi sgo'o// sra zhes bya ba ni chags pa mi dmigs pas
305a8('bum): chags par mi 'gyur 'tshong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// bzhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam dang / sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir ro chos thams cad kyis sgo'o// ta zhes
305b1('bum): bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ya zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ji ltar ba bzhin du dmig su med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// / 
305b2('bum): swA zhes bya ba ni khyengs pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyis sgo'o// ka zhes bya ba ni byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa
305b3('bum): nyid me migs pos/ mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' ba'i phyir/ chos thams cod kyi sgo'o// ma zhes bya ba ni bla dog gir bya ba mi dmigaso ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyis
305b4('bum): grwa'o// ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// tho zhes bya ba ni gnas me dmyigs pa'i phyir// chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// dz+ra zhes bya ba ni
305b5('bum): skye ba ma dmigasos pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// shA zhes bya ba ni dbugs dmigs su med pa'i chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyi
305b6('bum): so med pa'i phyir/ chos tha~Md kyi sgo'o// sha zhes bya ba ni zhig nase dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// khA zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'o dang mnyam pos/ 
305b7('bum): med pa'i phyiro// chos kyi sgo'o// kr-i zhes bya ba ni zad pa dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// sta zhes bya ba ni stong pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi
305b8('bum): dz+nyA zhes bya ba na ye shes dmig su ming po'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// rta zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa mi ngomigs pa'i phyir de chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ha zhes
307a1('bum): rgyu mi dmigs bu'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// b+ha zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// tshwa zhes bya ba ni mdog mi dmigs pa'i
307a2('bum): phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// sla zhes bya ba ni dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ha zhes bya ba ni bong pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi
307a3('bum): sgo'o/ tas zhes bya ba ni mr-is pa ma dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// g+ha zhes bya ba ni sgeg po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// Sha zhes bya ba
307a4('bum): ni bsgrub pa mi dmigasra pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad gyi sgo'o// Na zhes bya ba ni nyin mongs pa med paste/ gang yang 'ong ba med tsong 'gro ba med de/ gnas pa med cing 'dug pa me
307a5('bum): la/ nyel bar gyur pa med pras rnam par mi rtog pI phyir chos thams cacod kyis sgo'o// pha zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu migs su med par bya'i phyirachos thams cad kye sgo'id
307a6('bum): zhes bya ba ni phung po dmigasu med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// yas shes pa ni me bde ba mi bde ba mi dmigs pI phyir// chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// tsa zhes bya ba ni sbyong
307a7('bum): pa mi dmigs/ pI phyir chos thams cad kyis sgo'o// Tu zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa dang / mtha' thug par gonas par 'chi 'pho med cing / skye ba med pa'i phyir/

307b1('bum): grang la yang gang gis tha snyad du bya ba dang / gang gris brjod pa dang / gang gis bstan pa dang / gang gis bri ba dang / gang gi klag par bya ba de lta bu'i meng gang yang med do// rab
307b2('bum): 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad nid pe na mkha' bzhin du/ khong du chud par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gzugs kyi sgo la 'jug pa a la sogs pA yi ge bstan pa la 'jug pa'o//

307b5('bum): 'jug pa'i phyir/ phywa rgya 'di dang a las sogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyog rgya'i tshig 'dri dag tho ste/ thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub bar
307b6('bum): byed cing / gzhan la yang tshul dang ldan pa'i blo gros ston na/ de la legs po nyi shu yod par shes par bya'o// nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dran pa dang ldan/ blo gros da
307b7('bum): po dang ldan/ blo ldan/ dge' ba dang ldan/ ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang // gzungs kyi sgo 'di yang nyon mongs pa med par thob cing the tsom me/ 
307b8('bum): gyur la/ gzhan lis sgra'i ngag snyan pa thos kyang chags par 'gyur ba med cing / zhe gcod pa'i tshig thos kyang khong 'khri bar mi gyur pas/ mtho ba med cing dma' ba med de/ 
308a1('bum): tshul bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ska la mkhas par gyur pa dang / phung po la mkhas par gyur pa dang / khams la mkhas par gyur pa dang / skye mched la mkhas

308a8('bum): sa kyi ma rkyen pa rgyang chu bu ma chis// // kya da sang byang na
308b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par bzhugs pa yin zhe na/ zer ba ni/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// pha rol du phyin
308b2('bum): pa drug la spyod cing / sa nas sar 'phar te/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod cing / sa nas sar 'phar ba yin zhen/ 
308b3('bum): 'di lta ste chos thams cad 'phro ba med pas/ chos gong yang 'ong ba med nyid 'gro ba med de/ 'pho ba 'am nye bar 'phro ba med do// 'on kyang chos thams cad kyi so gang yin pa de
308b4('bum): rlom sems su byed pa 'am/ sems pa med par sa yongasu skyong ba yang mi byed pa ma yin la// de yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // de la byang chub sems dpa' sems da
308b5('bum): chen po'i sa yongs su sbyong ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor sa dngango bo la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa yongs su byang po bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang
308b6('bum): zhe na/ de la mI dmig spo ba'i tshul gyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa yongaso sbyang ba dang / mtshan ma me dmigs pa'i phyir/ phan pa'i bsam pa yongasu sbyang zhing / sems can
308b7('bum): mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba dang / sbyin pa dang / btong ba dang / len pa mi dmigs/ pa'i phyir/ btong ba yongs su sbyang
308b8('bum): dang des rlom semasu mi bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen brten pa yongasu sbyong ba dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ ches bcol ba yongasu sbyang ba dang / 
309a1('bum): myi dmigs pa'i phyir/ yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su spyang ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi skul
309a2('bum): meswA pa/ yongs su sbyang ba dang // chos kyi rnam pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir de chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos kyi yang dag pa nyid myi dmigs pa'i phyir/ de ma

309a7('bum): dang / bla ma la bsnyen pa kur zheng dad pas gus pa bya ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshul ba dang / rab 'byor chos rgyud po de da ni/ byang chub sems ngo
309a8('bum): sems dpa' chen pos gnyis pa la gnas pas de chos lnga la gnas por bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mang du thos pas mi ngoms shing / rol yang yi ge la
309b1('bum): par ma zhen pa dang / zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par byed cing / des kyang rlom sems mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtswa
309b2('bum): babaskyed cing / yongs su sngo yang des rloms su mi 'gyur ba dang / dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skye ba med cing / des kyang rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shis
309b3('bum): khrel yod pa la gnas kyang / nges rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba ste/ rab 'byor chos lnga po de dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa gsum pa la gnas pas

309b5('bum): ste/ de dag yongs su btang bar mi bya'o// bcu gong zhe na/ 'dre lta ste/ dgon pa la gnas pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / mchog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyis ngos
309b6('bum): pa mi btang ba dang / slob pa yongasu mi btang ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan smad pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / rdzas thams cad yongasu btang ba
309b7('bum): dang / sems zhum pa med pa dang / dngos po thams cad ltos pa med pa ste/ rab 'byor chos tham bcu po dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gan

309b9('bum): chos drug po 'di dag yongasu spang bar bya ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di ltar khyim pa dang / rten pa yongs su srang por bya ba dang / dge slong ma dang / sten pa dang / rigs la ser sna
310a1('bum): byed pa dang / 'du ba dzi'i gnas dang / gnod sems dang / bdag stod cing gzhan smod pa ste/ chos drug po de ngag ni yongasu smin par bya'o// yod chos bcwa

310a7('bum): pa'i sems yongs spang bar bya'o// dngos po thams cad mongs su btang bas/ yid mi bde bar mi bya ste yid mo breng ba yongasu spang bar bya'o// spongs mo ba mthong na slongs

310b1('bum): sa drug pa la yongs su gnas pas spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas/ chos nyi shu mi bya snyed
310b2('bum): gang zhe na/ 'di lnga sde bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o// sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / chad par 'dzin pa dang / rdeg par 'dzim
310b3('bum): pa dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes dang / rgyur lta ba dang / ming dang gzugs la mngon par tshogs pa dang / phung po la mngon par chags pa dang / khams la mngon par chag

310b6('bum): lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang 'dzu khrims la rten po'o lnga ba la mngon par chags pa dang / chos rnams spong ngo zhes bya bar zhum par 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid dang 'gal ba ste/

310b8('bum): nyi shu gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid rdzog spo bar bye ba dang / mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba dang / smon pa med pa mngon du bya ba dang / 'khor gsume yongasu dag pa dang / sems can thong
311a1('bum): lA snying rje zhing snying rtse ba dang / sems can de dag la brnyas par mi bya ba dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du blta ba yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rdzogs/

311b1('bum): kyi zhing yongs sbyang ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin la yang dang yang mnyam par bzhug pa dang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa bu dzi lta ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur ba nga lta'o

311b6('bum): pa'i skyobs pas nges pa bsnun pa shes pa dang / me'i myangal du phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / rgyung phun sum tshogs pa dang / rus phyeH
311b7('bum): sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / tshe phun sumi tshogs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum
311b8('bum): tshogs pa dang / yon tan thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rab 'byor chos bcu gnyis po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' so sa dpe'i
312a1('bum): po'i sa dag pa la gnas pas yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// rab 'byor sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs
312a2('bum): pa nyid du ba rjod do// de skad ces bstsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'dis la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
312a3('bum): sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i gle pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa/ yongs sbyang ba gang legs bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub
312a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ dge ba'i sems brtsa ba ming po yang dag por po dang bya
312a5('bum): 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu sbyang pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i seMn
312a6('bum): thams cad la sems mnyes pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadro dang ldan/ pa'i semos skyid pas tshad med pa bzhi po byams pa dang / snying
312a7('bum): rje nga dga' ba dang / btang snyoms mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad lang sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyas
312a8('bum): ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i btong po gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la/ rnam par rtog pa med par sbyin pa yongasu btong ba ste/ 'di ni byed
312b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i btong ba yongasu sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen bsten pa yongasu sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di
312b2('bum): lta ste gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gshos gnyen te/ dge
312b3('bum): bu'i gnyen sten pa dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur ster bya ba dang / sI bsdang du bya ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ dge ba'i gshes gnyes
312b4('bum): brten pa yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po'i chos btsal ba yongasu byeng ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
312b5('bum): sems bskyed pas/ chos tshol zhing nyon thos kyis sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos tshol ba yongs bya'o// 
312b6('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ tshe rabs thams cad du 'du 'dzi med par 'byung zhing / de bzhin gsheg
312b7('bum): pa la rab tu 'byung yang / de lwa bar chud byed pa gang yang med pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag yang 'byung ba yongasu sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub
312b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su skyeng ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong nas/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tho bo pa
313a1('bum): gyur gyi bar du sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / rnam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku'i la mos pa
313a2('bum): su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbri ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i de bzhin gshegs
313a3('bum): pra mngon du gyur pa'i yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston cing / thog mar yang dgra/ bor du yang dge/ tha mar dge ba yi ge bzang po/ don bzang pod ma
313a4('bum): 'dres pa yongasu rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa/ yongasu byang ba'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'di lta ste/ mdo dang dbyangs kyis snyan pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshig su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod
313a5('bum): pa dang / gleng bi zhe dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skye bro'i rabs dang / shin du rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / bstan la bab par bsnyen pa dang / yang dag par sto/ 
313a6('bum): pa stenga'adi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam pare dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang khyengs pa brtsam
313a7('bum): ba yongs sbyang po gang zhe na/ nga rgyal dang khengs pa ji ltar bsal ba des/ nam yang rigs dma' bar mi skye bo 'od ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ong rgyal dong khengs
313a8('bum): ba gsal bo yongs su sbyang ba'o// / shes rab bam po brgyang pa'o// / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongasu sgyu
313b1('bum): bu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ji skad du smra ba de ltar byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba'o// rab 'byor de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa
313b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sa dang po la gnas pa'i yongs su sbyang ba bcu'o// rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 
313b3('bum): 'di lta ste nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yid la mi byed cing / de ma yin pa'i tshul khrims ngan par byed pa dang / byang chub snyi dgegs su gyur pa'i chos gzhan dag kyang
313b4('bum): yid la mi byed bro ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongasu dag pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing dran
313b5('bum): du gzo ba gong zhe na/ byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i spyang po skyed po'i tshe/ phan pa du zhig byas kyang / 'khor ba zad kyi bar du
313b6('bum): chud mi gson na/ mang po lta ci smos te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ 
313b7('bum): bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing / 'tsho ba med pa'i sems te/ 'di ni byang tshob sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i
313b8('bum): mthu la gnas pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya/ pa gang zhe na/ 'od lta ste sems thams cad theg pa gsum po
314a1('bum): smin par byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
314a2('bum): sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su skyobo pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems
314a3('bum): can thams cad yongasu mi btang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
314a4('bum): po/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du sems shing / bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal ba gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can
314a5('bum): dmyal ba je gnas par bya ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ma bkod kyi bar du de dag btabro cing gshag pa dang / gdung zhing btso ba dang / bsreg pa
314a6('bum): los stsogs pa nyams su myong bar bya'o// snyam nas/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don du skye zhing skye bo med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
314a7('bum): chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma bsnyen bkur zhong / dad pas gus par byos pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar bla ma rnams
314a8('bum): la ston pa'i 'du shesu byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma gnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par byos pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa
314b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol du phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste las gzhan med par sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ las
314b2('bum): gzhan med par pha rol du phyin pa rnams yongasu tshol ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol du phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba'o// de la byang
314b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mings pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten 'di 'am/ phyogs bcoM kun
314b4('bum): skye 'jig rten gyi khamasu gang bstan pa de dag thams cad yongs su bzang bar bya'o// zhes mi ngoso ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du
314b5('bum): thos pas mi nges pa'o// dri lu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zing zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
314b6('bum): dpa' chen po chos ston pa'i tshe/ chos kyis sbyin pa des chung ngu na/ byang chub tu yang re bra med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zung zing me// 
314b7('bum): par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ying su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / yongs su
314b8('bum): sngo ba gang zho no/ dge ba'i brtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas kyis zhing yong su dag par byed cing / bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs skyong po'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa
315a1('bum): 'di dag yongasu sngo ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyis zhing srongasu dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongasu sngo ba skye
315a2('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba yongasu skyo ba med pa grang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis khyer bstan no/ sems can yongs smin bya
315a3('bum): 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis zhing yongasu dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa bros nye bston cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu rdzogs kyis bar du nam yang skye ga/ 
315a4('bum): mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med/ pa'i 'khor bas yongs skyob pa med pa'o// de la byang chub sems drapa'i sems dpa'i chen po'i
315a5('bum): shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la smoro pa ste/ 'di ni byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes
315a6('bum): bA'o// sheng khrel yong pa la gnas pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgon pa yongasu mi btang ba gang na ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi
315a7('bum): ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mu btang ba'o// dril byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe'i chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang
315a8('bum): zheni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub la yang dag par 'dod pa mi skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba'o// de la byang chub
315b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga shes pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang / rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skyes

315b3('bum): rnams la rtogs par gzhog pa'i bzong po ste/ 'di ni byang chub semasu dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyis sdom pa mi btang ba'o// de la byang chub
